Loved that the hotel was quiet, no one running in the halls, talking loudly or slamming doors. Everyone we encountered abided by the covid rules – masks worn properly, social distancing and sanitation stations.   Would recommend if in the area.
Manager Response: Dear 859TK,  We are grateful to have received such a review from an avid traveler! We are glad to have been able to provide an enjoyable stay for you. We hope to see you again!  Best,  Evan S.

Summary Heading: Hidden gem!! Julia Lam was extremely helpful!
Summary: Great place.  Very comforting artistic vibe. Julia Lam was very helpful, went out of her way to help me get a great room. Would highly recommend this hotel over Hilton Marriott etc.  restaurant was much nicer than other hotels.
Manager Response: Dear ahmadq2022,  We are grateful for the review. I'm happy to see Julea made your stay! We hope to see you again.  Best,  Evan S.

Summary Heading: Our go-to hotel any time we come to OC
Summary: I spend a lot of time in hotels for work and pleasure and this is one of my favorites.  It is conveniently located to a host of freeways, walking distance to Segerstrom Center and South Coast Plaza, along with many other shops and restaurants.  The hotel is very nice, the rooms very comfortable and the staff is excellent!  When we have to work there, we like to get a suite so we can each work in a separate room.  There are plenty of nice places to plop down with high speed internet within the hotel (and patio) as well - when I'm not in meetings.  If you can get a room with a lake view, it's really lovely and the lake is nice to walk around as well.  The staff is so friendly and go above and beyond to make our stay wonderful.   A shout out to Julia, who always recognizes us and
Manager Response: Dear OCStaycationer,  We are grateful for the review and love to hear that you enjoy spending time here. Although you you may have to work I am glad we still provide a relaxing experience! Once again, thank you for taking the time to leave a review. We hope to see you again!  Best,  Evan S.

Summary: I have stayed at Ave of the Arts hotel many times over the last four years and I have to say that every time is as lovely as the last. The staff is quite friendly and attentive - even down to the gentlemen changing lightbulbs in the hallway. Of course, as a traveler I have come to expect good customer service, but here it doesn't feel forced, it feels genuine. I can't say that about most places. Always clean, bright, and comfortable, this place makes it easy to relax and feels well worth the cost. For reference, I've stayed here with a bridal party, for a couples getaway, and for the occasional solo retreat.
Manager Response: Dear 881rachaelr,  Thanks for the review! We are happy to have become your home away from home and look forward to hosting you each time. Thank you for continuing to choose to stay with us. See you next time!  Best,  Evan S.

Summary Heading: Avenue of the Arts is a favorite!
Summary: Every time we come to Newport Beach area, we stay at the Avenue of the Arts Costa Mesa hotel.  it is a beautiful property, very avaunt guard, beautifully decorated, clean, and the employees are kind and very helpful, providing information and help for anything you might need.  I highly recommend it and I love the decorating!  And the beds are the best!!
Manager Response: Dear valeriewick,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us once again. We are grateful for the opportunity to continue to serve you and are glad you enjoy your time with us. See you next time!  Best,  Evan S.

Summary: This hotel is good in terms of price point. I think we paid about $250 / night + parking of $27.00.  Rooms are large and clean but bathrooms could use an update because :  a. the hot water didn't work in the sink or shower until we let the water run for 10-15 minutes, and  b. the shower curtain was really gross.  We didn't eat on the property so I can't comment on that. But overall the staff is friendly and location is great.
Manager Response: Dear ameenadin,  Thank you for staying and leaving a review. I am sorry to hear that there were some issues with the bathroom! These have been noted and shared with our housekeeping and maintenance departments so they do not affect the next guest. Once again, we appreciate you staying with us. We hope to see you again!  Best,  Evan S.

Summary: The hotel is very reminiscent of Las Vegas circa 2005, it's like going back in time. Worn down furniture and outdated color schemes. Bathroom was very outdated and moldy showers, floors in the room weren't clean so I did wear my shoes the entire time. This place needs a paint job, a deep clean, and some new furniture pieces.   Not an elevated place to stay, but the location and helpful staff were probably the biggest perks. South Coast plaza, Philz coffee and multiple spots to grab food all in walking distance. Probably will opt to stay elsewhere next time I'm in the area.
Manager Response: Dear X5614lljuliep,  Thank you for staying and taking the time to leave a review. I am sorry to see you did not fully enjoy your experience. We have shared your feedback with the housekeeping and maintenance teams to take care of the issues you noted. We hope to see you again!  Evan S.

Summary Heading: Wonderful stay, beautiful ambiance, and every amenity you could want!
Summary: This hotel is one of the nicest we have ever stayed in. As beautiful as the photos are, they don’t do justice to the beauty and atmosphere of the entire place. The room, hallways, elevators and restaurant were impeccably clean. The staff was so very helpful and enthusiastic- including special requests in the restaurant. We enjoyed the bar one afternoon and enjoyed the ambiance, drinks and appetizers. We also enjoyed the heated pool and hot tub- even in November, and had a wonderful time! Another day we sat outside and worked in their courtyard that is decorated and has the true feel of an oasis. The exercise room also was fully stocked with upgraded equipment, a beautiful view of the lake area (an oasis of its own), and extremely clean as well as stocked with fr ah towels,
Manager Response: Dear Sightseer616589,  We are grateful you have taken the time to leave this wonderful review. We are so lucky to be in such a fantastic location and are pleased to see you know how to take advantage of it! Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We are looking forward to seeing you again!  Evan

Summary Heading: Wonderful stay at this beautiful hotel.
Summary: We have stayed here a few times while attending a concert at Segerstrom Hall.  It is very convenient to walk right over to the concert and enjoy the evening there.  The staff is very helpful and the accommodations are very comfortable.  We look forward to returning in the future.
Manager Response: Dear 1sheilas,  Thank you for leaving us a review. We are glad to see you find us the perfect place to stay when visiting the Segerstrom Center. See you at the next concert!  Evan

Summary: Staff was friendly and efficient. The room was clean and spacious. Especially loved the heated pool! Bar setting was a little sterile but the waitstaff was accommodating.  Ordered breakfast room service and the food was delicious.  Wish our plans has us staying more than one night.
Manager Response: Dear imyajSD,  Although your trip was short we are glad you got to enjoy it! We hope to see you again.  Evan

Summary: Avenue of the Arts is my home away from home! I have stayed there many times over the past 5 years and I always feel like I am at a Ritz Carlton or St. Regis. The Front Desk Staff make me feel welcome and highly valued. They greet me by name with friendly smiles and always get me a great room! The housekeeping staff and those in the Silver Trumpet restaurant also understand that I work hard and want to relax and feel pampered. I have never been disappointed at Avenue of the Arts!  The beds are comfortable; the towels soft and fluffy; the HVAC gets the room temperature where I like it; there is plenty of desk space to work; and the showers work well.  The Hotel never feels crowded; there is no noise; and I always get an excellent night’s sleep.  There are many choices where to
Manager Response: Dear Marc E H,  We appreciate you taking the time to leave us a review. We are honored by your praise and grateful for the opportunity to serve you again. See you next time!  Evan

Summary Heading: Wedding at the Ave of the Arts Costa Mesa
Summary: Came down for a Wedding and the venue was amazing. The staff was very friendly from the minute I walked in to the staff at the restaurant and the lovely bartenders. Definitely one of the nicest hotel experiences I’ve had and would highly recommend anyone who’s looking for a beautiful to host a wedding or any other special occasion there. Also the Hotel is In a perfect location for anything you’re looking for from entertainment, night life, dinner and even a few bars. Can’t wait to come back
Manager Response: Dear andrewhC4833AI,  Thank you for joining for the wedding! We are happy to see you enjoyed yourself here. Hope to see you again!  Evan

Summary: Wow! Gorgeous property with lots of attention to detail.  Super clean, inviting, and a very welcoming and helpful staff.  You will definitely want to come back.       My wife and I were staying there for our anniversary and we the staff went completely above and beyond to make our stay VERY memorable.      This is now our Go-To hotel in the area.
Manager Response: Dear Phosphoresence,  We are so glad you chose to spend your special occasion with us. We appreciate you taking the time to leave us a review. Hope to see you again!  Evan

Summary: This hotel is a hidden treasure! It's tucked away behind the Segerstrom Center, just across a quiet street. The staff and property are WONDERFUL. Great place for a private or romantic getaway,  and to grab a symphony or Broadway show at the center. The food and service at the Silver Trumpet restaurant is terrific too. Love this place!
Manager Response: Dear OCTodd,  Thanks for staying with us! We are glad to see you take advantage of our restaurant being so close to the Segerstrom Center. We hope to see you again!  Best,  Evan

Summary: The hotel is minutes away from the John Wayne airport. Has a nice modern feel with a layout that makes sense. The staff is friendly and attentive. Special shout out to Julea Lam who made my stay excellent. She was courteous, helpful, attentive, and provided top notch customer service with all parts of my trip. She is a huge asset to the team! Also, I frequented the Silver Trumpet restaurant several times and did not have a bad meal or drink (Thanks to Allí and Mitch) Parking in their attached garage is convenient and reasonably priced.  Room was clean and the balcony afforded a lovely view. All in all, I would stay here again. I came for business but ended up extending my stay for several nights and don’t regret it.
Manager Response: Dear Kcortavarria,  Thank you so much for taking the time to leave a review. We are glad to see you wanted to enjoy more time here once your business trip had ended! We are looking forward to hosting you again, whether for business or just to get out. See you next time!  Best,  Evan

Summary: This hotel is a gem. Great location and superb customer service. We'll be back again soon. We had a nice meal in the restaurant facing a small pond. It's a nice spot for bringing our dog. It's also easy walking distance to South Coast Plaza, a fabulous shopping mall with high end merchants.
Manager Response: Dear JanH961,  We are glad to see you enjoyed your stay with us. We appreciate the review, and we hope to see you again!  Evan S.

Summary Heading: Location, Room, Food, Service, this Hotel has it all.  And, oh, so clean, too!
Summary: I did not know what to expect on my first stay at this hotel.  Here are my takes:  The Pros:      FRONT DESK:  Tired from travel, it is always a big plus when check in is efficient.  The  staff was both efficient AND pleasant.    ROOM:  Deluxe King. The bathroom is the first thing I check in every hotel.  Very clean, plush towels, quality bathrobe.  I repeat, VERY clean.  The room is light and spacious, with a vista of the lake, palm trees and plush greenery.  THE RESTAURANT/FOOD:  Dinner was delicious at Silver Trumpet.  What I ordered for breakfast must not be exceptional because I could not remember what it was!  Servers were efficient and anticipated my needs.  I found the menu prices reasonable compared to other hotels of the same category. Option to sit inside or outside
Manager Response: Dear Anna J,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us and leaving us such a fantastic review. We are thrilled you had a great time here and look forward to the next time we host you again.  Regards,  Evan S.

Summary: Stayed here for (mostly) business and have to say it felt like a vacation. The property sits on a beautiful lake with tons of turtles and ducks that are entertaining to watch when taking a stroll around the area. The staff at the hotel were absolutely amazing, always willing to help despite some housekeeping precautionary restrictions due to covid. The hotel features an outdoor pool/hot tub and a fitness center with all of the equipment needed for a week's stay. Silver Trumpet restaurant was also fantastic. Mitch was our server and was more than helpful with his service and knowledge of the area. The property is in an "office park" but there's a Starbucks which is about a 5 minute walk, and South Coast Plaza is the same walk in the other direction. Rooms were very very VERY
Manager Response: Dear mattjs89,  Thank you so much for staying with us and leaving a review. I am glad to see you enjoyed your stay. And thank you very much for having brought those issues to our attention. We will ensure our maintenance staff tends to items immediately.  Once again, thanks for staying. We hope to see you again!  Regards,  Evan S.

Summary: I stayed at this hotel for two nights with my Mom. Everybody was very nice and accommodating. We enjoyed staying here. This was my second time here and I am sure I will be back again soon. My Special thanks to Even, front desk supervisor for helping me with my reservation. I also like to thank Brian, Cassie and Andrew for being very helpful and accommodating. Hotel is nice and clean and centrally located. it is across the street from the South Cost Plaza and walking distance to Sub Zero showroom. I love to visit Sub Zero showroom since I am an interior designer and a food blogger.  I love staying in this hotel and will be back again soon.
Manager Response: Dear CASA M,  Thank you so much for staying with us and sharing your experience. We are so glad to see you and your mother enjoyed your stay. It was a pleasure to have you and we hope to see you again soon!  Regards,  Richard F.

Summary: Every staff member I encountered at this hotel helped make my stay great. It’s not often I encounter such a well run hotel. The management at this hotel is extremely competent and it shows by the highly trained staff. I wish Marriott would use this hotel as a model of how all of its hotels should be run.
Manager Response: Dear AlexRosell,  Thank you so much for your kind words. We truly appreciate you sharing this with us and are just happy you enjoyed your stay. We are looking forward to hosting you again the next time your travels bring you to Orange County.  Regards,  Richard F.

Summary: We arrived to a lovely entry driveway and proceeded inside to check in. Greeted by two very friendly women who went out of their way to accommodate us. The lobby, the grounds and the public areas were clean and inviting. Our room (425) was fresh and clean with a large walk in shower and balcony that overlooked the lake and surrounding properties. The hotel and all of the employees that we encountered were just great. The hotel itself is within walking distance of a very large mall with many many different options for dining. It’s also just a short drive to Newport Beach, and we even drove PCH to Seal Beach for breakfast. If you are looking in this area, look no further.
Manager Response: Dear jimbuddi,  Thank you for leaving us a review. We are so happy to see you enjoyed your stay and took advantage of our great location. We hope to see you again!  Regards,  Richard F.

Summary: Really enjoyed my stay here at this hotel. Staff was super friendly and on top of anything you need. Staff Welcomes You Upon Arrival. Hotel was clean and sanitized all around, and offered great amenities. The rooms are spacious and really nice views. Highly Recommend staying here
Manager Response: Dear SculpinSean805,  Thank you for staying and sharing your review with us. I am glad to see you enjoyed your stay. We hope to see you again!  Regards,  Richard F.

Summary: I was surprised and thrilled to discover this gem of a hotel! I was looking for a one night escape and the second I walked into the lobby I knew I found what I was looking for.￼ I loved everything about the hotel and had a wonderful stay. Service was great, my room was beautiful, gym wonderful, really couldn’t have been more pleased with everything. Highly recommend! I’ve already booked a return visit.
Manager Response: Dear bethrami5,  Thank you so much for leaving a review. We are very happy to see you enjoyed your stay with us and are looking forward to hosting you again!  Regards,  Richard F.

Summary Heading: Hip Hotel in a Great Walkable Location
Summary: Loved this hotel. Great location for shopping, the arts and great restaurants. Immediate surroundings are serene but yet, in the midst of everything. Great spot to be while everything opens up, after our last Covid shutdown. The staff is very accommodating.
Manager Response: Dear Ivonibeyer,  We appreciate you choosing to stay with us! I am glad to see you have taken advantage of our hotel's fantastic location; it truly is nice to stay here and explore the area. We hope to see you again!  Regards,  Richard F.

Summary: I have stayed at numerous places since my daughter started going to school in Irvine. This is definately one of the nicer ones affiliated with Marriott. The decor and landscaping is top notch. Breakfast at the Silvertrumpet was delicious and service was  good. So convenient and nice having a restaurant in the hotel that isn't overpriced.   We had a great room on the lower level that had a terrace. I wanted to sit outside but neighbors were smoking. I hope they ban that someday. We didn't get a chance to go in the spa & pool but they are open now.   The staff-house keeping, food servers, front desk (Clarisa) took care of all our needs and concerns.
Manager Response: Dear En L,  Thank you so much for sharing your experience with us. I am glad we are able to provide you with an excellent stay each time you come to visit your daughter. I am sorry to hear about the other guest smoking. Please let us know if it ever occurs because we are a non-smoking property and we make every effort to stop it when we know where it is coming from- as well as charging for smoking fees. I want to thank you again for leaving a review and choosing to stay with us. See you next time!  Regards,  Richard F.

Summary Heading: Ranked best Marriott for a reson
Summary: Great property with a staff that has an exceptional eye for detail.  Once you arrive it is easy to see how they are the #1 ranked Marriott.  Beautifully redone rooms with a great view of the lake.  The adjoining restaurant doesn't let up.  Service and food are right on point.  Would highly recommend.
Manager Response: Dear grege310,  Thank you so much for sharing your experience with us. We are proud to have been ranked as such and make every effort to stay there! We hope to be able to welcome you back the next time your travels bring you to Orange County.  Regards,  Richard F.

Summary: Was attending an event in Newport Beach and needed an overnight room to stay in. The Hotel was decent. It was during covid so nothing was open in the hotel. The hotel was clean which is always an important aspect for me when staying in hotels. The staff was nice I checked in late at night and left early morning. Was happy with the room and the cleanliness.
Manager Response: Dear SusyAdz,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. I know it is unfortunate that some amenities are not able to operate as usual but hopefully things will be back to normal soon! We hope to see you again when they do!  Regards,  Richard F.

Summary Heading: Oasis away from all of it in Orange County
Summary: I have stayed at the Avenue of the Arts more times than I can remember now, it's always a delight, and being a Marriott Elite, I always have gotten at least a Jr. Suite each stay, as was the case this time.  Also breakfast at the Silver Trumpet was included and I had purchased a food package with parking and $50 food at the Silver Trumpet also for dinner.  The branding and complete attention to their color theme through out is without fail.  Very soothing.  The water features area in the back of the hotel is just so nice to look out on in the morning and the evening and great to walk around.  Also if you feel like it, you are really close to South Coast plaza which has every high end retailer I can think of off hand.  The Jr. Suite has a great living area, the bathroom is good.
Manager Response: Dear RobertClouseTravel,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us and leaving this glowing review of your time here. We are proud to keep delivering the level of service that continues to bring you back and are always happy to host you again. We hope to see you soon!  Regards,  Richard F.

Summary: I was here back in November for a L A R G E wedding party. The hotel staff were extremely accommodating and understanding, given our large group. The location is amazing, the staff even better, and the hotel was excellent! Highly recommended!
Manager Response: Dear kevinsaechao,  I am glad your group got to enjoy yourselves at a wedding during these times and appreciate that you took the time to leave us a review. We hope to see you again!  Regards,  Richard F.

Summary: Absolutely incredible hotel! This is seriously a hidden gem!   Outstanding experience from start to finish! Looking forward to staying here again very soon. The room was incredibly clean, the facilities are fantastic, and the staff was very helpful and friendly. The pool was very clean, heated, and surrounded by wonderful furniture and a large cabana.   We enjoyed the wonderful walking path around the lake many times. So many grassy areas to picnic or just relax.  I couldn't imagine a better overall experience.  I used to travel often prior to COVID, and this is one of my new favorite hotels. Since it wasn't safe to travel, I searched for a local hotel that looked clean and safe to surprise my mom and daughter for Thanksgiving. I had no idea it would be as fantastic as it was.
Manager Response: Dear trishac423,  Thank you so much for choosing to stay with us and leaving a review of your time here. I am glad to see you got to enjoy many aspects our property has to offer. We are looking forward to hosting you again soon!  Regards,  Richard F.

Summary: I checked in at this hotel so that way I would have a place to get ready day of the wedding near the church where we were having the ceremony at. I stayed one night before and the night of my wedding. The staff went above and beyond to make my stay memorable. They upgraded my room for free and made me feel safe at all times due to covid. The room was beautiful and the view of the lake was gorgeous. My husband and I stayed another night the day of the wedding and were able to make it to John Wayne airport for our honeymoon in minutes. We love this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear JessicaRico23,   Thank you for choosing your recent travel with us and leaving this amazing review. We are happy to hear that your wedding went well and that you decided to stay another night. We hope to welcome you again.  Regards,   Richard F.

Summary: We were so impressed by the service at the Avenue of the Arts Portfolio Hotel that I have taken 3 surveys on the stay. It is important to note this was an emergency during the hours of the fire in Orange County, so many people were in a panic. But not the staff or management of the Hotel. Indeed, the management and staff handled the situation of us evacuees showing up at the same time - with nervous dogs and worried humans like professionals. The management was smooth, caring, gave out water, and was so reassuring - the staff acted quickly - was informative enough but not too much. The hotel team as a whole knocked it out of the park with service and what felt like genuine care. We had never been in this hotel but we will visit again. It is beautiful inside and out and, is of
Manager Response: Dear 772gilberts,  Thank you so much for taking the surveys and leaving a review of this stay. We are proud to have been there that day to do what we could to help out our community and are happy to see you enjoyed your time here. We hope to be able to welcome you back under better circumstances.  Regards,  Richard F.

Summary: I'm a local resident but had to evacuate due to the fires that were close to my home. Avenue of the Arts Costa Mesa was ready to help by immediately accommodating my mom (a senior) and I, and went as far as to offer a substantially discounted rate. This pet-friendly hotel is super clean and aside from seeing a pup here and there, you would never know pets were allowed. Again, it's very clean and there are no lingering smells that can come from a hotel that welcomes fur babies. I hope I don't have to evacuate again, but I will definitely steer out-of-town guests to this wonderful hotel. As a local resident I wasn't staying at the hotel for local activities, but for those interested the hotel is located near several excellent restaurants and has convenient access to the freeway
Manager Response: Dear Adventurer253052,  I understand you came to us during difficult times but we appreciate you taking the time to leave us a review anyway. We are glad to have been able to welcome you when you needed and truly hope to see you again under better circumstances.  Regards,  Richard F.

Summary: We have stayed at the AoA Costa Mesa 8 times now. Always perfect in every way, clean Covid protocols follow to the tee. Felt very safe, highly recommended to anyone looking for a safe, clean and perfect location.
Manager Response: Dear V2269ZOrobertr,  Thank you so much for sharing the positive experience you had here in your review. We are happy to be able to serve and continually provide excellent stays for a frequent guest such as yourself. We are looking forward to hosting you many more times in the future.  Take care.  Regards,  Richard F.

Summary: I highly recommend this hotel.  All the staff  were so helpful and welcoming, from the front desk to the restaurant staff.    When I first walked into our room, I was impressed at how clean it was.  Pool was warm and refreshing.  Breakfast was amazing.   I will definitely stay here again.  Thank you!
Manager Response: Dear Jill P,  Thank you so much for choosing to stay with us. I am truly glad to hear you enjoyed your stay so much. We are looking forward to welcoming you back the next time your travels bring you to Costa Mesa.  Regards,   Richard F.

Summary Heading: From a high volume traveler- cool place to stay
Summary: Well I suppose I should say I used to be a high volume traveler til...2020. It was nice to get back out again and stay at a hotel that won't just blend into all of the others. Modern and memorable (in a good way) decor with that was welcoming, elegant but still comfortable- purple and silver, glass and marble. The front desk staff was friendly and helpful, you could tell they hire hospitality staff who want to do just that, be hospitable. They graciously provided an extra toothbrush (gratis) - not quite up to speed yet, apparently. Room was pretty, clean and beds very comfortable.   Good location, and worth the visit.
Manager Response: Dear LandPMreview,  Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us this beautiful review. We strive to provide a high level of hospitality and are glad we were able to serve you. We hope to be able to welcome you back again soon!  Regards,  Richard F.

Summary: Always my favorite hotel to go to when I’m in OC and even I’m LA area. First it is super clean, staff are nice and service is fast. Also the surroundings is beautiful! Calm and serene. The Lakeview especially, it will help you relax, how nice it is to wake up with a lakeview when you open the window on your clean bath robe and slippers and having breakfast while watching the view of the Lake. And your  car is safe in their parking garage. Also they are pet friendly! Highly recommended!
Manager Response: Dear riom728,  I am glad we are able to welcome you back time and again to enjoy a peaceful getaway. We are looking forward to hosting you again soon!  Regards,  Richard F.

Summary: I had read multiple positive reviews of this property and decided to try it.  It was disappointing.  Not sure if related to Covid, or typical.  We had reserved executive suite.  No executive lounge on property and breakfast was not included.  Not really sure what the benefit was for the "executive" suite.    Otherwise, location was good for shopping and restaurants
Manager Response: Dear rgoyal4,  Thank you for choosing the Avenue of the Arts Hotel. Correct, we do not have an executive lounge and breakfast is usually only included if a breakfast package is booked. The benefit of the executive suite is the added space, as it is the largest suite we have on property. I am glad you were still able to enjoy the amazing location of our property! We hope to see you again.  Regards,  Richard F.

Summary: I was helping to move my daughter into UC Irvine and acclimate to the area so we stayed at your lovely hotel, Ave of the Arts in Costa Mesa for 6 nights. First of all I would like to say that the hotel is beautifully situated in a park like setting surrounded by greenery and waterways...a slice of tranquility rarely found in such an urban area. At the front desk Ian Rosal was the first to kindly greet us and so kindly gave us a room which maximized the view and made our 6 days feel like a vacation! The rooms are gorgeously appointed with luxurious linens, the towels where beautifully soft (not worn from overuse), the Kuerig coffee maker and pods were a big elevation in coffee quality from standard drip makers (and so much more hygienic during this time of COVID-19). We were
Manager Response: Dear MiriamT1044,  Thank you so much for leaving us this beautiful review. I am glad you had such a nice stay with us for the week and truly appreciate you taking the time to share your experience. We would be happy to host you any time you come back to visit your daughter! Take care.  Regards,  Richard F.

Summary: It’s a beautiful hotel and I liked it even better when I found out they accept dogs.  We will definitely come back!  The staff are great.  The surrounding water park is an added beautiful scenery.  The rooms are artsy.  The lobby is the best with very nice color theme.
Manager Response: Dear dinnahs2016,  We are glad to have welcomed you to see our beautiful property. Thank you for choosing to stay with us, and we hope to see you again soon!  Regards,  Richard F.

Summary: This was our second stay at Avenue of the Arts. We will definitely be back! Beautiful hotel! So comfortable, QUIET and such incredible customer service. Breakfast from the restaurant was A+ as well!! We’ve stayed at several places in the area as our daughter lives here and we won’t stay anywhere else now. The experience here is truly unmatched. What a beautiful hotel with the most friendly staff. Thank you for such a terrific experience!
Manager Response: Dear 365brandiea,  We are delighted that you enjoyed your stay so much. We are happy to have a place for you here anytime you come to visit family!  Regards,  Richard F.

Summary Heading: Great stay over Labor Day weekend
Summary: What a wonderful hotel...I had a room on the 6th (highest floor) overlooking the lake.  It was peaceful and relaxing.  Incredibly quiet (I never heard noise from the other rooms and only once did I hear a door close from out in the hallway).  The a/c performed admirably during record heat, and I appreciated having a balcony door to get fresh air, especially during COVID times.  Extremely clean, well  designed and appointed room.    The hotel itself is well situated.  It's only several blocks to South Coast Plaza and almost directly behind Segerstrom Performing Arts Center.  There's a paved walkway around the lake (which has ducks) and the hotel is a block from the Noguchi Sculpture Garden.  Many interesting eateries in the area.  Re COVID:The front desk attendant told me that
Manager Response: Dear BelleChristi,  Thank you for staying with us and leaving this review! We truly are fortunate to be in such a great location and are glad you got to experience it. I am happy we were able to host your relaxing getaway and hope we will be able to again soon.  Regards,  Richard F.

Summary: If you’re looking for a boutique experience at a bargain price then the Avenue of the Arts is a great choice.  This hidden gem in the Marriott Bonvoy collection is a step above your other standard Marriott experiences in the area.  Management and staff are excellent.  As a Marriott Ambassador member, I would highly recommend this property.  You won’t be disappointed.
Manager Response: Dear JamesMFQ,  Thank you for your spectacular review! We are honored to have been able to provide such an experience for you. We hope to be able to welcome you back soon.  Regards,  Richard F.

Summary: I stayed here in July 2020 for my birthday weekend during covid. I've also stayed here in July/August 2018 and loved both of my stays.  Excellent staff. I remember seeing an employee from my previous stay and he was always friendly/professional. I forgot the gentleman's name who helped me, but he gave outstanding service! All staff here is great.   Rooms: Modern, clean, hardwood floors with great views. I love looking at the lake from my room. Walking around the lake and area is very peaceful, romantic, and relaxing.
Manager Response: Dear Natasha,  I am glad to see you enjoyed your birthday weekend with us! We appreciate your comments about our staff and are always happy to serve. We hope to see you again!  Regards,  Richard F.

Summary: I am still impressed with this hotel. I frequent hotel stays for business and this one has really sticks out to me. The room was tastefully decorated with an extremely comfortable bed, great water pressure. Everything was so clean. The service was great. There's a restaurant next door and food was delicious, worth every penny if you need convincing. On the back side of the hotel there's a beautiful water feature. I don't have business plans to go back to this area but I will make the effort to go back on vacation days just to stay at this hotel again. Location is great.
Manager Response: Dear cbF9277GC,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us and leaving a review. I am glad to hear you enjoyed our property and will be looking to return. We are looking forward to hosting you again!  Regards,  Richard F.

Summary Heading: The BEST hotel in Costa Mesa
Summary: I have stayed at most of the local hotels, and this is by far the BEST! Nice location, near South Coast Plaza shopping. Many restaurants close by, have any type food you may want.  Best staff of any business I know. Everyone looks to make your stay here perfect.
Manager Response: Dear remotetravel,  Thank you for your loyalty and for being such a great guest! I am so pleased to hear our staff always takes care of you. This is definitely our main goal. Hopefully we get a chance to welcome you back soon. Please let us know if you need at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary Heading: nice, quiet hotel that does not pretend too much
Summary: Nice, clean hotel that is easy to stay at.  Not noisy and not crowded.  We had dinner in the bar, watching election results, and it was pleasant.  The food good, not outstanding, but a good value.  There was also a 2 for 1 drink special that saved us a few buck.  Would stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear L9137UZdaniels,  Thank you so much for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am so pleased you were able to enjoy dinner and drinks at the Silver Trumpet! Hopefully we get a chance to welcome you back again soon. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: My team and I frequent this hotel property for business and I have nothing but great things to say about our stays. The staff anticipates your every need and makes it happen.  It is nice to be welcomed back every time by all of the smiling faces.  Tyler and his staff do an excellent job!
Manager Response: Dear Maurele L,  Thank you so much for taking the time to review your recent stay with us and your multiple experiences at our property. I am incredibly pleased to hear our staff always takes such great care of you. This is exactly what we strive for. Please let us know if you need anything at all. Hopefully we get a chance to welcome you back again soon!  Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary Heading: One of the best hotel stays
Summary: From the service to the incredible bed and breakfast, it was really one of the best hotel stays I've had in a long time. The room is also equipped with lots of plug outlets and USB ports around the room. It's conveniently located by a lot of great places, so I would advise making Avenue of the Arts your stay in the OC!
Manager Response: Dear supald2020,  Thank you so much for taking the time to write such a wonderful review of your stay with us! I am so happy to hear you enjoyed all elements of your stay with us. Hopefully we get the chance to welcome you back again in the future! Please let us know if you need anything at all.  Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: We have been visiting this location/property for several years now I never knew it existed it is a hidden gem.  the rooms are very very comfortable if you get a suite  you’ll get your moneys worth.  The hardwood floors are very very nice. The views from the room are very very nice. The concierge and the valet guys are really helpful, they don’t get in your way.
Manager Response: Dear Networx77,  Thank you for your loyalty to our property and for sharing you experiences with us. I am so grateful we have been able to welcome you back throughout the years and you have continued to enjoy staying with us. Hopefully we are able to host you for years to come! Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: The Avenue of the Arts Hotel is a lovely oasis when we visit Orange County.   The rooms, public areas and grounds are all beautiful and serene, and while the hotel is quite large, it has a real "boutique" feel.  There are good restaurants, great shopping and all kinds of arts performances nearby, and it's 15 minutes from the airport.  Everyone who works there has a smile and a warm welcome.  They even opened up the gift shop early so we could buy some chocolate for our trip home!
Manager Response: Dear jaheyboer,  Thank you so much for taking the time to write such a wonderful review of your stay with us! I am so happy to hear you enjoyed all aspects of our hotel and you felt taken care of while you were here. Hopefully we get the chance to welcome you back again if your travels bring you back to Costa Mesa! Please let us know if you need anything at all.  Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: All the staff was extreamly helpful but specifically Dominga, Tony, and La La #love them. On behalf of myself, administration, and staff, I would like to thank you for providing the brilliant Interior designing services, food preparation, timely of service but furthermore the impeccable customer service from Dominga and Tony meal time services making our stay and work environment to feel like a dream.
Manager Response: Dear eldanny777,  Thank you for sharing your experience with us, we sincerely appreciate you taking the time. I am so pleased to hear you were well taken care of by our banquet staff, I will be sure to pass on the compliments of the staff members you mentioned. I hope we are able to welcome you back again in the future if your business brings you back to Orange County! Please let us know if you need anything at all.  Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary Heading: great place to relax for long weekend
Summary: I stayed here before for work afew times, but this time had a chance to go with my girlfriend while visiting the area. It’s a great location for work and the airport, but it was great for going to catch a show, and eating at some very good places near by too, and the beach is not much further away. They have an all night kitchen which is great, and the menu for late night is more than just bar food, we had a rack of lamb and fish and it was delicious. The breakfast is good too. There’s a Panera walking distance to save some money, and a lot of other fast food places near by too. In general the area is great and the hotel is very artsy which my girlfriend really liked. The lakeside view was worth it every morning to have coffee on the balcony, Note: they don’t have any smoking
Manager Response: Dear OsqurBDEngery,  Thank you so much for taking the time to write such a fantastic review of our property! I am incredibly pleased to hear you enjoyed all elements of your stay with us. Hopefully we get the chance to host you and your girlfriend again! Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: Stayed at Avenue of the Arts with some friends for a mini staycation and we just had the absolute best time! It’s perfectly located and pretty much has all the amenities you could need! We had dinner at their restaurant Silver Trumpet and couldn’t believe how great the service was! The food was amazing and so were their cocktails! The stuffed mushrooms were to die for! Loved how close everything was from the hotel and the staff was super helpful and had great recommendations. Emily was a delight and really does know the best spots in town for a fun night out! Can’t wait to come back!
Manager Response: Dear vrivera07,  Wow! What a great review, thank you so much for sharing. I am glad to hear you felt well accommodated while staying with us, and our location was a convenient one to suit your needs. I hope we are able to welcome you back again if your travels bring you back to Costa Mesa. Please let us know if there is anything we can do for you.  Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: I absolutely love staying at the Avenue of the Arts hotel. I’ve stayed here property 5 or 6 times now. As far as the location, It’s across the street from the Segerstrom Center and a 15 minute walk from South Coast Plaza. My wife and I love to plan our trip so we see a show Friday night at Segerstrom, then shop  Saturday.  Post shows the bar is usually pretty packed and is a ton of fun. Food wise I cant comment on, we try to eat at as many different restaurants as possible.  Front desk staff is polite and prompt to respond any of our requests. The same could be said for valet.   Overall this hotel is amazing and a joy to stay at. I look forward to visiting for years to come.
Manager Response: Dear Minknuk J,  Thank you so much for your loyalty to our property and for taking the time to review your recent experience with us. I am happy to hear we are able to provide you a consistent home away from home. We hope to have you back for many more stays in the future. Please let us know if there is anything we can do for you.  Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: We stayed here for a weekend and it was fantastic.  The service was top notch and the amenities were fantastic. The room service was great and I'd recommend a trip to the bar for some great companionship. All of the employees were kind and enthusiastic about their job. The room was clean, the price and location were perfect.  Thank you again.
Manager Response: Dear 698ame,  Thank you so much for sharing your recent experience with us, we sincerely appreciate you taking the time. I am glad you were able to take advantage of the amenities we offer on property and you were well taken care of by our team here. We do strive to provide excellent guest service and appreciate the acknowledgement. I hope we are able to welcome you back for a future stay.  Please let us know if there is anything we can do for you.  Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary Heading: Avenue of the Arts Costa Mesa a Gem
Summary: Spent five wonderful days at the Avenue of the Arts Costa Mesa. Front desk staff recognized my SPG status immediately, and rewarded my loyalty with daily breakfast vouchers in full service Silver Trumpet restaurant. Also upgraded us to a peaceful, well appointed lake view room. Hotel is within walking distance of South Coast Plaza mall and several excellent restaurants. Also right across the street from the Segerstrom performing arts center, and an easy drive to Disneyland, and several good golf courses. $27 bucks a night for parking, but there is some free street side parking a short walk away. We'll definitely be back next time we're in the area.
Manager Response: Dear Doug D,  Thank you so much for taking the time to write such a fantastic review about your stay and our property! I am so pleased to hear you enjoyed your time with us and that your status was recognized and appreciated. Hopefully we get a chance to welcome you back again soon. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: Beautiful hotel.  Boutique and yet impressive with the surrounding performing arts and shops at South coast plaza.  Rooms are clean and beautiful.  We had a lake view.  The hotel is a secret gem.  The restaurant is fabulous.
Manager Response: Dear Cosmopolitan742868,  Thank you so much for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am so pleased to hear you enjoyed our restaurant and close vicinity to great shopping! Hopefully we get a chance to welcome you back soon. Please let us know if there is anything we can do for you.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: Elevators dont work.  There are mosquitoes  in the room.  Drawers in dressers are broken.  Desklight didnt work.  No call from staff to check on service which was poor.  Parking extremely expensive.  Gets very noisy.  Dont stay here.  The problem is that Marriott which owns this hotel and only two other hotel chains have a virtual monopoly so the have no need for good service anymore.
Manager Response: Dear Germana1234,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I sincerely apologize for the troubles you experienced during your stay. There is definitely no excuse for poor service. I have taken note of the physical issues you mentioned and will pass them along to the proper department to ensure they are corrected immediately. Hopefully we get a chance to welcome you back and show you a proper experience. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: Hotel was booked due to local wedding. Paid for specific room but arrived late and it was given away. Expressed disappointment with staff and they all, particularly Julea and Emily, provided excellent customer service to resolve my concerns. This is a posh and trendy hotel with great food and and even better cocktails. Rooms are clean, comfortable, and all have balconies. Also has local shopping and food selections nearby. This is a top notch facility and definitely recommend visiting.
Manager Response: Dear delinda j,  Thank you so much for taking the time to review your recent stay at our property. I am very pleased to hear the staff were able to turn the situation around into a pleasant experience for you. This is exactly what we strive for! Hopefully we get a chance to welcome you back again soon. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary Heading: Nice little boutique hotel in corporate setting
Summary: We did a little staycation here since this hotel is in bonvoy network and it was a nice surprise. We got a little man made lake view and a small balcony but room made good use of small space. Towels were excellent nice bed and plenty hot water also has a nice gym and great restaraunt/bar attached
Manager Response: Dear otalay,  Thank you so much for sharing this positive experience that you had with us. I am glad to hear that you enjoyed the view of the lake and that the room had everything you needed! Hopefully you are able to join us again for another stay. Please let us know if you need anything at all.  Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Office Manager

Summary: My wife and I stayed here for a quick weekend get-away . What a pleasant surprise. Close to great restaurants, shopping and many places within walking distance. Loved the room and overall "feel" of the entire property. Staff, from the moment we pulled up, was very engaging and was ready to assist in any way possible. Really enjoyed the stay and we'll be back!
Manager Response: Dear tomd4640,  Thank you for such an incredible review! I am so pleased to hear how excellent your stay was. We take great pride in providing great service and its nice to hear that we accomplished that.We look forward to welcoming you back again very soon. If you need anything at all, please do not hesitate to reach out!  Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Office Manager

Summary: I have been wanting to stay at this place for some time. Finally did and it was great. Nice rooms, very helpful staff and really nice decor. Only negative thing was the hot tub I would have loved to have a hot tub outside but it was disgusting.
Manager Response: Dear yorosey,  Thank you for your review and for your recent stay here at Avenue of the Arts Hotel! I am glad to hear our staff were so helpful and that you found the room to be to your liking. However, I am disappointed to hear about the flaws you experienced with our hot tub. We greatly appreciate your feedback and this information has been passed on to our engineering department to ensure it is up to standards. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back again soon.  Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Office Manager

Summary: This is a classy hotel, not only in terms of elegance, but the way we were treated by the staff. Even though we booked the hotel through Priceline, they did not treat us any differently than high-end customers paying full price. They made us feel welcome and like valued guests. Doormen opened the doors for us when we came in and when we went out. The clerks at the reservation desk were warm and friendly. Housekeeping was quick to deliver extra towels and toiletries upon our request. My daughter had to take her cranky baby to the lobby in the middle of the night to walk around with him. The clerks (Carla and Angel) came over to play with the baby, and even brought him a tiny stuffed animal. This was way above and beyond any customer service experience we have had at any hotel
Manager Response: Dear Tracy T,  Thank you so much for taking the time to review your recent stay at our property. I am incredibly pleased to hear the staff took such great care of your family. Everyone is met with greats service here no matter how the booking is made. We just appreciate the chance to be able to host you. Hopefully, we can have you back again soon. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Office Manager

Summary: I am a current Hilton Diamond member. However, I do book Marriott when I cannot find a nice Hilton that is listed as preferred in my concur travel system with my job. This Marriott property has set the bar very high and I will say I was truly impressed. I’m from the east and visit the west coast pretty often and this was the nicest, cleanest and prettiest property in the area.  It was simple, yet elegant in a boutique-ish kinda way. Since this stay, I have given 2 more Marriott properties a try and have not been disappointed thus far. Everything from kind staff, easy self parking , dining, room decor , room cleanliness was an A+ here. Shopping and food are very close too.  I’ll definitely be back again! Thank you !
Manager Response: Dear sanlynch,  Wow! Thank you for this positive review, I appreciate you taking the time to share your experience with us. I am so glad to hear that after staying at our hotel, and having such a good experience, you have stayed at more Marriott properties. I hope we are able to welcome you back to stay with us again. Please let me know if you need anything at all.  Kind regards,  Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: I have to say that from check in to check out I was made to feel so welcome. The staff are fantastic. deception were great and I was made to feel really welcome. I am a Convoy member but I hadn't given my number. It was such a change to be made welcome for being a customer rather than from the colour of the Hotel loyalty card.  I was pretty tired having flown in from the UK that day so thought I would grab a bite in the bar. It was a small bar which felt intimate and welcoming. Had a great steak!  Definitely the place to stay in Costa Mesa or Orange county
Manager Response: Dear John M,  Thank you for sharing your recent experience with us, we sincerely appreciate you taking the time to write such a positive review. Our team strives to provide excellent guest service and I am so glad to hear that is what you received throughout your stay. I hope we are able to welcome you back again for a future stay if your travels bring your back to Costa Mesa. Please let me know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards,  Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary Heading: Great Stay, Great Service, no complaints.
Summary: A great stay here in August, we had 2 rooms booked which the reception team were able to make adjoining, room was fab and clean and the location is excellent. Great little Gym at the rear of the hotel and a clean and privately enclosed swimming pool. Parking came at a cost but was convenient. Would recommend to anyone looking for a good base to explore.
Manager Response: Dear Jasonandsam,  Wow! Thank you for sharing such a great review, we sincerely appreciate you taking the time. I am glad to hear you enjoyed your stay and our team was able to accommodate your requests. I hope that you are able to stay with us again if your travels bring you back to Costa Mesa. Please let me know if you need anything at all.  Kind regards,  Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: I can’t love this hotel enough! Not just because it fabulously chic but because it out of the way and super quiet which is a must have for me in terms or lodging. I love the circular drive and the fire lit heat lamps as well as the fountain out front. Parking is $25 or 29 to valet. The parking garage is right next to the hotel not a very far walk so unless you’ll be coming in late or drunk valet is not needed.The staff is exceptionally nice and the lobby is beautifully decorated with plush velvet couches and caged chairs next to a blazing fire place. The fact that the hotel is Not too big is also a plus. There is a  large outdoor  lounge  area  with plush couches. Very nice design, but it was too cold to sit outzWe stayed in the executive suite. Very nice.very clean With robes
Manager Response: Dear alijoes2018,  Thank you so much for taking the time to share your recent experience with us. I am so glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay at our hotel and you were well taken care of my our team here. I hope that we are able to welcome you back for a stay in the future. Please let me know if you need anything at all.  Kind regards,  Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: We are Marriott Gold Members and from the time we arrived until we left it was really seamless. The shuttle service from Santa Ana airport was quick and efficient. We arrived really early in the morning and within two hours (we went to grab breakfast) our room was ready. The room was spacious, quiet and really lovely. The hotel itself is really beautiful and was decorated for the holidays. The restaurant/bar are great the waiters and bartenders are fantastic. The front desk staff was really friendly and very much in line with the service of other Marriotts. My only suggestion is to improve the WiFi, it was a bit challenging to work and possibly re-do the bathrooms as they are a bit dated. I also really liked the Peleton's in the gym, great addition!
Manager Response: Dear JoannaN207,  Thank you so much for sharing your experience with us, we sincerely appreciate you taking the time. I am glad to hear that you enjoyed our property and you were able to take advantage of our shuttle service. I appreciate your feedback on the wifi and will communicate with our Chief Engineer to see what we can do about enhancing the network. I hope that we will get the chance to host you again if your travels bring you back to Costa Mesa. Please let me know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards,  Tyler Branham Front Desk Manage

Summary: Outstanding boutique hotel with excellent service, nice lobby, very nice rooms with hardwood floors.  The hotel boost a very modern design.  The restaurant is excellent for breakfast.  The hotel is located near several great restaurants for dinner as well
Manager Response: Dear ddmullis,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us! What a wonderful review of our property. I am happy to know that our location and amenities served all of your needs. Hopefully we get the chance to host you again soon. Please let us know if you need anything at all!  Kind regards,  Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary Heading: Wonderful staff and beautiful Hotel and rooms!
Summary: The Avenue of the Arts Costa Mesa Hotel was a wonderful stay! My kids and I enjoyed the clean, spacious room and all the large Hotels amenities. The staff was wonderful and my great experience started at booking! I was asked if I needed extra pillows, blankets or anything special for our staff, got a great rate and it was very efficient and timely. When we arrived at the Hotel and during our entire stay we were constantly greeted with smiles and helpful assistance. The staff really go out of their way to make sure you have what you need and are taken care of. I would recommend this Hotel to anyone and will be returning. Thank you!
Manager Response: Dear margoa480,  Thank you so much for taking the time to provide such an excellent review and for your recent stay with us! I am so pleased to hear you and your family had a such a great experience and that all of our staff were so friendly. This is exactly what we strive for everyday. Hopefully we get a chance to welcome you back again soon. Please let us know if you need anything at all.  Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: What used to be a boutique hotel is now part of the Marriott family.  But retains many of the qualities and standards of a boutique hotel providing a nice option from the typical facilities found near the airport (John Wayne/SNA).  And also not on a main street, tucked behind a glorious Segerstrom Performing Arts Center.  Excellent staff, very helpful and accomodating.  Really nice rooms, a little larger than typical spaces, most with small balconies.  Nice bathroom with luxury amenities.  Plenty of room to work, relax and enough outlets for all things powered.    Nice fitness center, more than enough equipment.  Very nice restaurant for all meals, not just breakfast.  And while the hotel does not have any elite lounge, Marriott elite level guests do receive a breakfast voucher
Manager Response: Dear mastiffdad,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us! What a wonderful review of our property. I am happy to know that our location and amenities served all of your needs. Hopefully we get the chance to host you again soon. Please let us know if you need anything at all!  King regards,  Tyler Branham Front Office Manager

Summary: My wife and I spent the night at this wonderful hotel where we were pampered by all the staff we encountered.  All of them went out of their way to assist us, especially the front desk who opened the gift shop after hours for an emergency item.  The restaurant, The Silver Trumpet, is outstanding, and worth a visit alone.  This is our favorite local hotel and we have made a holiday tradition of always spending some holiday time here enjoying the special treatment.
Manager Response: Dear AnaheimCADISNEYLAND,  Thank you so much for taking the time to write such an amazing review of our property! I am so pleased to hear that all of the staff took such great care of you. Here, we strive to provide a home away from home experience and for you to consider us a holiday tradition speaks volumes. We look forward to welcoming you back! If you need anything at all please let us know.  Kind Regards, Front Desk Manager Tyler Branham

Summary: The Avenue of the Arts is a pleasant hotel modeled after the boutique concept like the W.  I stay here from time to time and hold a large team meeting once a year.  I would recommend the hotel for business or pleasure.
Manager Response: Dear C5095HAstevenh,  Thank you so much for taking the time to review your recent stay with us! I am so pleased to hear you of your return to the hotel and we appreciate you hosting an event every year! Hopefully we get a chance to welcome you back again soon. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary Heading: Great time, amazing rest, and beautiful views!
Summary: My visit was more than extraordinary, when I arrived I was greeted with open doors and smiles! I was treated beyond well by the front host who helped me receive my card key for the room and even asked if I needed water or anything before heading up to my room. The bar area was live and many fancy suits and dresses paraded the halls, in a respectful manor. Upon arrival to my room, my jaw dropped to the view of the lake behind the restaurant and the community around. I had many opportunities to hit the night life but chose to stay inside instead and watch a few movies before passing out. As I left, checkout was smooth and simple and I was on my way! Amazing stay, and I will be returning will several more guests to be entertained! Thank you!
Manager Response: Dear Baysdude,  Thank you so much for taking the time to share your experience with us. I am so glad to hear that you enjoyed your time at our hotel and you were well taken care of. Hopefully we are able to welcome you back again soon. Please let us know if you need anything at all.  Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: We stayed here this past weekend for a brief visit to the Newport Coast.  Very hip and contemporary hotel.  We stayed in a spacious junior suite with a balcony view of the lake.  Staff were all nice and pleasant.  The bathroom was comfortable with nice toiletries but the shower curtain had a couple of little tears/stains and needs replacing.  Overall, we will likely return here when we’re in the area.
Manager Response: Dear Soulfultrvlr,  Thank you kindly for taking the time to review our property and for your recent stay with us. I am so glad to hear you liked the size and layout of our junior suites and that our staff were so pleasant! Hopefully we get a chance to welcome you back again soon. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: This is a nice hotel for any occasion. And if you are fortunate enough to book a lake view room (because they sell out quickly), by all means do so. If you get a balcony, you can open it up for the fresh air and beautiful views. Beds were comfortable and warm and the maids provide anything you ask for, even above the plenty that is already given.  While staying there, were many beautiful wedding parties so they are very popular for venues and they seem to handle these events in a very organized manner without any disruption to the other hotel guests.  I have to say that the property grounds are absolutely beautiful & the hotel itself is intriguing in a lot of ways. Some of the avant garde decor might give you a “Prince” throwback feel but it's a beautiful hotel nonetheless.
Manager Response: Dear mannyfigz,  Thank you so much for taking the time to provide such an excellent review of your stay and our property! I am incredibly pleased to hear the staff took such great care of your family during your extended stay. Hopefully we get a chance to host you guys again soon. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: We celebrated our anniversary here.  They upgraded our room to a suite and delivered wine, cheese, fruit and nuts.  When the newspapers were not delivered to the hotel, they went and bought them and delivered them to our door.  Breakfast at their Silver trumpet Restaurant was included and it was a sit down eggs, bacon, potatoes, toast and coffee.  We had wine and appetizers in the Silver Trumpet bar.  All food was delicious. It is a beautiful hotel with water running around the hotel and beautifully decorated.  We cannot say enough about the service.  We will be back.
Manager Response: Dear Romance2016,  Thank you so much for taking the time to provide a review and for your recent stay with us. I am incredibly pleased to hear you had an all around great stay with us. This is exactly what we strive to provide everyday! Hopefully we get a chance to host you again soon. Please let us know if you need anything at all!  Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: My daughters and I thoroughly enjoyed our short stay.  The staff were very pleasant and helpful every time we interacted with them on the phone or in person- (from confirming our reservations, to answering questions regarding the shuttle and places to visit and eat in the area).  Our shuttle drivers were very friendly and provided great tips on local activities.  The hotel indoor and outdoor common areas provide some nice places to relax.  The rooms were clean and spacious and the staff very responsive to any requests we had.   The hotel is conveniently located near Segerstrom Hall, as well as the South Coast Plaza.  We would definitely stay here again if we are ever in the area.
Manager Response: Dear DayTrip625548,  Thank you for such a fantastic review and for your recent stay at our hotel! I am so glad that all of our staff were so helpful and made your experience here one to remember. Hopefully we get a chance to have you back with us again soon. Please let us know if you need anything at all.  Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Office Manager

Summary: For a boutique hotel, I was pleasantly surprised at the excellent service, quality of food and amenities provided.  I wished I could have stayed longer than just the weekend.  I will definitely come back for another staycation. Highly recommend it.
Manager Response: Dear gck1016,  Thank you for taking the time to review your stay at our property, we greatly appreciate you sharing your positive feedback. I am so glad to hear that our hotel was a pleasant surprise and we exceeded your expectations, I certainly hope we are able to welcome you back in the future for another stay. Please let me know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: Tucked away in a garden-like atmosphere surrounded by condos. Sweet place, clean but expensive for the amenities and level of comfort/service.  Wifi is good, the service was nice, the restaurant had a great breakfast, bed was comfy and it was clean. Nice airport shuttle - very convenient to John Wayne Airport.
Manager Response: Dear Kelleyanne,  Thank you so much for taking the time to provide a review of your experience at our property.We are happy to hear you had an excellent experience at the Silver Trumpet Restaurant and found the cleanliness of the property to exceed your expectations. We look forward to welcoming you again!  Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: Loved the cozy lobby.  Coupled with the snuggly suites with luxury linens.  Service was stellar.  LOVE LOVE LOVE.  Check in was smooth.  The Shuttle to the airport was a big plus.  Costa mesa haven from now on.  Lobby
Manager Response: Dear Rebecca C,  Thank you so much for taking the time to review your recent stay with us! I am incredibly pleased to hear that everything about your stay was so fantastic. We certainly appreciate the positive feedback on the luxury quality of the linens and feel of our suites. We look forward to seeing you again!  Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: Overall great experience on a recent business trip. Staff were really helpful and nice. The rooms are big, modern, and very clean. WiFi is fast and the tv allows you to watch Netflix. I didn’t really explore the lobby bar but it looks nice. I will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Neil B,  Thank you for taking the time to review our property. I am very pleased to hear you enjoyed our rooms and overall had a great stay. We always do our best to assist everyone we can in anyway possible so I'm glad we were able to accomplish that for you. Please let us know if we can do anything and we look forward to having you again.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary Heading: Stay for the ease of Segerstrom Performaning Ctr and South Coast Plaza
Summary: I stayed in room 118. The sheets clean and overall room appearance fantastic. The room has a sliding door that takes you on a patio with a small table and two chairs to have your morning coffee or breakfast. Lots of vegetation. Make sure to close the curtains though since you are on floor level. Wifi connection, two beds, bathroom comfy. Kept hearing a metal ping sound perhaps from AC. Also, ask if there are hosting a wedding or other big function, the parking building fills up and you may not find parking if returning from a dinner. Tucked away between Anton and Ave of the Arts streets.
Manager Response: Dear petitesandra,  Thank you! We appreciate your positive review despite the malfunctioning air conditioner. I do apologize for that and I hope it had no impact on your ability to rest peacefully. We will have our engineering team look into it right away, thank you for letting us know. We hope to welcome you back in the near future!  Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: I love this hotel. It is beautifully laid-out and the rooms are comfortable, with expansive views and everything you would need for an extremely pleasant stay, even one of some duration. I was particularly impressed with the service, especially from a young woman named Julea, who was extremely attentive, smart, patient and helpful. I've been staying at this hotel for many years, and in it's present iteration it's the best it has ever been.
Manager Response: Dear ElizKaye,  Thank you so much for choosing us and for such a great review of our property. I am so pleased to hear Julea took such great care of you. She will be very proud to hear that. Hopefully we get a chance to welcome you back soon. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: I attended The Taste event at the nearby Met in Costa Mesa. I chose the hotel because it is walking distance of the event and I didn’t have to pay for event parking.  The hotel lobby is quite classy. Tall ceilings, lots of glass and other feng shui elements made the public area quite nice.  My room. 433, has a spectacular view of the lake. It is opposite Avenue of the Arts and quite quiet.  People with allergies will appreciate the wood floors. The stone tile in the bathroom is unpolished and not slippery when wet. Bed was comfy and the shower worked well.  Keurig made cold coffee - boo. Lots of charging plugs and usb outlets. While I did not use the gym, it does have a decent amount of equipment.
Manager Response: Dear Abazaba,  Thank you so much for taking the time to review our property and for your recent stay with us! I am so glad you made it out to such a great event! Hopefully we can have you back next year also. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: Our stay was perfect. From the moment we drove up to the Valet the customer service was apparent. We were immediately greeted and assisted in the hotel. The desk staff checked us in and even were able to upgrade our room too a King at a small up charge. The hotel is beautiful, the colors, art and decor is very modern, trendy and elegant. The rooms was large and spacious and even had robes and slippers for guests to use. Our view outside our window was of the pond. It was so beautiful at night.   Our only complaint is that the hotel did not offer coffee for guest. The only available coffee was in the grab and go store that costed around $4 a cup. As a couple that enjoys staying in trendy boutique hotels, this is something that most offer to guest at no charge.
Manager Response: Dear Joe L,  Perfect is an excellent word! I am so glad to hear that's how your stay turned out. This is something we strive for everyday! Hopefully we get a chance to welcome you back again soon. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: We had a lovely stay at this hotel. The room was charming and service was outstanding. Every aspect was good from valet parking to room accommodations to staff helpfulness to the breakfast we enjoyed at the Silver Trumpet restaurant. It was a great weekend getaway. I highly recommend it to any traveler looking for a change from the normal hotel. This venue has character that can be savored in a weekend flyby.
Manager Response: Dear jagjim,  Thank you kindly for providing such a great review of our property. I am so pleased to hear all the accommodations worked for your stay. This is exactly what we strive every day. Hopefully we get a chance to welcome you back again. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: Avenue of the Arts hotel was such a pleasant surprise. The decor was a bit loud, but the property was pretty and everything was cared for well. Our room was awesome (robes, slippers, Netflix, etc). Prices were good and the restaurant/bar/in-room-dining was amazing! Best hotel food I've had in a while. The only improvement I'd suggest is some decor upgrades.
Manager Response: Dear bla378,  Thank you so much for such great review of our property. I am happy to hear that the upkeep of our property was noticed and you found our prices were reasonable! Hopefully we get a chance to welcome you back again soon. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: Property and rooms were very clean; hardwood floors and tasteful art and floor rugs that had a contemporary flair.  The customer service was fantastic.  The location was easily accessible to many restaurants and of course walking distance to the symphony.  The parking was a nice covered garage.
Manager Response: Dear chaos c,  Thank you so much for your review and for your recent stay with us! I am very pleased to hear you enjoyed the style of our hotel and our location in regards to dining and shopping. Hopefully we get a chance to welcome you back soon. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: The room I booked gave the impression it was a lake view. It was not. I was on the first floor and the floor of my room was lower than the pool deck outside so my view was the people sunbathing at the pool. Not very romantic. The pillow was too soft to support my head. The shower water never got hot.  The staff was excellent. Service is the best I have had at many hotels. Breakfast was too much food to eat and a great value at the Silver Trumpet next door. The decor is very artsy and the type of place my wife loves. Everything was clean and comfortable. The location is excellent if you want to spend an evening walking through the wonderful grounds at the Segerstrom Center and enjoy the many excellent restaurants near by. The hotel is quiet and we enjoyed ourselves despite the
Manager Response: Dear D G,  Thank you so much for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am so pleased to hear all the staff were so excellent! I sincerely apologize for the view! Hopefully we can get you back here soon and show you a proper view. Please let us know if you need anything at all.    Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: After 5 days at Disneyland, I decided before heading home to take a time out and spend my last evening in SoCal having some quiet time. Pulling up, I was greeted by the nicest people. Walking in, the lobby is spacious, calm and quiet with a small stream running through. The colors were muted and so lovely. I immediately, took a breathe and just enjoyed. There was ice water available to everyone. After a short wait, I was able to check in. As a Marriott property, I was offered the option of mobile check in earlier but opted to get the full experience since this was my first time. The customer service did not disappoint. I was greeted with a smile and courtesy. Heading up to my room, the elevator is easy to find and quick. My room had hardwood floors. Love. Walking in, it’s
Manager Response: Dear lttlewys,  Wow! Thank you so much for providing such a detailed review. I am incredibly pleased to hear how much you enjoyed your stay and that the staff service was on point! Hopefully we get a chance to welcome you back again soon. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary Heading: Fabulous hotel at a reasonable price
Summary: We stayed only one night on a leisurely road trip to San Diego but it was a great evening. I would definitely go back/recommend this hotel to friends. The beds were super comfortable and the hotel was quiet which afforded us the opportunity to sleep in. The water pressure in the shower was excellent and the room was clean, comfortable and well appointed. We loved being close to some amazing restaurants for both dinner and breakfast.
Manager Response: Dear Laura R,  Wow, thank you so much for taking the time to share this positive experience. We often get complemented on our beds, being such an important aspect of a hotel I am so glad that you found them comfortable enough to sleep in. We look forward to having you back soon for another stay. Please let us know if you need anything at all.  Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: My husband surprised me on my birthday and we stayed here at Avenue of the Arts! Everything from check in to check out was flawless and amazing!
