The staff is all very hospitable and so friendly! Love the aesthetics of the entire property and our upgraded room! The lake view is stunning to wake up to! The room was amazing and very clean. I love that they have a recycling bin in the room for the environmentally friendly traveler! Shows they really care. I would recommend this hotel to anyone that stays in Costa Mesa!!
Manager Response: Dear Vstoxstell,  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us, and thank you for joining us for your birthday celebration. We strive to provide excellent guest service and I am glad to hear that you felt well taken care of by our staff here. Hopefully we get a chance to welcome you back soon. Please let us know if you need anything at all.  Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: Stayed here for 3 nights. Super clean, very attractive with friendly, responsive staff. So close to everything.. can walk to mall, restaurants, coffee etc. very relaxing areas on hotel grounds.. lots of trees,so restful. Will always stay here when in Costa Mesa!!! Loved it!
Manager Response: Dear 19annam19,  Thank you so much for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: I stayed for 7 nights and it was a great experience from beginning to end. Check in was a breeze, hotel staff are absolutely the best, very accommodating with any request. The hotel is beautiful. The room was clean, well decorated, nice balcony overlooking the courtyard. Exquisite ! Close to shopping, the airport and other attractions along the cost of southern California.
Manager Response: Dear Sandra H,  Thank you so much for taking the time to share your experience with us. Please let us know if you need anything at all.  Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: Me and my wife stayed here a Friday and Saturday night for our wedding nearby. The hotel is very well decorated and is adjacent to a small lake that provided a perfect backdrop for our photographer to take pre-reception photos, if you like a mix of nature and modern urban scenery. We checked in late late Friday night, and the front desk was very friendly and made sure we had everything we needed for our stay in their Executive Suite. It is very chic and with a separate living room.   There were 3 main locations with large mirrors for the bride/bridesmaids to do make up and you would be able to have a 4th doing it simultaneously if someone had their own make up mirror to put on the desk. The hotel was very accommodating and quick with helping with various wedding day needs for
Manager Response: Dear nevetsgnow,  Thank you so much for taking the time to review our property and for your recent stay with us! I am incredibly pleased to hear that you chose to stay with us for such a special week and everything was successful. Hopefully we get a chance to have you back for a future anniversary! Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: Our organization hosted a dinner at the hotel and my husband and I decided to also stay at the hotel.    The hotel is just off of a main freeway and busy street but somehow still manages to provide a relaxing feel.  It is conveniently located (walking distance) to high-end shopping (South Coast Plaza), restaurants and theater.  The banquet rooms are nice and don't require much to look beautiful.  We ate dinner at the event and breakfast in the restaurant onsite.  The food was okay, not the highlight of the weekend, but edible.  There are plenty of great food options in the area.  The hotel and guest room were both very nice and nostalgic of the Golden Age of Hollywood.  Our room had a view of the man-made lake.  The bed was EXTREMELY comfortable!  We loved the down bedding and
Manager Response: Dear ladyLLM,  Thank you so much for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. Please let us know if you need anything at all.    Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Office Manager

Summary: My husband and I had a chance to get away for just a night. This swanky little gem is awesome! The hotel is modern with a luxe lobby and attached restaurant and bar. The staff is professional and friendly.  The rooms are updated and we really enjoyed our balcony with the view of the water around the property. The pool is a bit small if it's going to have a lot of people in it.  Outstanding property!
Manager Response: Dear daniellec817,  Thank you so much for taking the time to write such a nice review. If you need anything at all please do not hesitate to let me know.  Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: I was in the area for business and wanted to look for an affordable hotel option, and to my surprise, this hotel had a AAA $110/night rate that I couldn't pass up.  Being a Marriott Platinum Member, I've been to several Marriott, Westin, Sheraton, Element, Aloft, Courtyard, Springhill Suites properties, so I know what they all tend to look alike, and this was my first opportunity to try something in the Tribute Portfolio.    The Tribute Portfolio hotels pride themselves on their uniqueness, and this hotel certainly does that.  It feels very much like an independent hotel taking strong influences from the music and the arts, as the name implies.  I did the self-park ($26/night) and walked to the lobby for check-in.  It's been a long time since I've been to a hotel where there's a
Manager Response: Dear Roary_and_Friends,  Wow! What an incredible review of our property. I am very glad to hear your first visit at a Tribute Portfolio Hotel was overall pleasant. One of our goals is to create a safe, comfortable environment for all our guests so I do apologize about the main patio lock not functioning properly. I will get in contact with our chief of engineering and make sure all our rooms are well and secure. Hopefully we get a chance to welcome you back again in the future. If you need anything at all, please do let us know.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: The location of the Avenue of the Arts is wonderful. Close to 405 and shopping and of course the Arts Center. I took off a star because we had a Jr. Suite and used the pull out sofa bed. The houseman was quick to deliver the bedding but when we opened up the bed there was a fake nail, several coins and hair on the protective covering. Inexcusable! The events department should also consider the guests in the hotel when they plan a party in the lobby. I was embarrassed to walk through an elegant event in my jeans and t-shirt. Other then those things our stay was wonderful. Very professional staff on every level. Breakfast at the restaurant was delish too.
Manager Response: Dear sunsetlover19,  Thank you so much for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am very pleased to hear the staff were so professional. However, what you mentioned in regards to the bedding is totally unacceptable. I am incredibly sorry about that. Hopefully we get a chance to welcome you back soon. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: My husband and I booked a weekend getaway to this Hotel and we had the best experience with staff, from front desk to house keeping. We initially had a room issue and with no hesitation they fixed the problem. Bryant a young concierge was exceptional. He went more than out his way to make us comfortable and happy. In addition, they added extra perks for the trouble. The staff were very accommodating and extremely kind.

Bryant will be very proud to hear his efforts were noticed and he helped make your stay. Hopefully we get a chance to welcome you back again soon. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: I recommend this hotel very highly. Everything is beautiful, the personnel is very helpful. Definitely a place to relax, go outside for a walk around the lake and enjoy the serenity. I have been there twice now and definitely will be back many times on my trips to Costa Mesa.

We sincerely appreciate your loyalty to us in coming back for a second stay and we look forward to having you back again in the future. Please let me know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: Stayed here for a night and was impressed. The rooms are very nice and the service was amazing. Everybody working here was very friendly. We had a room overlooking the lake and pool which was . Hotel is within walking distance to a really nice mall, which has great restaurants and pretty trendy stores. We did have breakfast in the hotel restaurant, and it was very good - service was awesome too. Wished we were staying for more than one night. Highly recommended.

I am so glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us so much. We strive to provide excellent guest service and it looks like we achieved that in regards to your stay. Hopefully we are able to welcome you back to stay with us again. Please let me know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: This hotel is great - strategically located  near the 405 & tons of restaurants/stores in the Costa Mesa, CA area. The property itself is gorgeous - with the lake view and all of the artsy decor. The rooms are spacious, clean, and aesthetically pleasing. I would definitely stay here again in the future. All of the staff was extremely friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: Dear Tiorys A,   Thank you so much for taking the time to write such a wonderful review. Summary Heading: Incredible stay - service, decor, entire experience
Summary: I fly down once a month from San Francisco to Orange County. Got this hotel on points and I’m so happy I did. It looked unique and fun. It was!  Carla and Jamie at the front desk were exceptional - friendly, added-value service, and overall both considerate and kind.  The Silver Trumpet served an excellent breakfast. Our room had a view overlooking the lake and the pool (thank you, Carla!). Rooms are comfortable and have a flair that’s unique, which makes it different from your typical hotel.  I will definitely be staying here again.
Manager Response: Dear SpontaneousKL,   Thank you so much for sharing your experience with us, we sincerely appreciate you taking the time. Summary Heading: A place to stay in Costa Mesa
Summary: First time checking in this hotel instead of Marriott and Westin nearby, and have no regret ! Garage nearby, spacious and modern rooms, great service and overall atmosphere.... and significantly cheaper than Marriott or Westin when we booked.
Manager Response: Dear ted n,   Thank you so much for taking the time to post such an excellent review and for your recent stay with us! Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary Heading: Great location for meetings, family and romance
Summary: A beautiful boutique hotel for sure. My experience started with the very nice gentlemen who greeted you at the door, they always had pleasant things to say whenever you walked in and out. I loved that.  I was here for a business conference and had the most outstanding service from the banquet staff. Terri, Leo, Rogelio, Ivan, Mark, Abel, Tony, Dominga and Ava were all awesome, they were very efficiency and always had a smile. I definitely look forward to coming back to this location. We were in the George Gershwin Ballroom which was very nice, we had some of our meals at the Garden Retreat, which is great outdoor space for a small group and had drinks at the Lakeside Terrace which was also outdoors and overlooked the small lake. I very much enjoyed watching the ducks, fish and
Manager Response: Dear Miabiye G,  Thank you so much for taking the time to share your experience at our hotel. Summary Heading: Excellent, welcoming staff, quiet location, comfy beds. Pet friendly, too! Can’t wait to return!
Summary: My friend and I stayed a night on my points so we could attend an event at the Segerstrom and later a concert at the OC Fair. We were immediately impressed by the friendly and professional level of all hotel staff , from the doormen to those at the Front Desk.  We enjoyed the updated decor, appreciated the very comfortable beds, and found the location not only restfully quiet but also very convenient to anything we’d planned to do.  We will stay again.
Manager Response: Dear danceswithbeagles,  Thank you so much for sharing your experience with us. We take pride in striving to provide excellent guest service and I appreciate you for recognizing that you were impressed by our staff. Summary: What can I say? Simply blown away by the staff who couldn't do enough for me, my suite was unbelievable, my view out onto the lake, the cleanliness... I could go on. Everything about this hotel was perfect. I stayed here for 2 weeks through work and being from London this was my home for that period and it felt exactly like that. The bed was huge (the biggest I've ever slept in!), the living area was handy.  If I HAD to think of a couple of negatives, I'd say the width of the balcony. But that's more to do with my slight vertigo!!! And perhaps the sauna could have been hotter but that's just me honestly stretching for something to 'complain' about!!   Honestly, I cannot thank the staff enough for making me feel at home during my stay.
Manager Response: Dear 79mals,  Thank you so much for such an incredible review! I am extrmely happy to hear how excellent your stay was. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary Heading: Ambience, quietness , friendly and helpfull staff
Summary: Our room was decorated beautifully and our bed was very comfortable and so comfortable that it was the first time in days my wife had a good nights sleep. My only disappointment was that the pool is not heated and for southern California it should be a must being the weather is unlike Arizona whereas the 100 degree temp heats the pool.
Manager Response: Dear ozzie425,  Thank you so much for taking the time to provide a review of your experience at our property. I am so glad to hear that you had a comfortable stay and our staff was effectively able to assist your need. We appreciate your constructive comment on the temperature of the pool, we are always looking to improve for our guests and comments like these allow us the room to do that. Hopefully we get a chance to welcome you back if your travels bring you back to Orange County. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: So, we were really looking forward to staying at this hotel based on the reviews.  They have a friendly staff.  The Retreat area is very relaxing.  The Silver Trumpet restaurant was good.  But, what do you want in a hotel room?  A bed you can sleep on.  Their beds are very soft.  Not good for me.  The one pillow for each of us was hard as a brick!!  Couldn't sleep on it.  And, yes, that was ONE pillow per person, not two.   It is July and we wanted to relax by the pool.  Well, there again, they fail:  The pool can accomodate 12 people.  Really!  And every seat was taken, even though there were only 8 people out there.  Ridiculous in the summer in Southern California.   As friendly as the staff is, we won't be back, as we can't relax by the pool, nor get a good night's sleep.
Manager Response: Dear MrsB503,  I want to thank you for choosing to stay with us and providing your honest feedback.  We strive to provide a high level of hospitality and while I must admit that one pillow per person is not our standard, we sincerely apologize for falling short of meeting your expectations.  Once again, thank you for sharing your experience and we still hope to serve you again when your travels bring you back to Costa Mesa.  Sincerely,  Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: We had a very enjoyable stay at this hotel. The hotel's shuttle service picked us up from John Wayne Airport and transported us to this lovely hotel, where we were greeted by a friendly and professional staff.  Our 6-day stay was comfortable from the moment we arrived until we checked out.  We were even surprised with a room upgrade at no extra charge...just because!

Hidden gem!  I will chose this hotel even if I have to travel farther for business.  I am a Marriott Titanium member and you can't top this place.

The only con for this hotel was that parking was not included in the price and was 26 dollars a night.
Manager Response: Dear Sisjohnson82,  Thank you so much for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am so glad to hear the hotel had everything you needed for your time here. Summary Heading: Nice location but Gold Elite means nothing here
Summary: Nice location by arts district and small lake area. Booked a standard room based on high TA reviews, expecting an upgrade as MB Gold Elite, but instead was placed in a dark, 2nd floor room with a view of main passageway and the front desk. Hard to believe that with over 200 rooms, they could not assign us to a better room (higher and/or lake view). It did not seem very busy, there was vacancy & I overheard others getting complimentary upgrades after me. 75k points redeemed were a waste. When I inquired, Tyler only offered a free drink at the bar. After asking about parking, only then did he offer to discount it by half. Why did I have to ask? Their treatment and response was disappointing overall.  Pros: The beds and linens were so soft and comfortable. The valet/bell hop guys
Manager Response: Dear jennifersI2400UF,  I am disappointed to hear about your negative experience with us. Our priority is providing excellent guest service and ensuring our guests leave feeling satisfied with their stay. We do strive to show our appreciation to our loyal Marriott Bonvoy members and as we are able to provide our guests with upgrades we do try to do so. Unfortunately, the availability was limited throughout your stay and although we were able to discount the parking and providing a beverage credit to your room, I understand the disappointment in not getting an upgrade. I sincerely apologize that you did not feel the appreciation that you should have and we fell short in providing the level of service that we strive to provide.  I certainly hope that we get a chance to welcome you back to our hotel in the future and we are able to leave you with a more accurate representation of the type of service that we have here at Avenue of the Arts. If you need anything else, please do let me know.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: This is a beautifully appointed hotel. The moment you enter the front doors, held by two doormen, you feel special. This hotel is peaceful, graceful and luxurious, all at a reasonable price point. The location, walking distance from South Coast Plaza is a huge plus as well.
Manager Response: Dear 4closin,  Thank you so much for taking the time to review your recent stay at our hotel! I am incredibly pleased to hear that everything about your visit was so fantastic. Hopefully we get a chance to welcome you back again soon. Please let us know if there is anything we can do for you.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: I cannot express enough my gratitude for the warmth and kindness this hotel gave me. My fathers memorial service was so sad for me, and all the staff were kind, compassionate and full of smiles.   Thank you Cassie for the upgraded room. Thank you Brandi for bar service and your smiles.   The bed was very comfortable and room nice with robes and lake view. Hotel was lovely and short drive to airport.   I can’t wait to come back here. ❤️
Manager Response: Dear Beachordie,  Thank you for your recent stay and for such a fantastic review of our property! I am so glad to hear that Cassie took such great care of you during the unfortunate circumstances of your visit. Hopefully we get a chance to welcome you back again soon. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: Excellent hotel; exceeded my expectations. Very professional and courteous staff who went above and beyond the call, offering to upgrade my room free of charge (perhaps because I am a Marriott Rewards member), opening the gift shop after it had closed so that my husband and I could get a snack, and providing me with an iPhone charger to use after I left mine at home (even though they also sold these in the gift shop). The food and bar were great, and the grounds are lovely with a nice walking path around a small lake. I will definitely be returning to stay again when I am in the area.
Manager Response: Dear agirlsgottado,  Thank you so much for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am incredibly pleased to hear our staff went above and beyond and made it an exceptional stay for you. This is exactly what we strive for. Hopefully we get the chance to welcome you back again soon. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: The beds are incredibly comfortable.  Requested a quiet room and was NOT disappointed.  Beautiful room too.  Woke up to a delicious breakfast/room service.  My lake view King room had wonderful amenities.  Very clean and so fresh.  I don't leave many reviews but just had to share.   Walked to South Coast Plaza and will be returning to this great hotel when I see a play at the Segerstrom  Center which is right across the street.  Just a wonderful stay!!!  Oh, and the staff is awesome!
Manager Response: Dear Debra_D3333,  Thank you for sharing this positive review with us, we sincerely appreciate you taking the time. We strive to provide excellent guest service and I am so happy to hear that this was reflected throughout your stay with us. We are looking forward to seeing you again for another stay. If you need anything at all, please do let us know.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: Was really excited to come here and booked months in advanced and was staying for 5 nights. First the good, the property is beautiful and the rooms are well decorated so 5 stars for that. When we first arrived everyone was nice but then went downhill. I upgraded to a room that included a terrace but shouldn't have because the people above us kept throwing stuff from above. Reported it to front desk to have it stop and they just said let us know when it happens again instead of going to stop it. They also asked for my ID instead of just my room number. The folks in front of me weren't asked for their IDs. Any other time I had a question my ID kept getting checked like I wasn't supposed to be there. What time is checkout doesn't need an ID. Minus two stars for the judging. Next
Manager Response: Dear bouncp,  I am disappointed to hear about your negative experience with us. Our goal is for every guest to leave Avenue of the Arts Hotel with their expectations exceeded and unfortunately, we were unsuccessful in your case. I completely understand the frustration in deciding to upgrade your room for more space and regretting that decision due to another guest being disrespectful and throwing things onto your patio. Our team did do our best in communicating with the guests above your room but unfortunately it can be difficult for us to locate where something like sand has come from. When we spoke at check-out I did agree that you did not get the value of upgrading your room and I am glad we were able to take care of those charges for your five-night stay.   After we spoke at the desk I did reach out to you via email, hoping to further discuss the rest of your experience. If you are able to respond I would love to speak with you about an opportunity to move forward. I am looking forward to hopefully speaking with you soon.   Kind regards, Emily Nall Front Office Supervisor

Summary: Hotwire a deal for 75 bucks for this hotel. When I went to pay for it I missed the $75 one but the price went up to $85, so with tax and all it was a little over 100. Since we  flying out the next day, we returned our rental car at 9 PM, had the shuttle driver from the hotel come pick us up from the rental car place, then went to sleep, woke up and the shuttle driver took us to the airport. Parking here is $26 a day. For what we paid for this hotel, I was very very impressed. The service was over-the-top exceptional.  They greeted us so warmly, and took care of us very promptly and professionally. The room we were assigned had a noisy partying going on next-door. We have no idea when the party would end and we are chickens when it comes to being disturbed asleep so we called
Manager Response: Dear clem_texas,  Thank you so much for taking the time to write such a nice review of your stay with us. I am sorry to hear that you experienced some noise from a neighbor, but I am glad that our staff was able to move you to a room that was more comfortable for you. It is our top priority to provide excellent guest service and ensure that all of our guests enjoy their time here, we appreciate you letting us know about the noise to giving us the opportunity to do something for you to fix it. We hope that we are able to welcome you back for another stay in the future, please do let us know if you need anything else.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: I have stayed here quarterly for the past four years  and have never been disappointed by the service. The atmosphere is great and so is my sleep.  The front desk personnel are full of good ideas about where to go near by, and are excellent at solving any issues that have arisen. Would highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear PeeDeeEx503,  We sincerely appreciate your loyalty to our hotel and thank you for taking the time to write about your previous stays with us. Our front desk team strives to create positive experiences for our guests and I am so happy to hear that has been consistently true throughout your stays here. We are looking forward to seeing you again. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary Heading: An artsy treat for the weary business traveler
Summary: This hotel is a treasure inside and out. Stylishly decorated, its true value is in its employees, who are ready to make your stay as easy and comfortable as possible.  From the moment I first walked in to the very end, Avenue of the Arts was a wonderful experience. Everyone greets with genuine smiles and asks you if you need anything. Then, when I needed water for my shake drinks - I was unfortunately on a shake fast during my stay - the front desk immediately gave me four bottles of water. The hotel also allowed me to check in early and select a later check-out for a minimal fee.  I stayed one night by myself and then my family joined me the next night. They enjoyed themselves as well, using the pool and the garden retreat. The property is expansive and allows for peaceful
Manager Response: Dear Genevieve_S,  WOW! Thank you so much for taking the time to review your recent stay with us! I think you perfectly highlighted all the great things our property has to offer. Hopefully we get a chance to welcome you back again soon. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: A remarkably lovely hotel.  It is spotless and feels clean everywhere!  The rooms have wood floors which if you suffer from allergies really makes a difference because there's much less dust with wood!  The bathroom could use a shelf and another hook, but outside of that it's great.  Love the details here, like the book light built right into the headboard!  The two downsides are: there really isn't a hotel type restaurant connected with this property.  There's a dinner type of a place next door.  The second thing is that the parking is to the side of the hotel and if it's raining you will get wet!  It's not very far but far enough to really get wet.  We will definitely come back. Also the staff just couldn't be nicer!!!1
Manager Response: Dear judysinger,  Thank you so much for sharing this positive experience that you had with us, we truly appreciate you for taking the time. I am glad to hear that you enjoyed our property's renovations and our staff enhanced your stay with us. Hopefully you are able to join us again for another stay. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: Wonderful and attractive property with great rooms and interesting artful decor.  Loved the vibe and the location was perfect for our visit.  The attitude and friendliness of the staff stood out to us and was so appreciated by two weary travelers!  Tyler and Cassie at the front desk went beyond expectations of accommodating us with sincere graciousness.  It's so refreshing to visit a property with outstanding staff all around who are happy and like what they are doing - that sets the tone for a positive guest experience!   We also enjoyed Samantha's service with a smile at breakfast.  Thank you all for a fantastic stay!
Manager Response: Dear GoogleUser78028,  Wow, thank you so much for sharing such a wonderful review! I am so glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay and our guest service stood out to you. We strive to create a comfortable environment for our guests and sincerely take pride in ensuring they have an enjoyable stay with us. I look forward to communicating with Cassie and Samantha about the experience that you shared. Hopefully we get the chance to welcome you back again for another stay. If I can assist you further in any way please let me know.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: This is one of the best hotels I have stayed at. The rooms are well-kept, bright and spacious, with elegant contemporary furnishings. The view from our room is lovely with a fountain, pond and landscapes walk.  There are nice touches such as phone chargers in every room. The restaurant has a very pleasant patio with fireplaces to sit around. The staff too have been lovely -helpful and accommodating. The area around the hotel is also very nice with theaters and concert halls, and the location is not at all far from the airport. The price for this hotel is amazingly low for the quality of the hotel - this is the best value for money I have ever had. Thank you for a very pleasant and relaxing stay!!!
Manager Response: Dear Delna_13,  Wow! Thank you for such an incredible review and for your recent stay at our property. I am so pleased to hear you enjoyed all of the amenities our hotel has to offer. We love our new fireplaces out on the Silver Trumpet patio too. Hopefully we get a chance to welcome you back again soon. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: This is a very comfortable, upscale hotel located conveniently in the arts area in Costa Mesa, close to South Coast mall and theaters. The restaurant is worth a trip by itself. The decor is very modern, with good amenities. The staff are very friendly and supportive.
Manager Response: Dear rudolphh62,  Thank you so much for such a fantastic review and for your recent stay with us! I am so glad to hear you enjoyed the Silver Trumpet and the decor of our hotel. Hopefully we get a chance to host you again soon! Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: This is a really very good hotel which is beautifully decorated and very stylish.  Rooms are a good size - bed and sofa and have a balcony overlooking the lovely landscaped gardens.  Beds are very comfortable, good linens and the Wi-Fi was very strong. The pool is small but heated and there always seemed to be plenty of space around it.  Breakfast in the hotel was excellent.  Staff in all areas were friendly and considerate.
Manager Response: Dear Amanda-Cheltenham,  Thank you for taking the time to share such positive feedback! I am so glad to hear that you enjoyed our property and were able to take advantage of some of the amenities that we have here for our guests. Hopefully we are able to welcome you back to our hotel for another stay. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: My daughter recently got married at the Avenue of the Arts hotel. The venue was absolutely beautiful.  All of our guests loved it,  from facility to dining to services,  they were all exceptional. The bridal suite has a beautiful Lakeview and other rooms were also great. Thank you to all the hotel's staff who made my daughter's wedding so flawless and fun.
Manager Response: Dear MargaretCA,  Wow, what a great compliment! Thank you so much for taking the time to share this with us. We value getting to help create experiences with our guests, and thank you and your family for allowing us to contribute to this special event. I am so glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay, and the wedding. Hopefully we are able to welcome you back to stay with us again in the future. Please let us know if you need anything else at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: The service is amazing! Very friendly staff ever corner you turn. The rooms are nice and updated plus it's dog friendly! (BONUS). Our group of friends really enjoyed the grounds for a wedding weekend and had a nice meal at the silver trumpet as well. Tyler was great to our group and really went over the top to make our stay an amazing one. I would recommend! Walking distance to south coast plaza and really close to John Wayne airport :D
Manager Response: Dear parpenguin72,  Thank you so much for sharing your recent experience with us. We strive to provide exceptional guest service and sincerely appreciate the opportunity of getting to help make these special days even more memorable. I am so glad to hear that our staff treated you well and added to your weekend. Hopefully we are able to welcome you back again soon. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: Stylish hotel sat in lovely landscaped grounds (the whole area around the hotel was beautifully landscaped) very close to the visually exciting Segerstrom Centre for the Arts and the mega South Coast Plaza Mall with a myriad of shops and restaurants.    Check in was swift and efficient and we were in our spacious room in minutes of arriving.  Smart decor, comfy beds with quality linens, large elegant bathroom with good towels and toiletries, it was a shame it was only an overnight stop!  Hotel was busy with a large wedding but we never felt neglected and every staff member we crossed was cheery and friendly.  Room was quiet and wifi worked seamlessly for our needs.   Silver Trumpet restaurant on the property gave a good breakfast with friendly service and a nice decor.
Manager Response: Dear Whinbrook,  Thank you so much for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. We take pride in trying to create great guest experiences for everyone that stays at our hotel and I am so glad to hear that you enjoyed your time here. Hopefully we are able to welcome you back to stay with us again soon for a longer stay.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: I stay at this hotel every time I'm in Costa Mesa for work, and I always have a good experience. Its close to John Wayne airport, the hotels are nice and spacious, the toiletries are great, and the hotel staff is helpful. The gym isn't huge, but it's good enough. The breakfast (room service) is great too.
Manager Response: Dear MarciaTop,  Thank you for your continued loyalty and for your review of your recent stay. I am so pleased to hear you always have a good experience with us. This is exactly what we strive for! We'll see you again soon! Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary Heading: Wish I could have rated higher!
Summary: The hotel is very aesthetically pleasing.  Very nice decor and vibe.  The location is great as well.  Very convenient to restaurants, shopping, theater, freeway, etc.  Bryant who worked the front desk was very pleasant and helpful, as were most of the staff.  They allowed me to check in 30 min early and to check out an hour later.  I ordered an omelette for breakfast that was delicious.  I upgraded from a regular room with a water view to a junior suite with a water view.  The actual room was worth the upgrade as the added space and layout was very nice.  I think the $26 a day to self-park is ridiculous, but it's the "gouging world" we now live in.  My biggest gripe was I asked for a room with a water view and my room overlooked the dog park, top of the parking lot and property
Manager Response: Dear KShelLosAngeles_CA,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. We wished you could have rated it higher also! I am glad to hear you had a pleasant experience but disappointed to hear about your check out. We definitely don't want you leaving us with a bad taste in your mouth. I have also reached out to you in an email to discuss further. Hopefully we get a chance to welcome you back. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: We recently spent 4 nights at this beautiful hotel.  We can not recommend this hotel enough. The staff are attentive and charming. The rooms immaculate and comfortable. The restaurant serves great food and the bar is stunning There are many outdoor lounging areas with fire pits and room service available  We love this hotel
Manager Response: Dear sks54,  Thanks so much for staying with us! I am incredibly pleased to hear everything including the staff were great. This is exactly what we strive for! Hopefully, we get a chance to welcome you back again soon. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: had to stay here when there was a flood in our apartment. staff was great and helpful and the location is close to so much! overall enjoyed our stay here. I would highly recommend to someone visiting from out of town since it is walking distance to south coast plaza.
Manager Response: Dear Loreeve,  Thank you so much for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. Although the circumstances were unfortunate, I'm glad you got the chance to stay with us and had a pleasant experience. Hopefully we get a chance to welcome you back again soon. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: The staff is awesome; they can't do enough to please their guests.  My business team and I have stayed here on several occasions in the past 9 months and I would highly recommend this hotel for both business and pleasure.  Tyler; the Front Office Manager has quite the team together. Brayan at the front desk always greets you with a smile; Cassie at the front desk always remembers your name with a smile, Evan and Emily the supervisors always want to help out with whatever you may need.  I am so happy to see that Eric has been promoted to the Valet Manager as he has a smile that welcomes you like crazy when you arrive!  I recommend this hotel for both business and pleasure as stated and encourage you to ask for what you need to make your experience the best as they will not
Manager Response: Dear Maurele L,  Thank you so much for coming back and staying and for such a great review! I am so pleased to hear all of the staff took such good care of you. They will really good knowing they were recognized. Cant wait to have you stay with us again. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: First time in this brand, not first time with MARRIOTT, but the service in this hotel has been so good! The hotel is pretty modern and stylish so I loved that. Shout out to the FD team that helped me with some requests for my birthday, and James at the Silver Trumpet restaurant for his exceptional service, he was great..!!!
Manager Response: Dear DarwinJ,  Thanks so much for such a fantastic review! I am incredibly pleased to hear you enjoyed our boutique brand and feel. I will pass along the good words to James and the front desk staff that assisted you. They will be happy to know their hard work is appreciated. Hopefully we get a chance to welcome you back again soon. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: I had such a wonderful experience this past weekend at the Avenue of the arts hotel. I was in town for a work convention. I Was pleasantly surprised again on how amazing the front desk staff was. From check in to check out.  They were super friendly and helpful. My room was very clean and comfortable. I’ve stayed before and will definitely be staying again in the future.
Manager Response: Dear _bicakav,  Thank you so much for taking the time to review your recent stay with us! I am so pleased to hear the staff was so friendly and check in and out were such a breeze! Hopefully we get a chance to host you again soon. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: We had a wonderful room with a view of the pool and lake.  The room was stylish and comfortable.  The staff was friendly and eager to assist at all times.  The workout room was clean and had ample equipment.  We also had drinks and appetizers at the hotels bar; the calamari was perfectly crisp on the outside and tender inside.  The hotel is right across the street from the Segerstrom Center which is an added bonus.  I will definitely be staying at this hotel again!!!!!
Manager Response: Dear Lovetotravel10121968,  Thank you so much for taking the time to review your recent stay with us! What a great overview! We also love the calamari. Glad you got to enjoy. Hopefully we get a chance to host you again soon. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary Heading: DO NOT BOOK HERE - THEY MAY NOT HAVE A ROOM FOR YOU EVEN IF YOU'VE PAID ALREADY
Summary: NEVER EVER CHOOSE THIS HOTEL.  I booked an Executive Suite (the most expensive suite) with this hotel OVER A MONTH in advance for my wedding night, paid upfront, and checked a couple days before the wedding to make sure everything was set and they knew it would be our wedding night.   THE NIGHT OF OUR WEDDING (1:30AM) WE GET THERE AND THEY TELL ME THEY CANT ACCOMMODATE US DUE TO AN “ENGINEERING PROBLEM” AND THAT THEY TRIED TO CALL ME AT 8:30PM...AS IN DURING MY CEREMONY.  THE WORST CUSTOMER SERVICE. We waited in the lobby, in full gown and suit, for 30 minutes before they gave us the option of being shuttled off to another hotel, when I asked for a refund they claimed they never charged me, WHICH IS ALSO INCORRECT.  The following day two “managers” tried to call me and wasted
Manager Response: Dear hollyjul,   Thank you for taking the time to review your pre-arrival experience with us. We are sincerely sorry for your experience and we completely understand your frustrations. Our goal is for every guest to leave Avenue of the Arts Hotel with their expectations exceeded, and unfortunately we were unsuccessful on a very important day for you.   In this situation, we had an unexpected engineering issue in the room that could not be remedied and made the room unsellable.  We did our very best to attempt and contact you before you arrived and had found alternate accommodations for you which you denied. To clarify, you were not charged for this booking nor was it prepaid.   Regardless of the circumstance at hand, we recognize that it is our responsibility to make things perfect on special days like this, and we are very sorry for failing you.   Warm Regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: I have stayed at several of the hotels in the Costa Mesa area, and the Ave of the Arts is by far the nicest.  While the bathrooms could use a refresh the bedrooms and decor are modern and very comfortable.  The beds and pillows are amazing and could rival any high end hotel.  The fitness room is small but clean, and offers water bottles and fresh fruit.
Manager Response: Dear AJR2000,  Thank you so much for such a great review of our property! It is a great honor that you feel we are the best in the area! Hopefully we get a chance to welcome you back again soon. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary Heading: Beautiful Hotel.  Wonderful Service.  Fantastic Location.
Summary: 10 out of 10.  Suite was exactly what we needed for our 2 night stay over Spring Break.  Gorgeous lobby.  My wife loved all the details in the decorations, especially the living wall out front by the valet.  Fruit and cheese plate greeted us in our room upon arrival.  Our 6th floor room had a balcony overlooking the plaza and fountains.  Bed was extremely comfortable.  Staff was beyond friendly and hospitable.  Thanks you Avenue of the Arts Hotel, we will absolutely be returning!
Manager Response: Dear TheM8rix,  Excellent review! Thank you for taking the time to provide a great depiction of our property and staff. We hope that you will come and join us again soon. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary Heading: Friendship, Food, Fun and Fabulous Service!!!
Summary: My BFF Vicki and I spent seven nights at the Avenue of the Arts Portfolio Hotel and it’s customer service and hospitality were beyond exceptional.    Upon arrival we were picked up at John Wayne airport and driven to one of the most beautiful and hospitable hotels I’ve ever been so privileged to call home for a week.    From the drivers to the greeters to the front desk staff to housekeeping and outstanding service at the Silver Trumpet we experienced only excellence in customer care.  Our hearts were thrilled to see the Garden Retreat, Workout Room, and our awesome backyard patio.  Our stay at the Avenue of the Arts will be forever embedded in our travel memories.  I offer a sincere THANKS to the entire staff for exhibiting beyond excellence in meeting the needs of each guest.
Manager Response: Dear Only1Cli,  Thank you for such a fantastic review of your stay with us and our property! You provided a perfect description of what we want every guest to experience here with us! Hopefully we get a chance to welcome you back again soon. Please let us know if you need anything at all.    Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: First thoughts as we pulled up was WOW! Glam, from the purple and gold décor to the koi pond and fountain as you take the glass encased hallway to the elevator. The resort is a gem, having an elegance to it. Once inside of the room it was very fresh with crisp white linen, plush towels and smelled amazing. I literally have no complaints. The balcony view is another plus with the ducks and turtles it felts so relaxing and calm. The front desk customer service was on point, friendly, welcoming and accommodating giving us suggestions on nearby restaurants and shops. The valet staff were quick and always available. Thank you for making our stay so enjoyable, we will highly recommend and be returning soon. Thanks
Manager Response: Dear mariahh0888,  Wow! Thank you for such an incredible review! I am so glad to hear you had a such a fantastic stay with us. This is exactly what we love to hear! Hopefully we get a chance to welcome you back again soon. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: Our hotel room number was 607. Loved the convenience to the theater and shopping. Hotel was clean but a little dated. It was quiet and the staff was phantasbulous.  The reason for the three rating is because of our bathroom sink had a repeated Odeur, a terrible funk emanating from the drain. There were gnats flying formation over the sink doing touch and go landings on my head. Brushing my teeth and swatting gnats doesn’t please me. Overall it was a pleasant stay and we will come back. Please have maintenance change the catch in the drain pipe under the sink.
Manager Response: Dear AirForceHeavyLifter,  I am pleased to hear you thought our staff was wonderful and location of the hotel was perfect for your needs. However, I do apologize for the drain issue in your room. I have alerted our maintenance team to the issue to have it resolved in short order. Please let me know the next time you will be staying, as we will be looking forward to hosting you again!  Regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: First time stay. Great location near shopping, restaurants, and John Wayne airport. Staff were extremely personable and helpful were not fake or pushy. Décor throughout the entire hotel was superb! Room was very well done. High quality furniture. Nice shower. Super comfy bed. Will definitley recommend and stay again!
Manager Response: Dear melissamo89,  Thank you so much for such a fantastic review! I am incredibly pleased to hear you had such a great time at our property and the staff were so helpful Hopefully we get a chance to welcome you back again soon. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: The moment my friends and I arrived we felt so welcomed by the staff and their management team! In addition to great staff and clean up-kept rooms,the located was perfect for shopping and dinning out. Keep up the great work, I will definitely be returning.
Manager Response: Dear leanB0126,  Thanks so much for such an excellent review of our property! I am so pleased to hear you and your friends had such a great stay with us. This is exactly what we strive for! Please let us know if you need anything at all. We look forward to seeing you again soon.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary Heading: One of my best vacation experiences!!
Summary: Highly recommend the Ave of the Arts! My friends and I had a couples retreat this past February and the staff impressed me by going above and beyond what was required of them! it couldn’t help but make a great impression on us!! We all felt like family!! We’ll definitely be returning soon!!! Thankyou so much to the staff at Ave of the Arts Costa Mesa!!!
Manager Response: Dear Ktchinen.  Thank you so much for taking the time to review your recent stay with us! I am so pleased to hear our staff went above and beyond to assist you! Hopefully we get a chance to host you again soon. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: We had such an incredible stay at this hotel. From the minute we pulled up we received nothing short of amazing hospitality.   The valet that helped us unload our bags welcomed us to the hotel and at check-in the agent helped us get into a beautiful room early, which we were not expecting. We stayed on the gardenside and the room location was perfect. It was quiet and serene, with lots of trees off of the balcony. I definitely forgot that I was 10 minutes from the airport.   We utilized the shuttle one night to take us to dinner at The Camp, and the other night we walked. There are so many local restaurants that are of different cuisines and so good. The shuttle service was really convenient as well.   My boyfriend and I like to workout, even while on a trip, and the gym was
Manager Response: Dear worldtravelersco,  Wow! What an excellent review! Thank you for taking the time to provide the specifics of your stay and of the surrounding area. I am so pleased to hear everything was perfect and the property had everything that you needed. Hopefully we get a chance to host you again soon. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Other reviews have posted about many guests getting their cars broken into.....stay away and choose a safer property!!
Manager Response: Dear EXBusinessTraveler,  As a team, we are very sorry to hear about your son's stolen item. Our goal is for every guest to leave Avenue of the Arts Hotel with their expectations exceeded, and unfortunately we were unsuccessful in your case.   To clarify, we are very diligent in ensuring that our property is as safe as possible. In this case, someone came across an $2000 remote control car completely unattended on the floor of a parking garage, and saw it as an opportunity.   As you stated in the beginning of your review, you stayed here based on the reviews you had read. Our property has maintained strong reviews with a consistent effort focused on guest satisfaction and safety. We will continue to stay dedicated to this mission and use this experience to strengthen our team.   Warm Regards,  Richard Ferber Operations Manager

When you drive into their circular entrance you forget you're in the middle of Irvine.  Serene environment, decor, water features.  Nice open lobby with contemporary furniture.  Great room that doesn't feel like you're in a hotel.  Nice view of astroturf center open area for meetings or dining (had lunch there, great shade from trees, again forget you're in the middle of Irvine).  Gym was nice.  Small but I was only one of 2 or 3 there (early AM).  Had view of center lake/walking path.  Nice gift shop which was like a small coffee shop with grab-and-go breakfast (cheaper and lighter on the calories).  Hotel shuttle very helpful in getting to and from company headquarters
