Manager Response: Dear Tracy,  Thank you for taking the time to review your experience with our property. I am very glad to hear that you enjoyed the convenience of our location and the food at the restaurant. We look forward to hosting you again the next time you want to get away!  Regards,  Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary Heading: Beautiful, Relaxing Treasure with Amazing Staff
Summary: The staff was the best. We felt important and cared for the minute we drove up. It felt like a luxury hotel in every aspect. It is beautiful, relaxing, everything is easy to get to, room service was great, fast and the food excellent. I was most impressed with the staff and the level of care we received.  We have already planned to stay the next time we are in town.
Manager Response: Dear Tami,  Thank you for sharing your experience with us. I'm very pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay and we truly appreciate the praise. It was an honor hosting you and we look forward to seeing you again.  Regards,  Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: Stayed on points to celebrate NYE 2018, stayed in the junior suite 6th (top) floor.  The room was clean and spacious, nice balcony view of the lake, comfortable living area, both living and bedroom had huge HD TVs.  Very comfortable bed, nice staff.  Would definitely come back!  Silver Trumpet bar was fun with Pre-NYE champagne and the restaurant looked nice but didn't eat there.
Manager Response: Dear bonesting69,  Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review of your stay. I'm glad to hear you enjoyed your suite and got to check out the Silver Trumpet Bar too. We hope to see you again soon and Happy New Year!  Regards,  Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary Heading: Two day stay at Avenue of the Arts Costa Mesa, a Tribute Portfolio Hotel
Summary: Recently my wife and I stayed at this hotel for tow nights. The room was quite large and well appointed over looking the lake. Parking in the adjacent garage is either valet or self parking, the latter is $25 per day. Personnel at the hotel were very friendly. There is a bar and restaurant on premises although we dined else where on this trip.
Manager Response: Dear Edward C,  Thank you so much for taking the time to review our hotel and for your recent stay with us. I am very pleased to hear you found our rooms and property so suitable to your needs and that the staff were so friendly! Hopefully we get a chance to welcome you back again soon. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary Heading: Wow!! In love with this hotel!!
Summary: It was a short stay! 2 nights only, but really a nice time! We came all way down from Brazil , 13 Hours Flight! We arrrived at hotel 10:30am, early for check in time, but Julea provided us a room immediately! 5 Th floor, Great view, Great decoration! I requested  a blanket and a package that I have ordered and both were provided in 5 minutes! Amazing staff, Great location!!Excellent stay!!
Manager Response: Dear Liylly,  Thank you so much for such an excellent review of our property. I can imagine coming to the hotel after such a long day was relieving to be able to get into a room right away. I am so pleased we were able to accommodate that. Hopefully we get a chance to welcome you back next time you're in the area. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: From start to finish our stay was 10 stars. Upon arrival the staff helped us with our luggage and opened car doors. The hotel its self was beautiful. Our rooms where spacious and decorated so pretty. The biggest rave is the staff the front door staff was busting butt to help you out of your car or with anything. Greeted by front desk staff by name upon entering. Daniel was one of our favorites. He took us up to CVS so we did not have to walk. Francisco was amazing as well. He went and brought us waters and was so friendly when he brought us our breakfast. He helped start our day off right. We would definitely recommend this great hotel to anyone!!!!!!
Manager Response: Dear Tessa S,  Wow! Thank you for such a fantastic review and for your recent stay at our hotel! I am so glad that all of our staff went above and beyond to make it a memorable experience. I will be sure to recognize all of the staff you mentioned. Hopefully we get a chance to have you back with us again soon. Please let us know if you need anything at all.  You are royalty!   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary Heading: A very nice property in a great location
Summary: The entire hotel was wonderful, from the lobby to the rooms.  The staff was exceptional and the overall experience perfect.  When I arrived it was raining out and I forgot my rain coat.  I was immediately greeted by the bell man who handed me an umbrella.  When I got to the front desk they saw that I wasn't prepared for Southern California weather to be cold and raining.  They told me to use the umbrella while I was here and insisted on upgrading my room to make my stay more pleasurable.
Manager Response: Dear kevinpellegrin0,  Thank you so much for taking the time to review you recent stay at our property. I am incredibly pleased to hear you had such a fantastic stay with us! Especially on rainy days like the ones we had, we try to elevate our service so all of our guest are most comfortable in uncomfortable weather. Hopefully we get the chance to welcome you back again soon. Please let us know if there is anything we can do for you.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: The hotel was posh and very well decorated. The room was spacious and comfortable. The washroom was clean with complimentary toiletries. Staff were helpful and efficient. There is also a restaurant and bar next to it.
Manager Response: Dear kingmondovino,  Thank you for taking the time to review your stay with us! I am glad to hear that you enjoyed the spaciousness of your room and our staff was helpful and efficient. We strive to provide excellent customer service and appreciate all of your feedback. We hope that we are able to welcome you back to our hotel in the future, please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: I loved it here. I was given a room on the water side.   The view was of the lake/pond? It was very pretty and can be seen from the bed . Waking up in the morning to  sunshine ,ponds ,flowering trees is a nice way to start your day. The decor is chic, modern, hip. Room was very clean . I should mention that I have stayed there several times and this was the first room I have had with this style of decor and this view so be sure to ask for a remodeled room with a view if that matters to you. Location is excellent for shopping , fwy access, theater arts , food . They have a pretty garden seating area that my little girl enjoyed  playing and exploring in. It was large enough to keep her interest and small enough to see her from the seating area. A  room with that for a view would
Manager Response: Dear s t,  We appreciate you being a returning guest and taking the time to review your most recent stay at our hotel! I am happy to hear that you enjoyed your room and you were able to take advantage of everything our local area has to offer. We hope that we are able to welcome you back in the future for another stay. Thank you for your continued loyalty and please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary Heading: Modern vibe, good for business stay
Summary: This feels like a small boutique hotel when you enter the check in area,   mostly because its layout on is not like most big name hotels. We noticed  how quiet the hotel was at every level, in the hallways, in the lobby, in our room.  Very easy access to shopping, Orange County's performance theatre/music complex,  and restaurants. Rooms are large and sleek with hardwood floors and plenty of  mirrors with good lighting. Staff are attentive and professional. High price of self -parking was the only part of our stay that was a negative.
Manager Response: Dear vinotour,  Thank you for taking the time to review your experience and for your recent stay with us! I am so glad to hear you had an all around great stay and the staff were so attentive to your needs. Hopefully we get a chance to welcome you back again soon. Please let us know if there is anything we can do for you.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: I have stayed at this hotel on multiple occasions. The entire staff was friendly, enthusiastic and really cared about my experience at their hotel. The rooms were very comfortable and had everything I needed. Great place to stay!
Manager Response: Dear Shelsea B,  Thank you so much for taking the time to review your stay at our hotel! I am so pleased to hear all staff you encountered were so accommdating and our rooms were so comfortable. Hopefully we get the chance to welcome you back again soon. Thank you for your continued loyalty and please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: The staff is extremely friendly and helpful.  Rooms are modern and comfortable.  The bar and restaurant are above average.  You are in walking distance to great shopping and restaurants. I stay there every visit to Costa Mesa.
Manager Response: Dear dgorfox,  Thank you so much for your review and for your recent stay at our property! We really appreciate your continued loyalty and we look forward to seeing you again in the near future. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: I spend the equivalent of between 2-3 months-a-year in hotels, mostly Marriotts and get to experience most of their brands with varied experiences.  This week, I stayed at a Tribute Hotel- Avenue of the Arts (a Marriott brand I had not heard of) a block from the South Coast Plaza, and was very surprised.  It is a boutique-ish hotel very close to everything.  It doesn't look or feel like a typical Marriott brand.  It is cute and stylish, clean and "artsy".  What I appreciated most of all was the amazing customer service from the time I arrived right through my departure.  I had also chatted with them the night before through the Marriott app to discuss rooms and arrival time and they were very polite and accommodating!  Whoever trains and leads these customer service folks is
Manager Response: Dear Rick H,  Thank you so much for taking the time to review your recent stay with us! I am incredibly pleased to hear how well your stay went from start to finish. This is exactly what we strive for. I hope we get a chance to welcome you back again soon. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary Heading: A design hotel in the art community in Costa Mesa
Summary: he best hotel during my 20 days trip in USA. The lobby and public areas are well designed with modern art style. Guest room is very spacious and the bed is so comfortable. All my friend were reluctant to leave upon check-out.
Manager Response: Dear shuyajing,  Thank you so much for such a great review of our hotel! I am honored to hear we were your favorite hotel during your trip. This is exactly the thing we enjoy hearing! Please come back and see us again soon. Let us know if there is anything we can do for you.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: Stayed here just one night on a recent work trip where I flew into Orange County.  Airport shuttle arrived 15 minutes after I called from the airport, and getting to the airport next morning was no problem at all.  Staff was very attentive.  The property is a marvel, very clean and modern.  My room was great, very clean, very nice bathroom with a tub.  The Keurig coffee maker had 4 regular coffee pods, this made my day.  Not the usual 2 regular and 2 decaf.  My only negative from this stay was very low water pressure in the shower.  Could use a little less restrictor as showering took a very long time.
Manager Response: Dear reidara2017,  Thank you so much for taking the time to review your recent stay at our property.I am so pleased to hear your stayed was better than expected. We aim to wow everyday and I hope you come and stay with us again soon so we can do it again! Please let us know if there is anything we can do for you.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary Heading: Now recognized as the TOP RATED HOTEL
Summary: Incredible and perfect in every way!  1) Best staff of any business I know. The reason this place excels! 2) Very comfortable rooms, great bedding, large bath 3) Location near South Coast Plaza with plenty of nice restaurants all within walking distance. 4) Nice walking path around large lake.
Manager Response: Dear remotetravel,  Thank you so much for taking the time to review our property. We want to thank you so much for your loyalty to us and for always being an incredible guest! We really appreciate it. Hopefully we'll be seeing you again soon. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary Heading: Overall a good hotel but valet messed up my car.
Summary: Overall I enjoyed the hotel and staff is great. Clean and great location. My only issue is I had a very expensive car rental and their valet ended up damaging the bumper. I then had to return the car earlier which cost me a rental day of the car. My suggestion is to not use their valet ever.
Manager Response: Dear ingapore,    Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback of your recent stay with us. I am glad to hear that you enjoyed our property and you had good experiences with our staff, we strive to provide excellent guest service. I apologize about the incident with your rental car, I completely understand the inconvenience of the situation. Unfortunately, accidents happen and we handle them as best as we can when they do. We hope that we are able to welcome you back in the future, please let us know if you need anything at all.  Kind regards, Tyler Branham  Front Desk Manager

Summary: Coolish hotel with very trendy staff and decorations.  However, clearly a make over of an older hotel.  Resulted in an amazingly small, awkward micro-closet given the cost and size of the rest of the space.  Bathroom also had some old fashioned idiosyncrasies on lighting and ventilation.  Overall, a decent hotel and I'd stay again.  But more of a romantic hotel than a place to take the family too, so I wouldn't bring the family and a bunch of bags and expect a place to put them.
Manager Response: Dear GermaineRobin,  Thank you for providing us with feedback of your recent stay at our hotel. A full renovation of our hotel was completed about two years ago, I am glad to hear that you enjoyed the new style and decor. I am sorry that there was not enough space for you in the room that you stayed in. Unfortunately, all of our rooms do have the same sized bathroom, but potentially one of our larger suites would better accommodate you in the future with more space to put your luggage. We hope that we are able to welcome you again, please let us know if you need anything at all.  Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: Just got back from a three night stay here. If you are looking for sleep, stay elsewhere.   We checked in on Friday night. Our neighbors kept banging doors, shouting at all hours of the night. This could happen anywhere and I don't blame the hotel at all for this first night. We asked to be relocated. The staff first tried to relocate us to a dark and dingy room with a view of what I would call a maintenance area. Hindsight being 20/20, I probably should have accepted this room. Instead, we were moved to room 645 which is a junior suite with great views of the lake close to the Silver Trumpet restaurant. This was our downfall. There was a beautiful wedding ceremony that night. Unfortunately for us, they were partying well past 1:00 am. All we could hear was the thumping bass of
Manager Response: Dear hawkdss,  Thank you for taking the time to share feedback of your recent stay with us. Our goal is to provide and peaceful and relaxing environment for our guests and I am really disappointed to hear that you weren't able to have that experience here with us. It is true that we are not able to control the behavior of other people, and I appreciate your understanding of the issues with your neighboring room the first night, but I am sorry that the stay did not improve from there. We enjoy hosting events at our property, but it should never come at the expense of disrupting other guests in the hotel. I would like to further discuss your experiences with us and see what we can do to move forward, I have reached out to you privately.  Kind regards,  Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: Stayed here for one night for a wedding to be happening in Newport Beach. The hotel was walking distance from a few restaurant (Mastro's, TGIF, and it has its own restaurant and bar) and the South Coast Plaza mall. We had a great time staying as the room is pretty big and we got the balcony room so it overlooked the park and the lake.
Manager Response: Dear AnaHappyAllTheTime,  Thank you so much for staying with us, and taking the time to give us feedback regarding your recent stay. I am glad to hear that you enjoyed our renovated rooms and that you were able to take advantage of the mall and restaurants around our hotel. Hopefully we get a chance to welcome you back in the future. Please let us know if you need anything at all.  Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: We recently stayed at this beautiful hotel. It's located in a very nice area and we enjoyed the amenities provided. The rooms were really clean and decorated in such a lovely and modern way. We loved staying here and will be back when we're in California!
Manager Response: Dear Andrea C,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us for your recent visit to California, and taking the time to give us your feedback. I am glad to hear that you enjoyed the room decor and the local area. We hope that you are able to stay with us again soon for another California trip. Please let us know if you need anything at all.  Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: The décor of this hotel is hideous!  Purple, velvet, zebra print, alice in wonderland style chairs... absolutely horrendous-  But rooms are spacious, location is nice and staff is friendly.  Parking is too pricey for the area-  Cant get over how ugly the décor is-  I find it unreal that a Tribute Portfolio can have such terrible taste in design.
Manager Response: Dear TravelsLisa,  Thanks so much for taking the time to provide a candid review of your stay with us. I am so pleased to hear you found our rooms spacious and the staff to be friendly. In terms of decor, our style is quite eclectic so I suppose it is a matter of preference. As for parking, our prices are in line, if not below other hotels in the surrounding area. Hopefully we get a chance to welcome you back again soon. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: AWESOME hotel!!!  This was our second stay at this lovely boutique hotel.  Far above any other hotel we've ever stayed at before.  No detail left undone.  From the staff to the luxurious room, to the food...it was all a 5+ Star rating for us and our friends.  If you've never stayed here before, trust me, you won't be disappointed.  We are looking forward to our stay here next year.
Manager Response: Dear Martha H,  Thank you so much for taking the time to review your recent stay with us here at Avenue of the Arts Hotel! I am so glad we were able host your friends trip weekend! Hopefully we get a chance to welcome you back soon. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: It’s the little things that make your experience a good one and keep you coming back.   Pretty dissapointed to find out that i couldnt get access to an item i left in my room that ended up in lost in found. I was on my way to the airport when i realized i forgot something at the hotel. I was told by the rude girl at the front desk at 3am on friday october the 12th that housekeeping leaves with the keys and NO ONE ELSE has access to the lost and found and they dont come in till 9am so my only choice is to pay and have it shipped to me.   I asked why they didn’t just call and let me know it was left behind and was told the hotel « doesn’t do that ».   Thanks guys,
Manager Response: Dear Safari738988,  Thank you for taking the time to provided a candid review of your telephone interaction with our staff. I sincerely apologize we were unable to get your lost & found item back to you when you were close by. As a policy, only our housekeeping managers have access to lost and found items during the time that they are here. We limit access as many guest's valuables are in this location and we keep it as secure as possible. I'm glad we were able to ship your item to you complimentary. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: My husband and I stayed at this hotel the night before our wedding. We had 2 executive suites on the 5th floor (there are 6 floors total).   We chose this hotel because it's beautifully designed, modern, the staff is over the top amazing, and it was perfect for photos. There are a few locations nearby for photos, which made our wedding day that much better!   I highly recommend this hotel if you enjoy nice decor, friendly hotel staff, and a place to stay in the Costa Mesa area!
Manager Response: Dear moniquenguyen_92,  Thank you so much for providing such a excellent review of our property. I am so pleased we were able to host your prewedding celebration! I'm glad we were able to be apart of that and make it special for you. Hopefully we get a chance to welcome you back again soon. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: The Hotel staff was very helpful and kind. The room was clean and roomy with a wonderful view from our balcony. The bar was convenient to sit and watch the Dodger game before our night out. The room service was delicious and service was prompt.
Manager Response: Dear Freddie G,  Thank you so much for such a great review and for your recent stay at our property! I am so pleased to hear you had such a great time with us and the room had everything you needed. Hopefully we get a chance to welcome you back again soon. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: The hotel is really awesome. It's a boutique hotel, really fancy, well decorated, with great service and helpful staff. The Silver Trumpet restaurant has delicious food options (for breakfast and other meals). Neighborhood is great (lots of near restaurants, parks and stores). It was an amazing experience.
Manager Response: Dear SergioMorilo,  Thank you so much for such a great review and for your recent stay at our property. I am so pleased to hear you had such a great time with us. Hopefully we get a chance to welcome you back again soon. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary Heading: Worst Tribute Portfolio hotel I've ever been to
Summary: I'm a lifetime Platinum Marriott member, so I've stayed at quite a few hotels for work and this hotel is simply not good. It's a pig with lipstick on it. You can tell it was a dated/cheaper hotel that was bought and upgraded cheaply.   The facilities are old, but they tried to make it feel trendy with cool furnishings. The lobby definitely isn't lively. The staff is nice, but does not follow though on requests. They're always at the front door to hold the door open and greet you with a smile, but the hotel just isn't that nice. The parking is way overpriced, but they have you captive, so they charge $25/night. The gym is small, but adequate. The front desk is never accommodating if you need to check in early.   Multiple other business travelers and myself agreed we'll never stay
Manager Response: Dear ee978,  Thank you for taking the time to provide a candid review of your stay at our property. I am quite disappointed to hear you had such a poor experience with us. In terms of early check ins, if we have a room available, we will almost always grant access. However, this is based upon availability. Also, our parking prices are lower than most hotels in our surrounding area. Hopefully we get a chance to welcome you back so we can show you a better experience. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: We had the pleasure of staying at Avenue of the Arts for our wedding weekend.  I mostly worked with Daniel by phone as well as in person with all our needs for the weekend.  Daniel has excellent customer service!  I called to request room preferences in advance he was able to search/accommodate.  Our executive suite had keycard parking lot access and we were able to get all our cars (including our photographer and videographer).  Suites were well kept and modern.  We were also able to do a photoshoot inside our rooms with awesome views.  Overall highly recommend Avenue of the Arts, especially Daniel at the front desk.
Manager Response: Dear Eric126TA,  Thank you so much for taking the time to provide such an excellent review and for your recent stay with us!I am so pleased to hear you had a such a great experience and all of our staff were so friendly. This is exactly what we strive for everyday. Hopefully we get a chance to welcome you back again soon. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: Stayed here for a night on a visit to explore the area and was very pleasantly surprised by this little gem. It's kind of tucked away so you don't really notice it's there. However, the place is full of personality! The colors are vibrant and the decor is fun. Rooms are pretty standard but very nice. The area isn't necessarily walkable; there's stuff in the area but you might want a car if you aren't trying to log 20,000 steps that day. We got drinks at the bar, which were great, service was excellent, food was so-so. I wouldn't hesitate to stay again.
Manager Response: Dear strudel01,  Thank you so much for your review and for your recent stay at our property. I am so glad to hear you enjoyed our vibrant eclectic decor and had a good time even if it was for just the evening! Hopefully we get a chance to host you again soon. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: I love the look of the entry/lobby.  Consistent design made for a really attractive look.    In some respects the service was amazing - the folks at the valet stand were amazing, front desk consistently friendly.  Then there were the negatives - inconsistent maid service and on the second day of our stay we never got service because they finally came by while we were dressing for dinner.  On checkout everything that could go wrong did -- we called for a bellman and more than 20 minutes later they had not arrived -- the valet finally went up to get our bags when I brought the situation to his attention.  Then in the confusion they forgot to give us our car key, so we had to return to the hotel to pick them up.  An unfortunate ending to our stay.  It's a great location near lots
Manager Response: Dear Wendy W,  Thank you so much for taking the time to provide feedback of your recent stay. I am glad to hear the staff were so friendly but inconsisent in our service. This is not acceptable and I apologize for that. We strive for the best and most consistent service everyday. Hopefully we get a chance to welcome you again. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: We've stayed here twice now and are never disappointed. We love the atmosphere / design / decor of this special jewel box of a boutique hotel, and besides that, we have always had the most friendly, cheerful, and helpful staff. For what you get, I think the room rate is very reasonable. The room is large and we were upgraded to the lake view because we are SPG members, which is lovely. We've had snacks and drinks in the bar, and also a full dinner in the restaurant - all very well prepared, creative, and very delicious. The location is fantastic, especially if you are in town for a concert at the Segerstrom which is an easy walk across the street. And there are so many amenities within a 5-minute drive in any direction. We will be back for sure!
Manager Response: Dear Sssparkle,  Thank you so much for taking the time to review your recent stay with us.I am very pleased to hear you enjoyed all of amenties and your SPG status was recognized with an upgrade! Hopefully we get a chance to welcome you back again soon. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: I spent three nights here for work. I am an SPG Platinum member, so I received a mild upgrade to a nicer room with a lake view. Also got high speed internet, and a 2 for 1 drinks voucher for next door. Interesting bar. Very bright!  This used to be my favorite hotel in this area. Not anymore.   I had a couple of quirky things happen. When I got to the room, I noticed the drawer that housed the minibar refrigerator was locked. I travel with medicine that needs to be refrigerated, so I called downstairs and mention I needed a key. They told me, of course it is locked and requires a key, there is alcohol in the minibar. This is one of the strange responses I've ever had from a hotel regarding the minibar. Thankfully they sent someone up with the key.  But my biggest issue was the
Manager Response: Dear hmkanji,  Thank you for taking the time to provide candid feedback of your recent stay with us. I sincerely apologize for the maintenance issue that occurred during your visit. We always do the best we can do communicate issues but it seems we fell short. I'm glad we were able to take care of your night and send you up an amenity to show our apologizes. Hopefully we get a chance to welcome you back again soon. Please let us know if you need anything at all.     Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: I was looking for a hotel near South Coast Plaza for a one-night stay prior to venturing further south in Orange County.  I was only familiar with the Westin, clearly visible from the mall.  Well it turns out there is a Marriott nearby as well as this hidden gem.  The Avenue of the Arts Hotel is part of the Starwood (SPG) group, as is the Westin.  Now that Marriott and Starwood have merged, these 3 hotels are now all part of one big family.    The Avenue of the Arts Hotel is one of SPG's Tribute Portfolio hotels.  I was not familiar with this brand, but apparently they are a group of 4-star independent hotels, perhaps not unlike Marriott's Autograph Collection.  SPG's group of 5-star independent hotels is the Luxury Collection, which I am familiar with.  The hotel is located on
Manager Response: Dear pillowsofwanderlust,  Wow! Thank you so much for such an incredible review and for your recent stay with us. I'm so glad to see you even included the properties history and your elite status was recognized and appreciated. Hopefully we get the chance to welcome you again soon. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: Wish we had another night to stay!  The hotel was awesome!  Check-in was super easy and fast.  Very close to South Coast plaza mall, walking distance for sure!  The hotel itself was very nice.  Everything was kept very clean.  Our room was super clean and had lakeside and pool view, which was Great! I would most definitely stay here again if we are in the area, plus I would recommend friends and family to stay there...  overall a great experience!
Manager Response: Dear rhop,  We wish you had another night also! Thank you for such a fantastic review of our property and of your stay. I am incredibly pleased to hear all aspects of your stay were so great. Hopefully we get a chance to welcome you back again soon. Please let us know if you need anything at all.  Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: It speaks highly of any establishment, but even more of a hotel, when the people who work for it, care. From the receptionist to the restaurant staff, every single person was attentive and made me and my son feel welcomed. Apart from the accommodating staff, the food was excellent, the rooms impeccable and the bed super comfortable. I couldn't have asked for more and I will definitely come back. Thank you for an amazing stay.
Manager Response: Dear Ana M,  Thank you for such an incredible review of our property and for your recent stay! I am extremely pleased top hear everything during your stay went so well. This is exactly what we strive for everyday. Hopefully we get a chance to welcome you back again soon. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: We booked this hotel for a three night stay, as we were attending a wedding that was being held across the street at the Center Club of Orange County.  The 2-queen room was incredibly spacious and clean, as was the bathroom.  The staff was all exceedingly polite and friendly.  We required the use of the hotel's shuttle van to pick up a rental car from SNA, and the time it took for the hotel to send the shuttle to pick me up from SNA was super quick.  The only disappointment we had was that housekeeping never got to our room on our second day before we came back and needed to unwind after the wedding.  We left the hotel at 8:45 am, and the room had not been serviced at 4pm.  Not enough to change my excellent rating for the hotel.    I've stayed at the three hotels that are within

Summary Heading: CHINESE SOAPS & RIP OFF PARKING - BOYCOTT THEM
Summary: I never knew it but apparently Costa Mesa is akin to Manhattan, Russian Hill & the Champs Elyee as they gouge you with a $28/day parking fee!  Magnifique! Also then this purported boutique hotel is too cheap, the towels are thread bare and the soaps and shampoos are all MADE IN CHINA!   Hey, what's wrong with nice "boutique" soaps from USA or France?  Well, they saved like $0.75 on that one!     Both the midget jacuzzi and small pool were filled with recycled murky water of the adjacent fake "Lake" or well, I think they need to do a test for fecal count.    Anyways, well, while they claim to be a boutique, it isn't so, it's a dressed up Holiday Inn Express.  Voila!

Hotel is a little odd but in a good way. “Garden” view with I guess a “river” is odd. Glass enclosure feel to the elevator is odd. But not bad at all and definitely solidly built. Parking is tight for big vehicles and bad drivers and not much covered room on those hot days. Could walk to South Coast but you’d end up by the Sear’s, just drive...

I had checked in online but had not yet received a text saying my room was ready, as it should’ve happened. So early afternoon I took my chance and headed on over. After dropping my car with the valet attendant and coming inside, I was greeted by a front desk clerk.i was told my room wasn’t ready, and that they could hold my luggage until then. So I asked to retrieve my car from valet, somewhere I could head back out. She finally mentioned they were trying to “de-feather” my room. (That was a preference on my Starwood profile.) I told her that was necessary and asked if any other rooms where available.

The lobby is not huge (its not a large hotel), but offers a number of quiet areas for a meeting or just a place to pound out some emails in a bright and airy environment.  The room was well laid out, with a work desk, l-shape sofa and large TV.  The bed was very comfortable and featured several types of pillows for those that are picky about those things. Summary: Staff was less than professional and rooms were lackluster. I will probably return the Westin, right across the street for future stays in the area. Valet service was slow and we were waiting every time we called ahead for our vehicle.
Manager Response: Dear Ted R,  Thank you for taking the time review your stay at our property. I am incredibly disappointed to hear our service was anything less than exceptional. I have reached out to you in a private message to discuss this matter further. I look forward to hearing back from you soon.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: When I normally go to conferences I am disappointed with the hotel experience.  Not so this time...  I attended a four-day-long conference that was hosted by AotA Costa Mesa.  Everything about the experience was positive: --Hotel front desk staff (very positive) --Room (every detail) --Restaurant & wait staff (both the menu and staff very positive) --Grounds/setting (great for taking breaks during the day) --Courtesy van driver (engaged) --Food during conference breaks (tasty) --Weather (OK, maybe they were not responsible for that...)  I will be back...
Manager Response: Dear RikSeattle,  Thank you so much for such a great review of our property! I'm glad you enjoyed this conference experience with us. Hopefully we get the chance to welcome you back again soon. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: Stayed in this hotel for 3 days, nothing but great experience. Food at the restaurant (had breakfast, lunch and dinner and all were excellent), hotel grounds and rooms were clean, staff was friendly and helpful. Location is perfect, very close to the airport and a major mall. Definitely recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear AnyaFl,  Thank you so much for taking the time to review your experience and for your recent stay at Avenue of the Arts! We aim to make every aspect of your stay great and I'm glad we met your expectations. Hopefully you have a return trip planned! Please let us know if you need anything at all.  Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary Heading: Great trip for business and pleasure
Summary: First off when I arrived the staff is super friendly and helpful on any advice on food or what they have in the area.  The valet guys always got my car quickly and helped me with my bags as well with directions.  Front desk provided me quick service as well as answers to all of my questions and very patient.  Bellman there were great with all of my 12 pieces of luggages and careful loading and unloading.  Everyday when I walk through the lobby or in the elevator there was always a smile and hello from all the employees there.  The free breakfast was decent.  When I checked in there were complimentary water bottles and cookies in my room.  The beds are comfortable enough for good nights rest.  I would definitely recommend this hotel.  Its very nice all around and my compliments

Please let us know if there is anything we can do for you.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: I had a one night stay with 2 children. The room was very  nice with 2 comfy queen beds. Bathroom really nice granite finish. Very clean hotel with honest staff we left a valuable watch and other items which were quickly returned to us. The grounds very beautiful picturesque. Would definitely stay again!
Manager Response: Dear sgriffiths38,  Thank you for your recent stay with us! I am so pleased to hear you enjoyed our heavenly mattresses and room finishings. Hopefully we get a chance to welcome you again soon. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: I haven't stayed in the Costa Mesa area before, and was Very Favorably Pleased with my stay here at Avenue of the Arts. It is a finely maintained and appointed hotel, with professional and most courteous and attentive staff. Their bar / lounge had excellent food and drinks. I read for 2 hours in their pleasant garden area. People were enjoying their pool. Most definitely will be on my "stay here next time" I'm anywhere near to this part of LA.
Manager Response: Dear Wil D,  Thank you for such an incredible review of our property and for your recent stay with us! I am so glad everything was stellar during your stay and the staff were so accommodating. We hope to get the chance to welcome you again soon. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: Really impressed with the level of service. I have been traveling up to three times a week for business reasons and on this occasion pleasure. I have rarely experienced the type of service I have received here. Emily has been the most gracious host I’ve met outside of the four seasons hotels. Also there is a night shift dude who looks like Thor and that’s also great.
Manager Response: Dear petergallo,  Thanks so much for your recent stay and for your kind words about Emily! I am very pleased to hear how much you enjoyed your stay. Hopefully we get a chance to welcome you again soon. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: The check-in process was smooth, professional and friendly. The hotel lobby is uniquely decorated staying in good taste.   Rooms were decorated in the same manner. It was very roomy with a small balcony looking over a small man made lake. Very clean and the bed was very comfortable.   The hotel gym is excellent. Well equipped and even had a Peloton spin cycle for guest use. I was very surprised to see a hotel go the extra expense on such type of equipment.
Manager Response: Dear FrUsa1991,  Thank you for such a great review of our property and of your stay! I am so glad to hear you enjoyed all of the accommodations and the staff were so friendly. The Peloton is our newest addition to the gym and I'm glad you got to try out that amazing piece of equipment. Hopefully we get the chance to welcome you again soon. Please let us know if you need anything at all!  Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary Heading: Superior Rooms and Service for the Price
Summary: I have travelled extensively for the past 30 years staying in all types of hotels. This hotel provides great value for the price,  The rooms are clean, upscale in design and provide many amenities such as Newmn’s Own coffee nd a Kerrigan and a mini bar. The staff is very hospitable and helpful.   There is as9lid gym but I very small pool area ( which I did not use).  Overall if t You are in the area and not looking to pay for a resort Nd the fees attached to that type of an accommodation, this is a great deal!
Manager Response: Dear Michelle S,  Thank you for such an awesome review and for your recent stay with us! I am so pleased to hear you enjoyed all of the in room amenities and the staff were so helpful. That's exactly what we strive for! We hope to get the chance to welcome you again soon. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: I genuinely enjoyed my stay at this boutique hotel. Right when I walked in, I was warmly greeted and checked in. Tal and Emily at the front desk were very helpful and recommended some good seafood options close by. I needed a room away from the ice machine that was quiet and they were able to put me in a nice once! The room itslef was lovely. Very comfy beds, with a nice view. I had breakfast downstairs at Silver Trumpet in the morning and enjoyed a pretty good breakfast burrito. Will definitley return!
Manager Response: Dear Rob G,  Thank you so much for an awesome review and for your recent stay with us! I am so pleased Tal and Emily took such great care of you. We look forward to hosting you again. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: This is a great hotel and the staff is super friendly and helpful. Spent 3 nights here and was extremely satisfied with everything. Rooms are roomy and beds are comfortable. Will stay here again!! the hotel Restaurant and Bar have a terrific ambiance. Room service was very quick and delicious.
Manager Response: Dear Ken and Lori P,  Thank you so much for such a fantastic review and for your recent stay at our property. I am so glad to hear everything was comfortable for you and the staff were so helpful. We hope to get the chance to welcome you again soon. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary Heading: Great Place/Great Service/Great Value. A true SCP Gem
Summary: Stayed at this property for a anniversary "staycation." The entire stay was an excellent experience starting with our arrival and ending with our departure. We stayed in a King Bed room, that is very clean. The style is contemporary that offered a fountain view found on a small, quiet walking trail.  We dined multiple times at the Silver Trumpet restaurant (dinner, happy hour, dessert and brunch). Each occasion the service was top notch and the food quality was excellent.  The hotel staff made my anniversary celebration more complete by surprising us with a a treat courtesy of the house. We loved the hotel's central location to restaurants and South Coast Plaza that are all walking distance.  I would certainly stay here again when looking for another Orange County Staycation.
Manager Response: Dear Eric S,  Thanks so much for choosing us for your staycation! I am so glad you enjoyed your stay and we were able to make it special for you. Hopefully we get a chance to welcome you again soon. Please reach out to us if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: What a pretty hotel.  Very nice bar/restaurant to go to at the end of the day.  Centrally located.  And the best staff I have ever encountered on my trips to Southern California.  My room was comfortable and nicely appointed.  Room service was quick and delicious. .
Manager Response: Dear PamOfOak,  What an honor! Thanks for much for the kind words and for your recent stay with us. I am so pleased to hear you enjoyed yourself with us. We can't wait to host you again! Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary Heading: A Great Hotel with Beautiful Ambiance
Summary: This hotel exceeded our expectations well beyond what we expected. As we drove into the entrance, my wife and I were very impressed by the setup and welcoming atmosphere. As we walked into the lobby, we were greeted by a very friendly and helpful doorman. After being directed to the front desk, we were greeted by very accommodating staff. They asked the right questions and made sure we were very comfortable before we even walked to our room.   The entire Hotel is beautifully decorated with very modern and classy decor. It was a perfect setup (made up of Garden, Pool, Waiting Area and other rooms to sit and read). Rooms were beautifully decorated and ours even had a balcony facing the fountain out back,  I highly recommend this hotel to anyone that is interested in staying in a

Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary Heading: Great place for a busy stay.
Summary: This hotel, is small.  Feels and looks like it was previously apartments - which isn't a bad thing.  Contemporary decor, a bit spartan, but clean and comfortable.  Bedding was very comfortable.  Room was pretty spacious.  Well located for busy in the Costa Mesa/Irvine area.  But service was excellent.  I left something in my room.  Called shortly after check-out, person on the phone took full responsibility and when I returned to the front desk to pick up my things, they were there waiting.  Didn't have to talk to ten people, talk to security, didn't get shuffled around.   I didn't eat at their restaurant - so can't comment on it.
Manager Response: Dear benleo56,  Thank you for taking the time to review our property and for our recent stay with us. I am very pleased to hear your stay was comfortable and the staff were able to efficiently take care of all of your needs. This is exactly what we aim for! Just to clarify, we have always been a hotel. Hopefully next time you stay with us you get to enjoy the Silver Trumpet! Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: This hotel is a hidden gem! My boyfriend and I decided to have a staycation to celebrate our anniversary and found this Starwood property online. It was our first time hearing about the Avenue of the Arts Hotel and we are so happy we discovered this place! We booked the Kiss and Tell package, which was a great deal and we thought it would be a nice touch to our romantic getaway. The package included; chocolate covered strawberries, champagne, free parking, in room breakfast and rose petals decorating the room. Arriving at the hotel, the staff was so friendly and welcoming I can honestly say I have never had a check-in experience like that at any other hotel I have stayed at. The Front Desk was very helpful and even made reservations for us at their restaurant on property, the
Manager Response: Dear CA81456,  Thank you so much for such a fantastic review and for your recent stay with us! Summary: I stay at this Hotel often. Is it possible for a business to have no room for improvement? I think the answer may be yes in this case. Most importantly the staff is the best I have ever experienced in any business. Always greeted warmly, and every person seems to truly enjoy their position. Fantastic people! Hotel is spotless, with great rooms.BEST PLACE TO STAY.

Summary: This is a great hotel! My girlfriend and I stayed here for her birthday! Even though its local, its centrally located. The staff was very helpful. They directed me where to get ballons for my friends birthday. It is centrally located next to lots of entertainment; the south coast plaza, next to the segerstrom center of the arts, the camp and lab.

Summary: Clean beautiful rooms close to all the great attractions in Orange County. Staff excellent and courteous. Every time I come to Orange County I stay here. 15 minutes to Angel Stadium 15 minutes to Disneyland 5 minutes to the beach.

We can't wait for your return trip. let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary: Recently stayed at Avenue of the Arts and really enjoyed my stay! The staff was so nice and helpful. They accommodated all of my requests and really went above and beyond to make sure my family and I were comfortable. I will be back for sure!

Summary: This hotel is absolutely fantastic. We knew it would be good and it exceeded our expectations. The staff were so friendly and ready to help. They are highly trained and truly seem like they enjoy their jobs. The rooms were spacious and designed tastefully. We can’t wait to come back when we’re in the Orange County area again!
Manager Response: Dear JohnSTravels35,   Thank you so much for your recent stay and for leaving such a great review! I am so glad to hear the staff were so friendly. We do enjoy our jobs! Come back and stay again soon. Please let us know if you need anything at all.     Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: I cannot tell you how fantastic this hotel is. I had come in from a long journey overseas for work and was immediately met with pretty much the friendliest and most efficient staff I've ever worked with. The front desk were beyond helpful when I needed to switch my room and were incredibly effective from the moment I entered the door, not to mention cherry and super sweet. I had the pleasure of eating in the restaurant which was delicious - I mean really delicious! It was a lovely ambiance and experience, something I'm definitely not used to on a work trip. The rooms are lovely - modern and beautiful but also comfortable as all get-out, I slept like the dead on their wonderful bed! Basically - I would come back here for fun, forget the work trip :) Highly suggest it to anyone!
Manager Response: Dear Lauren F,  Thank you so much for your recent stay and for leaving such a lovely review of our property! I'm glad the hotel had everything you needed and the staff were so accommodating. The is exactly what we strive for! We hope to get the chance to welcome you again soon. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: When I first walked in the staff was so friendly and welcoming.  Also, the lobby was spacious with vibrant colors and decor.  We had a beautiful room with a view of the pool and pond, it was very relaxing.  We also ate in hotels restaurant, the food was outstanding and we had great service.  After dinner we went to the lounge and I had drink which was relaxing.  Speaking of relaxing, the bed in the room is the most comfortable bed I’ve ever slept in; I wish I had one like that at home. The front desk staff were  very accommodating and eager to assist me in anyway.  I will definitely stay at this hotel again.
Manager Response: Good afternoon,  Thank you for such a fantastic review and for your recent stay at our property. I am very pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay and everyone was so accommodating. Please let us know if you need anything at all. We hope to get the chance to welcome you again soon.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: I recently stayed here and had a great experience, the staff was very nice and helpful. The hotel is in a great location close to everywhere I needed to be. They also recently updated their gym equipment! I highly recommend this hotel!
Manager Response: Dear Cody B,  Thank you for such a great review and for your recent stay at our property. I am very pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay! Please let us know if you need anything at all. We hope to get the chance to welcome you again soon.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: We booked our stay through Starwood Preferred Guest (SPG) and requested a room with a terrace since we were traveling with our dog. The SPG rep said he spoke to the hotel and confirmed a Terrace King room for us. Prior to our stay we reached out to the hotel directly to confirm the terrace room since the email confirmation we received did not specify. They did not have us down for a terrace room, but promised they'd get us in that type of room upon arrival.  When we arrived, they did in fact put us in a terrace room on the ground floor. It must've been the smallest room in the building. It was basically one small room with a king sized bed, a bathroom, and a terrace. We were surprised they'd put a Platinum SPG member in this type of room, but didn't ask to be moved since they
Manager Response: Dear Scorp1970,  Thank you very much for your valued feedback.   We are sincerely sorry for your experience with us this past week. As a group, we will aways strive to be better every day and listen to every one of our guests. I will ensure every piece of information you shared is passed along to the appropriate team members in our efforts to improve.  Again, thank you so much for helping us direct our attention.  Best,

Summary: My husband and I enjoyed our stay at the Avenue of the Arts this past weekend. We were greeted by Cassie and Chelsea as soon as we walked in. The entire staff was friendly and polite and check in was a breeze. We stayed on the lake side and although there was a bit of construction, it was quiet and didn't bother us one bit. The room was spacious and clean and we were happy that Cassie was able to accommodate a late check out, so we could get some extra rest. We enjoyed dinner at the Silver Trumpet where they had delicious food with some great vegetarian options. Overall it was a pleasant experience and we will definitely be back!
Manager Response: Dear Kylie C,  Thank you so much for taking the time to review our property and for your recent stay. I am so glad to hear Cassie, Chelsea and all of the staff were so accommodating and friendly. Thats exactly what we strive for! We hope to get the chance to welcome you again soon. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Front Desk Manager

Summary Heading: Great stay at this boutique hotel!
Summary: Recently stayed at the Avenue of the Arts Hotel in Costa Mesa and had a wonderful stay. All employees were very professional and polite. The hotel was nice and clean and parking and check in was a breeze. Their customer service when I called for a few requests was great! Tried the restaurant for both breakfast and dinner and enjoyed our meals. I would definitely recommend this hotel and if u are going to a show and looking for a place to stay or just looking for a place to stay in the south coast area.
Manager Response: Dear Lightsout714,  Thank you so much for your 5/5 review. Our goal has been, and will always be, to exceed guests' expectations and we're so glad we were able to accomplish that with you. We hope to have you back soon.  Warm Regards,

Summary: This hotel is wonderful! Not only is it conveniently located, but the staff is overly friendly and the rooms are brand new! Restaurant and bar serve delicious food and drinks. We loved our experience and we will definitely be back!
Manager Response: Dear RCM323,  Thank you so much for taking the time to post your review!  We are happy that you have found a new home away from home in Orange County. Until your next visit, we wish you the best! Warm Regards,

Summary: My wife and I just stayed for a night but room was spacious and comfortable and can’t say enough about how accommodating the front desk and entire staff was!  Will definitely make this our go to hotel in Orange County
Manager Response: Dear Kevbrooks1,  Thank you so much for taking the time to review our property! We take a lot of pride in the experience of each and every guest that stays with us. We are so glad that you had an excellent stay and that our staff left a lasting impression on you. We hope to have you back soon! Warm Regards,

Summary: Taylor in the reservations department really went above and beyond to make our stay amazing. I had to book a hotel to come into town for my son-in-laws open heart surgery, so when I called and spoke to Taylor I told her I wasn’t sure when I’d need to begin my stay or how long it would be. She was so kind and made sure to make my stay open ended and allow me some leeway. During the stressful time of the surgery and recovery I had a lot on my plate, and Taylor made it a little easier. I dealt with some other staff who were not nearly as helpful. Thank you for everything Taylor!
Manager Response: Dear KarenFus,  Thank you so much for highlighting our amazing reservations supervisor Taylor! We are so glad she was able to make coordinate your reservations in a way that was convenient and helpful during your time of need. We wish you the best of luck and hope you stay with us under better circumstances soon! Warm Regards,

Summary Heading: It’s not really a Tribute Hotel. It’s a nice business hotel
Summary: I was expecting a more unique opportunity experience but soon after I arrived I realized  it was only a nice business hotel. The staff is not well trained and not professional at all. We had to ask do the same thing 3 times in order to get it done.  Pictures on the website are much better than how it really looks.  They didn’t honor the spg gold upgrade as the manager argued that they are a small hotel.  In conclusion, if you want a mediocre business hotel you can stay here. If you want something different this is not for you.
Manager Response: Good Afternoon EZB_11,  Thank you very much for your valuable feedback. I am very sorry to hear that your experience at our hotel did not meet your expectations or needs. No matter the type of travel, whether business or personal, our goal is to be flexible and provide an excellent experience to every guest. I would love the opportunity to change your perception and win back your loyalty. Please reach out to me directly at tbranham@avenueoftheartshotel.com if your travels bring you back to this area. I would love the opportunity to welcome you back as my personal VIP.  Warm Regards,

Summary Heading: It costs less than the Westin a block away but it's better.
Summary: closer parking. Overlooks a lake. Tonight i had a dog barking in the next room so Jamie put me in a better room.  Nice restaurant...  Pool and Jacuzzi (Westin has only pool).  Great place. I've stayed here 10x
Manager Response: Dear cruisero1861,  Thank you for such a great review and for your recent stay at our property. I am very pleased to hear you enjoyed all of the amenities and the staff were so accommodating. Thank you for choosing us! We hope to get the chance to welcome you again soon. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Ok, but will go somewhere else next time
Summary: I expect more from a Tribute hotel.  Something classic, something unique. That was lacking here. Hotel was quiet, rooms were large, and views of the man made lake were pleasant.  I did not like that the "business center" was just 4 PCs which charged by the minute to use and to print. I did not like that my Platinum SPG membership only got me a continental breakfast. I especially did not like that the hotel charged a mandatory $25 to self-park my car. That information was NOT on the hotel website which may make it illegal.  Dissappointed.
Manager Response: Dear PAQ,  Thank you for taking the time to review our property and for your recent stay. I am pretty disappointed to hear the property did not live up to the Tribute brand. I see that you were placed in an upgraded room for your elite status, I hope aspect was enjoyable. As for the parking, I apologize you were not informed beforehand as it is mentioned when you book through out website. If you do choose to stay with us again, please note that Platinum amenity breakfast voucher can also be used as a credit towards our restaurant. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary Heading: Nice Stay in a nice area
Summary: I was here for a business trip and I must say this is a very good hotel. Staff si really friendly and helpful, from housekeeping to front office. Rooms are nice but not kinda state of the art environment. The level of f&b is good enough. The hotel is located in a very nice and quiet area. It is very close to the Orange County airport and from Costa Mesa you can reach Newport Beach and huntington Beach very fast. Approved!
Manager Response: Dear HonoraryPraguer,  Thanks so much for your review and for your recent stay with us! I'm pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay and the surrounding area was convenient for you. We hope to get the chance to welcome you again. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary Heading: Beautiful Hotel With Wonderful Color Scheme!
Summary: I really loved my stay at the elegant Avenue of the Arts Hotel in Costa Mesa. Avenue of the Arts honors the Starwood Preferred Guest Membership and offers wonderful cuisine in their onsite restaurant.  The rooms are very cozy and comfortable with classic decor and a miniature suite feel.  Each room has its own refrigerator with freezer, coffee machine and cupboard area, making travel very convenient for those who enjoy keeping a little wine and other refreshments in their private room(s).  There is also a mini-bar in the room.  Check-In and Check-Out proceedings were easy and breezy. The view from upper floor rooms is mountainous and refreshing. The hotel also has a nice pool onsite. I'd totally recommend this elegant hotel to anyone who is seeing a musical or dance performance

Summary: The rooms were beautiful and the staff were very accommodating. The bed was comfortable and all was very clean. The Silver Trumpet Restaurant attached offered a very nice brunch and happy hour. The rooms were contemporary in design and offered a very comfortable and inviting place to stay

Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary Heading: My go to place to stay when in the area
Summary: I stayed here several times when in town to take care of business and always had a pleasant experience. The staff were courteous, helpful and responsive --- from the time I parked at the front to register to check out. They always had extra personnel in the front desk; thus only minimal wait time when checking in. Nice, modern look all around. Rooms were always clean, comfortable and everything in the room were in working order. Good wifi connectivity. There's a small outdoor pool and spa but I never got the chance to use them. There's also an in-house restaurant;Silver Trumpet --- didn't get the chance to dine there but we're in their bar at happy hour; also nice, modern look and responsive service.  My only complain is the additional $25 fee for the self-park.
Manager Response: Dear Pi_Beach,  Thank you for taking the time to review our property and for your recent stay. I am very pleased to here the staff were so helpful. We hope you get the chance to enjoy the Silver Trumpet next time you're in the area. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: The convention I attended was headquartered at the nearby Westin, but I liked the description and reviews of this hotel, so I chose it instead. Good move! It had the boutique hotel vibe, with comfy chairs and a warm fire in the lobby, a garden for sitting with a good book, water features surrounded by walkways, and much more. Our room was perhaps the quietest hotel room we’ve ever had, and we thoroughly enjoyed sitting on the balcony that overlooked the water. The staff could not have been better, universally helpful and friendly. We had planned to stay for three nights and then move on to other locations for a few vacation days on the coast, but we liked the hotel and surroundings so much that we stayed seven nights and just took day trips out around the area. Great hotel! (And

Summary: Everything about this hotel deserves some kind of special mention.   The ease of parking, the valets, the front desk, the friendly professionalism of the staff, the cleanliness of the public areas and especially, the cleanliness of the rooms.   The bedding is great - crisp high quality linens, and the pillows and shades all contribute to a sense of luxury - since it really does not just look good, it actually feels good too.   They deserve high marks.

Summary: Coming at the end of a long drive from the Bay Area, the hotel was an oasis of hosptitality! The staff were courteous and attentive to detail from the moment we called for the reservation to the moment we pulled away. They made every effort to make my wife and I feel welcome.  The lobby and the lounge were at bit at odds with the late 2oth century building architecure as teh lobbey as chic and attractive. This trend continued into the rooms which were large, modern and functional. The beds were super comfortable and had lovely linens. The bathroom was very functional with a great shower! The view from the room overlooked the courtyard and the duck pond made for a relaxing environment.  And as an SPG member, we had the convenience of a late check out which allowed us to visit the
Manager Response: Dear SanDiegoCouple2,  Thank you so much for such a fantastic review! I am so pleased to hear you had such a great time staying with us and the staff were so accommodating. We hope to get the chance to welcome you again soon. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: Loved the modern colorful décor of this hotel.   The room was spacious and nicely decorated.   The hotel offers great style on a quiet street away from main streets although there is an entrance very close by to a super high end mall.    No shopping for bargains in these couture shops.
Manager Response: Dear Ilume,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay at our property. I am very pleased you enjoyed the decor and everything in the area was in a good proximity. We hope to get the chance to welcome you again. Please let us know if you need anything at all.  Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: We have stayed here twice. It is located in the heart of Costa Mesa, close to many eateries and coffee shops (within driving distance). It's also not too far from Disneyland. My favorite part of the hotel is the lobby which I find tasteful and artsy. Hotel facilities include a small, basic pool and a Jacuzzi. There's a bar/club right by the hotel but we never had a chance to visit.  Room is true to picture, very modern and clean with lots of natural light. Bathroom is a bit on the small side but it doesn't concern us. Bed is soft and comfortable. The only complaint I have is the AC/heater which can get noisy at night.    Overall, it's decent stay for the price that we paid. The hotel appears to be family friendly.
Manager Response: Dear Genesis C,  Thank you for taking the time to review our property and your recent stay. I'm glad you enjoyed our recently renovated lobby and the hotel's amenities. We hope you come and stay with us again soon. Please let us know if you need anything at all.    Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary Heading: Nice hotel in central Orange County
Summary: The Avenue of the Arts hotel in Costa Mesa/Irvine is a nice hotel with a very uneven service level.  I was there over the holiday so they may have had their “B” team running the show.  I had booked several rooms and for most of them there was a quick, friendly check-in accommodating the room-type I requested.  For one check-in however, they claimed there was a “problem” with the confirmation; first I had to retrieve the reservation number….which was not good enough…so I had to bring my laptop down and show them the actual screen....which was still not good enough.  Given the hassle, and though I never complained, was still made to feel like this was my fault (later I found out they had the reservation but just not confirmation that the OTA had paid them).  The lobby is a nice
Manager Response: Dear FlyguyAustin,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay at our property. I am pleased to hear we were able to discount your parking for you as a gesture but its disappointing to hear your stay wasn't exceptional. That is definitely something we strive for. We will use this feedback to improve our operation. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: I was extremely happy with my stay at Avenue of the Arts.  The staff was very welcoming and there to open the door for me at all hours.  My room was spacious and very comfortable with a nice view to the pond out back. There was construction going on at the building across the pond and I didn't hear a single sound out of it, so the rooms were very quiet.  It's also only a 5-10 minute walk to a great mall and shopping center.
Manager Response: Dear David S,  Thank you so much for such a great review and for your recent stay at our property. I am so glad to hear you found the room to be spacious and it had everything you needed. We hope to have the chance to welcome you again soon. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: This hotel has been the preferred choice for many years. However, customer service and cleanliness of the rooms have declined rapidly. From checkin to checkout I️ have not a single positive thing to say. This SPG property has lost my confidence and business. Very very disappointed.
Manager Response: Dear k12tu,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback from your recent stay. I am extremely disappointed you had such a poor experience with us and I sincerely apologize for that. I have reached out to you in a private message to further discuss this matter. I look forward to hearing from you soon.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: Booked into this property as it was central to Newport/Anaheim areas & adjacent to a major shopping mall. Great staff, courteous & always helpful.  Great location; room was well appointed, quiet & provided great value for money.  On-site restaurant & bar offer good meals bar food & cocktails. Definitely will visit again.
Manager Response: Dear Hopi10,  Thank you so much for your recent stay and for such a great review! I am extremely pleased to hear the staff was so friendly and you enjoyed the decor and layout. We hope to get the chance to welcome you again soon. Please let me know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: Have you ever acted on the Southwest Airlines tag line; "Wanna Get-A-Way?" Well, that's what we did this past weekend. This is part of the Starwood Hotel chain and I was excited to stay at a place that's "new" to me. We are big Westin fans however this location popped up and I couldn't resist. One word....SWANKY. This place is swanky yet VERY WELCOMING.   Greeted by 2 friendly faces as i got out of the car, doors parted ways as i walked in. The check-in is to the left and it was easy to get assistance. I called ahead to see if I could check in early and they had some rooms. I originally booked a standard room. The room was spacious with a beautiful view....lake view. After a while and i was absorbing my surroundings, I thought, maybe I should upgrade. So I called down to see
Manager Response: Dear Sheree G,  Thank you for such an outstanding review of our property! I am glad you gave us a try and were so happy with your stay. We hope to get the chance to welcome you again soon. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary Heading: Excellent location for Performing Arts Center
Summary: The hotel is across the street for the performing arts center, making it just a walk away for excellent entertainment.  It is also located just a short walk to the South Coast Shopping Center with fine restaurants and many high end retail business.
Manager Response: Dear jamesmU3675UM,  Thank you for a great 5-star review and for your recent stay. I glad our proximity to everything in the area was so convenient for you. We hope to get the chance to welcome you again soon. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: This was the first time I have stayed at a Tribute Portfolio hotel. I was extremely impressed by the service.  I was upgraded to a junior suite as an SPG plat100. The room was very nice and spacious. The property itself is very well done. I really like the location as it was very close to my business meetings the next day. I will be back at the hotel next week look forward to another great stay.
Manager Response: Dear Jaymath,  Thank you so much for such a great review of your first stay! I am very pleased to hear we were able to upgrade you top one of our junior suites and the staff was so friendly. We hope to get the chance to welcome you again soon. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: I stayed at the hotel for a wedding. The hotel has a small gym, a bit too small for its size, and a pool and hot tub. They provide running route maps. My dissapointment was with houskeeping. We came back after a few hours away and found our room was never made up. I called the front desk and asked that housekeeping come in an hour so we could get ready for the wedding. They insisted everyone on the housekeeping staff left by that time and we needed to leave the room sooner. No consideration for the fact that housekeeping had failed to do our room earlier in the day as they were supposed to. After the wedding our room was made up but it was done poorly, obviously someone rushing to get done. No toiletries were left even though the original ones had been used up.
Manager Response: Dear CatsandShoes11,  Thank you for your recent stay and for your review of our property. I apologize that your stay wasn't perfect and I am quite disappointed to hear that. Housekeeping does stop servicing rooms after 4 p.m. If there is a Do Not Disturb sign on the door or if it is occupied, housekeeping will not initially service the room. I will pass this information on to the proper department and use this as additional training. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: I expected this hotel to be a special boutique experience.  The location, arrival, and lobby lived up to the expectations but I felt the rooms fell a little short.  The location is central, convenient to all areas in Santa Ana, Irvine, and Orange County.  For the arts lover, everything is right outside the front door.  The lobby is welcoming and unique, and the hotel has a pool, restaurant, workout room, and business centre.  The location and layout of the amenities is where it starts to let down.  The business centre is essentially in a entrance lobby and you have to walk through a wing of rooms to get to the restaurant.  The rooms are well appointed and clean, but tend to feel somewhat standard and don't live up to the boutique expectation.  Also, because the wings are so
Manager Response: Dear WereFromTheBronx,  Thank you for your review and for your recent stay here at Avenue of the Arts Hotel! I am pleased to hear your arrival was consistent with other boutique experiences. However, I am quite disappointed our recently renovated rooms fell short for you. We hope this does not deter you from a return trip! Let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: Room was nice but construction facing my room was loud especially early mornings. I was told  check in was 3:00pm. My room was ready until almost 4:00pm. I had to sit in the lobby and wait. They kept telling me 5-10 more minutes.  Room seemed a tad expensive for what you get.
Manager Response: Dear Rysgama2,  Thank you for your review and for your recent say with us. I apologize that you did not get in right at check in time. I have reached out to our housekeeping team to see where we fell short. Hopefully we get the chance to welcome you again. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: I've been traveling to Irvine for YEARS and it isn't short on options. That being said, I've not found one that really has the potential to be my "home away from home" when I'm working in this location. Well, I think I've FINALLY found it. HUGE plus for SPG members whose only other option was the Westin nearby.   The rooms are very spacious and BRIGHT and SANS carpet - i consider that a bonus!
