Luggage easily wheels and no questioning WHEN the last time the floors were cleaned.   The staff is the other plus. I've never seen so many smiles and helpful people. It made me feel like I was in Texas - I really hope they keep this up and don't lose this. It's definitely NOTICED and appreciated!!   The fitness center is adeqaute - it could stand to be larger - it filled up pretty quick -
Manager Response: Dear txtraveller79,  Thank you so much for a great review and for your recent stay at our property. I am so glad to hear you've found your new home away from home with us! We cant wait to have you back. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary Heading: Peaceful location in the heart of Orange County
Summary: A 2 night stay was very pleasant.  The hotel is tucked away behind a performing arts center and some office buildings (some new apartments are being built nearby, but noise of that is limited).  Staff was friendly, and lobby was modern, airy, and inviting.  Room was clean and bright, and nicely decorated in a contemporary style. Restaurant was good (had breakfast) and the bar was also nice, intimate, quiet space.for a 'night cap'.  Relatively easy access to the freeway, and very close to South Coast Plaza shopping center. Convenient parking garage for self-parking.  Overall, a really nice experience.
Manager Response: Dear FranknDebbie,  Thank you for such a great review and for your recent stay with us here at Avenue of the Arts Hotel. I am so pleased to hear you enjoyed everything the property has to offer! We hope to welcome you again soon. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: It's a beautiful property but what makes it truly terrific is the staff.  Catering to the OC clientele can't be easy, they're very accommodating in the most professional way.  Definitely coming back.  Thanks for looking after me and my flight delay!  If you love shopping, this is as close to Mecca as you can get.  A little light on the nightlife unless your attending the nearby performing arts center, but located on the property is the Silver Trumpet and it's pretty a classy place too.     Valet or nearby sel park. Nice pool and hot tub while not big, were big enough. Same with the rooms, well appointed and comfortable with big showers.  Plenty of power outlets, I really appreciate that.  Enjoy your stay here!
Manager Response: Dear ScottD58,  Thank you so much for a fantastic review and for your recent stay at our property. I am so glad to hear the staff was so accommodating and you got to enjoy what this great area has to offer. Please let us know if you need anything at all. We hope you come stay with us again!  Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: This hotel and the staff who work here are absolutely amazing! They go above and beyond in making sure we are happy with our stay. If you're looking for a classy hotel with courteous staff then this is the place for you! Sara Cargill and Carly Stein both work in the catering department and they do phenomenal work! They genuinely care about what they do, in fact they have done an excellent job of showing us what is involved in planning our wedding at their beautiful venue! Also, Richard Ferber the Front Office Manager is super friendly and offered to help in any way we need when our guests arrive to our wedding. It's an SPG property and a very beautiful place! Thank you Sara, Carly, Richard and all the staff here!
Manager Response: Dear Zaahira22,  Thank you so much for such a great review and for your recent stay at AOA! I am so pleased to hear the staff were able to completely take care of you and make sure it was a great event. We hope to get the chance to welcome you again soon. Please let us know if you need anything at all.  Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: Really enjoyed my stay at this hotel. The rooms were really well decorated and very quiet. This is a great location for shopping and dining at south coast plaza. The staff were friendly and helpful. The bar area is really cool and has a lovely outdoor patio. I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Lisa W,  Thank you so much for such a great review and for your recent stay with us. You perfectly captured what the area and hotel have to offer! We hope to get the chance to welcome you again soon. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: I was evacuated for the Canyon 2 Fire and decided to make it into a plus, so I took my son and his friend, who was visiting from New York and I booked a room online. I got a good deal and the hotel looked cute when we arrived.  The staff was preoccupied talking to each other and didn't do a proper orientation to the hotel as we checked in. Usually, they tell you where things like the pool and fitness room are, but I had to even ask where the elevator was, because they didn't tell us anything as we checked in (the entry is asymmetrical and a bit odd).  Rooms were nice but not what I would consider 4 star. The bathroom had the smallest tub I've ever seen in any hotel. LOL... Motel 6 has them beat, but then I'm a shower person so no harm no foul.  It was just a bizarre design
Manager Response: Dear Cynthia K,  Thank you for your recent stay and for your candid review of our property. I am disappointed to hear and I apologize that we were unable to come to a solution while you were still checked in. We always price match what is advertised on third party sites and I offered that when we spoke on the phone. As for price gouging, when all of the displaced fire evacuees checked in, we took care of all additional fees including parking, pet fees, etc. to show our sympathies and that we care about the situation. I apologize for your poor experience and I hope we get a chance to welcome you back again.  Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: Check-in late at 9pm, check-in was a breeze (I am a platinum SPG member), I received a very nice king bed on the sixth floor. Two bottles of water, clean room, very comfortable bed. Nice 50" TV, remote working well. Breakfast was quick, high quality and expenssive. I got the Crab Benedict - it was fantstic.
Manager Response: Dear guywellesley,  Thank you for taking time to write us such a wonderful review. We appreciate your Starwood loyalty and recognize that as a Platinum member you stay at many hotels; I am glad to hear that we stood out to you in such a positive way. I hope that we are able to welcome you to our hotel again soon.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: Our stay at this hotel was amazing. We had a lakeside king room on the top floor and it was beautifully decorated and the bed was sooooo comfortable.  It was quiet and the staff was great.  Free yoga class Saturday mornings by the lake!  It's next to the Performing Arts event center and is in a great area.  Easy to get to many places of interest.  Parking is pretty steep $24/day but we got it rolled into our nightly rate by asking just by using the hotel website's chat function. It was pricey, but well worth it if you can spend the money.  Loved it!
Manager Response: Dear tsholty,  Thank you for staying with us and taking time out of your day to leave us your feedback. I am so glad to hear that you enjoyed your time here with us and our staff was able to take care of you. We hope that we are able to welcome you here again soon.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: Best hotel in all of LA! Love this place. Location is in perfect location near Huntington and Newport. Staff is friendly and you are treated above and beyond. Love this hotel.  I applaud the staff and manager
Manager Response: Dear jscriabin,  Thank you so much for your review and for your recent stay here at our property. I am very pleased to hear AOA is your go to spot when you're in the area! We looking forward to having you again. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary Heading: Beautifully furnished, well-appointed hotel in a nice neighborhood
Summary: I stayed at this hotel for one night on business.  As a frequent traveler both for business and pleasure, I am pretty critical of hotels.  However, I have no complaints with this one.  I would stay here again in a heartbeat.  First, I received a complimentary upgrade to an enormous and beautifully furnished suite.  The room is set up well for those who need to work during their stay - plenty of light, outlets for charging all your devices, and many surfaces to lay out papers, computers, presentations, etc., without feeling cramped.   The hotel is in a nice neighborhood, and I was able to go for a run before dawn and still felt safe.    There is a lovely man-made lake on the property, which I was happy to walk by to take the shortcut to Starbucks.
Manager Response: Dear Cecilia O,  Thank you so much for your recent stay and for such a great review! I am so glad we were able to take care of you and get you a great upgrade and you were able to work in the room. We hope to get the chance to welcome you again. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: This was our first time staying at this hotel. We loved it. Very clean . Everyone is very nice and kind. Highly recommend . The back of the hotel has a lake to walk around. it was just so relaxing. So glad we chose this hotel to stay.
Manager Response: Dear Beverly K,  Thank you so much for your five-star review! I am so glad to hear you had a pleasant stay and everyone was so kind. We hope to get the chance to welcome you again soon! Please let us know if you need anything at all.  Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: Stayed at this property for one night mostly because it's geographic location. I found the perfect halfway point between Los Angeles and San Diego. The hotel was very clean and comfortable. The design was very inviting. Would definitely stay here again for a longer period of time
Manager Response: Dear Mark Z,  Thank you for your review and for your recent stay with us. I am so pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay. Mark your calendar and come visit again soon! Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: Rooms and hotel look very much as they do in online pictures. Staff at checkin was efficient and courteous. Altho our room had clearly been recently renovated, I was surprised by body odor smell on pillows and what appeared to be sheets that might not have been changed. Other than that, the decor is nice. Attended a group function. Food was very good, but waiter was in a hurry to get rid of us. He was frustrated with serving us in the first place and was taking away plates before we were done chewing food. Be aware that an advertised rate isn't all it's cracked up to be once taxes, fees, and a $24 a day parking charge gets added to your bill. However, the hotel is close to world class shopping and theater events. That in itself is a plus.
Manager Response: Dear SoCalSailors,  Thank you for your recent stay and for your review of our property. I'm pleased to hear the staff was courteous. However, I'm disappointed that your experience at the restaurant wasn't perfect and I sincerely apologize for that. I will be sure to pass this information on to the proper departments. We do hope that you come and stay with us again. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: Stayed here on a late September night and this was actually our 2nd visit to this beautiful hotel. Hotel is very pretty and artsy, with beautiful decorations everywhere. Room is spacious with nice arrangements of beds and lightings. I especially like the bed "lamp" for late night reading. The only negative thing I could find is the limited equipments in the gym. Highly recommended for Orange County visitors.
Manager Response: Dear quangfremont,  Thank you so much for your recent stay with us and for such a great review! I am pleased to hear you enjoyed our modern decor and were able to take advantage of our amenities. We look forward to your return trip! Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: I think the service here is the best part.  The room was very nice, the location was quiet.  Yet you can take a pedestrian pathway one block (through the office park across the street) to the enormous mall (South Coast Plaza).  The airport shuttle, the doormen, the front desk staff, the food service and the housekeeping staff were all super friendly and helpful.  The room was OK-sized.  The rooms facing the lake are quiet, notwithstanding that there is an active construction project next door.  The hardwood floors were different.  That's more common in Europe.  But the room was super clean and the amenities were nice.  I attended a conference, and I admit that the banquet food was really top notch.  Much better than the vast majority of hotels.
Manager Response: Dear mrmikekellyesq,  Thank you for such a great review and for your recent stay here at our property. I am incredibly pleased to hear how top notch the service was. That's exactly what we strive for. We hope to get the chance to welcome you again soon. Please let us know if you need anything at all.    Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary Heading: Great Location; Quiet Neighborhood but underwhelming facility
Summary: Recently I went on a family trip and got a nice bump to a room with balcony and views of the lake behind as well as free parking for the duration of the stay (2 nights). However, upon entering the room, I was disappointed by the bathroom, specifically the outdated shower head, the broken light on the vanity mirror and the lack of ventilation fans or heat lamp. The toiletry (shampoo, conditioner, soap, body wash, and the toilet paper) seemed average at best.   The amenity is really minimal compared to others. The pool area is small and limited. The gym and sauna area are actually nice with ample supply of fruit, water, and towels. The parking garage is easily full for paying customers, perhaps due to mismanagement, and worst of all, not only is it not connected to the main
Manager Response: Dear Michael W,  Thank you for your candid review of our property. I'm glad the front desk staff was able to get you into an upgraded room and free parking during your stay. However, I'm quite disappointed to hear our facilities were not completely to your liking. We appreciate the feedback as it helps improve our operation. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: I recently booked with The Avenue of the Arts for a small, corporate team meeting. I worked with Terri Collins, who made the process very easy and was also a huge help, especially with some of our last minute changes! When the team returned to the office, they had nothing but nice things to say about the hotel.  We will definitely keep this venue in mind for future events and book with them again!
Manager Response: Dear Shelby O,  Thank you so much for choosing to have your corporate meeting here. I'm very pleased Terri and all the other staff were able to make the process so smooth for you. We can't wait to host your next meeting! Please let us know if you need anything at all.  Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: Loved the ambiance.  Deco styling refreshing.  Staff very accomodating . Grounds zen-like.  Our room was a little on the small side, but we had two very comfortable queen beds.  All white linen with a linen covered duvet.  Bed and pillows assured a comfortable sleep.  Nicely air conditioned.  Has all amenities including wifi.  I had forgotten my iPhone charger and was loaned one from the desk.  Loved the fresh kerig coffee available in room.  Will certainly be back, hopefully when entertainers are there to use jazz instruments positioned just before restaurant entrance.
Manager Response: Dear Ann O,  Thank you for such an awesome five star review! I am so glad to hear our accommodations fit your needs and you had a comfortable stay. We can't wait to host you again. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: The property is very clean. Everything looks new and remodeled. The front desk is super friendly and helpful. Easy check-in. Housekeeping was quick when I requested some more towels. The beds are very comfy!  (A+ for the beds). The only complaint I have was with one of the bellmen. Brayan (spl?) was very rude and short with me when I asked about more towels. He wanted to know what I spilled. What does it matter? I want some more towels. Great breakfast on the way out! I will be back.
Manager Response: Dear John L,  Thank you so much for your recent stay and for your review of our property. I am very pleased to hear you found all of our accommodations comfortable and check in was a breeze. Please let us know if you need anything at all. We can't wait for your return trip!  Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary Heading: Wyndham Avenue of Arts Business Trip
Summary: Had a wonderful experience at the Wyndham Avenue of Arts boutique hotel.  The rooms were clean, bed comfortable and the shuttles were available as reserved.  The room and hotel in general is very well maintained and seemed to have gone through some recent updates. Friendly front desk staff made recommendations nearby for food and handled all the questions we had.  The exercise room is small, but had aerobic equipment and weights all in decent shape.  Has a pool and hot tub that unfortunately I did not get to use.  Conveniently located to John Wayne airport and our business needs.  The hotel bar was very nice with some happy hour discounts on drinks and food, nice Gin Mule and nice bar staff. Great business trip stay!
Manager Response: Dear Mis605,  Thank you so much for such an awesome five star review! I am so glad to hear you had a great experience with us. This is exactly what we strive for every day! Just so you know, we are no longer affiliated with Wyndham and are no under the umbrella of Starwood.  Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: The staff is top notch at this hotel.  Love the amenities and the hotel layout.  It's probably the first chain "boutique" hotel we've stayed at and it's a great concept.  Comfortable rooms, nice pool and spa with excellent service.  Walked to Starbucks and didn't check out the available gift shop/restaurant.  The only issue we had was a very slow drain in the tub but all in all an excellent stay.
Manager Response: Dear cctravelerCctx,  Thank you so much for your review and for your recent stay with us. I am very pleased to hear you had a great experience and you enjoyed our unique feel. Hopefully next time you get to enjoy all of the amenities! Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: This is a really nice hotel! Hard wood floors in the rooms. Modern, not your typical generic starwood hotel . Great location to the freeway system. You can also walk to malls , restaurants etc . Honestly I don't think you can. Find a better stay in Costa Mesa! Lastly the price is great !
Manager Response: Dear mike1742,  Thank you for an awesome review and for your recent stay with us! I am so pleased you found our boutique styling to your liking. Hopefully we get the chance to host you again soon. Please let us now if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: Came here for part-play, part-business. Although we will be holding our conference at the larger Westin across the street, we will likely stay at this hotel again. The rooms are comfortable and very well designed with a balcony overlooking the pool and pond. Very comfortable bed, nice wood flooring which makes the room feel so much cleaner, and tons of lighting for reading. You can tell the design was well thought out with extra attention placed on decor and real functionality. Someone actually thought logically and put plugs near the bed and several light and thermostat options within reaching distance of the bed so you don't have to get up to turn on lights - even for the lamp across the room! Some people may think I'm silly to think so much of this, but it really is about the
Manager Response: Dear kroren,  Thank you for your review and for your recent stay here at Avenue of the Arts Hotel. I am so glad you found your room to be comfortable and our property fit your needs. Next time we see you hopefully its no business and all play! Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: One of the best hotels in the area; very friendly staff; amazing rooms and hotel area. Great value, close from the South Coast Plaza Mall; 20 minutes from Disneyland through highway; 20 minutes from Newport Beach and Huntington Beach.  Highly recommended!
Manager Response: Dear Moe_Vienna,  Thank you so much for such an awesome review and for your recent stay at our property. I am very pleased to hear all of the staff was so friendly and the room was to your liking! We can't wait for your return trip. Please let us know if you need anything at all.  Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: I stay a lot at Kimpton hotels but I am not going to lie the location and this hotel are top notch. The hotel has a very modern twist with great music and very well appointed rooms. Had a suite that was beautiful with a balcony. The restaurant and bar are very hip. And a nice walk around the little lake is very nice and relaxing. I will be back for sure
Manager Response: Dear Fayez K,  Thank you for your recent stay and for such an outstanding review! I am so glad you enjoyed our accommodations and were able to enjoy all of the amenities we have here on property. We look forward to hosting you again! Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: Hotel is cute and boutiquey. A few blocks from South Coast Plaza. Kind of on a business street with other building. No lobby bar, but cute bar/restaurant on site and nice outdoor seating area with fountains. The parking garage is attached to the hotel and easy to come and go with a key card.
Manager Response: Dear tiffany000,  Thank you for review and for your recent stay here at Avenue of the Arts Hotel. I'm glad to hear you found our outdoor patio seating so comfortable in this beautiful weather! As a side note, we do have a full service bar inside of our restaurant. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   We can't wait to host you again!  Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: Meets expectations.  The room was nice and the property is kept up well.  Only complaints are the cost of parking and the rather small pool with little sun exposure.  Our interactions with the staff were also pleasant.
Manager Response: Dear Matt F,   Thank you for your feedback and for your recent stay here at Avenue of the Arts Hotel. I am pleased to hear our staff was so pleasant and you enjoyed our manicured grounds. We hope for the chance to welcome you again soon. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: The hotel itself was stunning. It was beautifully designed. Our child found the flaming torches, glass hallway with a water feature, and the lake to be fascinating and beautiful. The room was comfortable and clean. The staff was competent, friendly, and eager to be helpful.   The hotel restaurant was wonderful - sustainably sourced, all natural, delicious, and very well priced for the amount of food you are given and how good the food is. Room service was prompt and inexpensive for this nice of a hotel.   We will definitely stay again the next time we are in Orange County.
Manager Response: Dear Melissa E,  Thank you for such an awesome review and for your recent stay with us here at Avenue of the Arts Hotel! I am so glad you found all of our accommodations comfortable and that you had a great stay. That's exactly what we aim for! Please let us know if you need anything at all. We can't wait to host you again!  Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: The property is beautiful, the rooms are beautiful and comfortable. From the time I walked in the staff was extra friendly and helpful which means a lot to me because I am constantly judged and mistreated because of my looks (mostly the tattoos) There was a minor misunderstanding during the reservation and Evan the supervisor who checked me made the situation right for both sides which I greatly appreciated (it's those little things that count when you travel a lot) I would def recommend the place to anyone in the area, I've stayed in Many hotels in the area and it's definitely worth checking out and coming back to!
Manager Response: Dear Blaise L,  Thank you for your recent stay here at Avenue of the Arts Hotel and for such a great review! I am glad Evan was able to take care of everything and your stay was enjoyable. Hopefully we are your new home base! Please let me know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: Over all excellence. Great staff, clean rooms, beautiful decor and setting. Bed are super lush and comfortable. We have been traveling for couple of weeks and stayed in many holes in Cali and this hotel by far is the best. Thank you for making our stay so pleasant.
Manager Response: Dear Coco T,  Thank you for such an awesome review and for your recent stay here at Avenue of the Arts Hotel! I am extremely pleased to hear that your stay was the best out of all of your recent travels! We look forward to your return trip! Please let me know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary Heading: Nice little oasis a bit of the beaten path
Summary: We stayed here only one night by "accident".  The nearby Westin South Coast Plaza had no water overnight and they suggested we stay here as an alternative. I wished I had known about this property prior as I usually stay at the Westin. In many ways, this has the feel of a boutique luxury hotel.  In our very short visit, we didn't have an opportunity to really use any of the services, although we did have lunch at their onsite restaurant. Check in was seamless, room was spacious and clean with a full bath (something getting more and more rare these days). They style reminded me in some ways of Art Deco Miami with lots of  "flow". Little interaction we did have with staff was great - they didn't offer us a mini bar key for some reason which was fine. The surrounding area and
Manager Response: Dear ckccan,  Thank you so much for your review and for your recent stay with us! I am extremely pleased you ended here by accident but enjoyed your stay. We hope Avenue of the Arts can be your new home. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: I love this place. My first 2 times was ny myself and the last time with my girlfriend and she love it too. Great place love it. And even better an amazing cuban place a mile away. Perfect place to visit.
Manager Response: Dear Enrique D,  Thank you for your recent stay with us and for your awesome review! We are happy to welcome you back for the third! Please let us know if you need anything at all. We can't wait for your return trip.  Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: Coming here, felt good, staff was very friendly, check in was quick, the family room was really tiny. it was the only hotel we came across during our tour that actually gave you complimentary bottles of water. Its a very cute and cozy hotel, very neat and tidy with a nice restaurant and valet service. It would have been a very nice experience, except, that our friend's car was broken into, while it was under the valet care and service, they lost a lot of their things. Very sad that the hotel refused to take responsibility, and in fact had a callous & indifferent attitude!! That is not the way a guest should be treated, and if the car is parked on the hotel premises and by your own valet service how can the hotel not take responsibility!!!    In my opinion, when a traveller
Manager Response: Dear ahujarj,  Thank you for your review and for your recent stay with us. I am very pleased that the staff was so friendly and your check in experience was quick. In regards to the issue with your friend's vehicle, we have been in constant communication with them and look forward to a resolution soon. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: Easy access to lots of shopping, dining and hot spots around town.  I'm very particular when it comes to hotels and Avenue of the Arts Costa Mesa was excellent.  It will be my go to spot when visiting Irvine/Newport area.  Ambiance, vibe is cool and the hotel was clean.   We needed few items and the housekeeping attended to our needs immediately.  Fabulous spot !
Manager Response: Dear Annie H,  Thank you for such a great review and for your recent stay! We are so glad you found your home base here! We cant wait for your return trip. Please let us know if you need anything at all.  Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: I snagged a room on my SPG app in the afternoon, and it was an awesome place to stay. Way comfortable bed. Very clean. I love the hard wood floors. It just feels more crisp in there. The pricing is unbeatable.
Manager Response: Dear Morriosity,  We are so glad you got to stay with us! I am so pleased you enjoyed our amenities and our competitive rates. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary Heading: Great vibe, comfortable bed and bedding!
Summary: We stayed at this hotel for only one night and were thoroughly impressed. The decor, the purple velvet couch in the lobby set this place apart from your typical hotel chains.  And the bed was soo comfortable and the comforter was simply luxurious...the right weight...nothing thread bare here!   There is an airport shuttle to make it convenient as well.  I had a problem getting the shuttle to pick me up, but the hotel told me to take a cab and they would take care of the taxi fare.  Wow!   I definitely will come back to this place if I'm ever in SoCal.
Manager Response: Dear jtchan,  Thank you so much for such a great review and for your recent stay with us. I'm glad you enjoyed our eclectic decor and the staff was so accommodating. We cant wait to host you again! Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: We were there for 5 nights, excellent hotel, excellent service, everyone were very courteous, valet staff, Front desk, we had a great time, rooms were very nice. Thanks Avenue of the Arts. See you in future.
Manager Response: Dear Pradeep Dave S,  Thank you so much for your recent stay and for such a fantastic review! We cant wait for your return trip. Please let us know if you need anything at all.  Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: Except one person (the night shift at 2.30am check-out) all the other staff was just incredible friendly. Hotel is modern and fits well to the arts district. Good location with easy access to shopping, restaurants and all major freeways.   Best surprise was coming from Julie who did our last night's dinner reservation at a steakhouse and treated us for a free dessert. That was a lovely and totally unexpected surprise.   On the downside: Despite a 10 night stay and a preferred guest plus status, we got no room upgrades but were left with a very noisy room with almost no storage or space to spread out. I guess we got what we paid for.   The checkout was horrible, unprofessional and extremly unfriendly. No question asked whether we enjoyed our stay, nor thanking us for staying with
Manager Response: Dear Matthias Z,  Thank you for your extended stay with us and your review of the property. I am very pleased to hear the staff were so friendly. Julie will surely appreciate the recognition. I do sincerely apologize for any other issues that occurred. I have already passed this information on to the proper departments so it can be corrected. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary Heading: Very nice staff, but a few issue to watch out
Summary: I stayed twice in this hotel recently. Both on a Jr suite on at first floor and higher floor for the other, the hotel is pretty chic, but their facilities is outdated. Both my stays got issue with air condition. It seems their AC is fix the living room to 66 degrees and I had to ask staff to fix it in both time, which is annoying. Another issue is there is construction near hotel, at my first stay, I was waked up at 9AM by the extremely strong construction noise. The friendly front desk switch me to room on the other side of building for my second stay.  Other than that, the hotel itself is good, room is a little small but cozy.
Manager Response: Dear JojoLoveTravel,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay at our property. I am glad to hear the staff was so friendly but I am quite disappointed to hear you had issues with your A/C in the room. I have passed this information along to the proper department so that it is corrected immediately. Thank you for the feedback and we hope to see you again soon. Please let me know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: We found this hidden gem on the Starwood Resorts website during a search for another hotel (besides the Westin) that is a short walking distance from the Segerstrom Center and found Avenue of the Arts Costa Mesa.  The Front Desk staff was friendly and helpful and check-in was quick and efficient.  We were assigned a very nice room on the 6th floor (SPG floor) with a Juliette balcony.  The room was tastefully decorated and the bathroom was clean and functional.  The bed was very comfortable and a great place to watch programs on the stunningly clear 55 inch LED TV.  The hotel grounds are clean and well-maintained and there is a beautiful lake and parkland behind the hotel where you can take a relaxing stroll.  The rates at this hotel are reasonable and the location is literally
Manager Response: Dear SgtBuffy,  Thank you for such an awesome review and for your recent stay with us. I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay and the staff was so helpful. We cant wait for your return trip! Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: My wife and I took our baby for her first visit to great grandma. I would say we were self conscious of the extra time needed for carseat, stroller, everything...... The property was nice, not my preference for colors and decor, but was really nice. The staff made every step easier from the valet, to the bellman, to the front desk. Either they make a great deal of money and nothing bothers them, or they're managed very well and are great people to start with, cause I can't recall one uncomfortable look when we were looking everywhere to find one... New parents, new baby, new experience. I will pay more to go back to that property before I roll the dice to go to another, that is a fact. I will update future visits.
Manager Response: Dear Allenwealthmgmt,  Thank you so much for taking the time to provide feedback of your recent stay with us. I am very pleased to hear my staff provided such a great service in helping your family with whatever they needed. We look forward to the chance to welcome you again soon. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: This hotel is just "average" on all fronts.  The staff is friendly, the room was clean, and location is good, but nothing is exceptional or stands out.  Don't expect your room to be cleaned and ready when you return after a day of work (even after being gone for 7 or more hours).  Twice my room was not cleaned upon my return and I was told that housekeeping works until 4pm (my calls were at 3pm or after).  No amenity was offered as an apology, nothing.
Manager Response: Dear Robert D,  Thank you for your review and for your recent stay with us. I am quite disappointed to hear your stay wasn't exceptional, as that is what we strive for. I want to sincerely apologize your room was not cleaned as you expected upon your return. I have passed this feedback along to our housekeeping staff in an effort to improve our operation. We look forward to the chance to welcome you again. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: Really enjoyed our Memorial Day weekend stay here. Its a Starwood property, so used my points -- well worth it. Stylish, yet relaxing. Room size was fine, pool area was excellent (including lake-like area and walking paths) and staff was very nice.  Would definitely return.
Manager Response: Dear Eduardo2626,  Thank you for your review and for your recent stay with. I am so glad you guys enjoyed your time out by our pool! We cant wait to host you again. Please let us know if you need anything at all!  Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary Heading: Comfortable and Convenient to Concert Halls
Summary: In a pretty area of Costa Mesa, next to the Segerstrom Center for the Arts, where we were going to see American Ballet Theatre perform. Pleasant and easy walk to the performing arts center. The hotel is also a very short walk from a hidden treasure- a Noguchi-designed garden, the California Scenario, which is behind a parking garage and a TGIF restaurant. Ask at the front desk how to get there. The beds are the most comfortable ones I have ever slept in and the in-room breakfasts had a perfect selection to meet the needs of both gluten-free vegans and hearty carnivores. The hotel feels cosier and much more "mod" than the larger conventional hotels in Costa Mesa. Its location is perfect for attending performances, going to business meetings  and/or shopping.
Manager Response: Dear MelindaKHM03,   I'm glad that seeing the American Ballet Theatre brought you in to experience our hotel, and you had a nice stay with us. There are certainly a lot of wonderful parts about our area and it pleasures me to know that you discovered some of those. We appreciate all of your feedback, and you taking the time to share. We are looking forward to the opportunity to welcome you again.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: I returned to this hotel when their rates were better than the Westin a block over. I'd had a less-than-optimal visit during the last stay, but decided to give it another try. I had a much better experience. The hotel looks and feels like a boutique hotel, at a more modest rate. The food in the restaurant is quite good. Highly recommend the farro bowl with poached eggs for breakfast, and the silver trumpet salad at dinner. Nice wine list, too. All in all, I'm glad I gave it another chance.
Manager Response: Dear MBTinDC,  Thank you for coming back and giving us a try again! We really appreciate it and I am so glad you had a better experience this time around. We cant wait to host you again! Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary Heading: Great property with a boutique feel
Summary: If it was just me, and if money was no option I'd be fine at the nearby Westin but I have to say that Avenue of the Arts is a better deal and especially if traveling with my wife I would stay here.  I only had one night on my recent stay, but everything was great from the front desk service to the building lobby & landscaping to the rooms which were very comfortable.  I will definitely be back.
Manager Response: Dear carlsonb_2000,  Thank you so much for staying with us and for such a great review! I am so pleased to hear you had a great time with your wife. We cant wait to host you again! Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: I usually stay at the Westin when I come down here, but decided to give this place a try. It is a lovely boutique hotel.  The rooms have hardwood floors and sliding glass doors that lead to a step out balcony.  I would have loved to be able to sit out there since my room had a beautiful view of the lake, but there is no room for a chair!  But still it gives the illusion of space.  In the room itself, there is a sofa, and a large screen TV.  Everything is new and beautifully decorated.. The bathroom is small, but perfect for one person.    The hotel is beautifully located within walking distance of South Coast Plaza, the South Coast Repertory and the Segerstrom Hall  not to mention the excellent restaurants like VACA and THE WATER GRILL..  They have their own restaurant, but it
Manager Response: Dear Jean H,  Thank you for taking the time to review your stay with us! We are so glad you gave us a try! You really showcased everything the surround area has to offer. We look forward to your return trip. Please let us know if you need anything.    Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: My son and I have been to this beautiful hotel before and loved it~  I decided to bring him back as he was recovering from eye surgery.  The experience could not have been better!  The staff was amazing and very understanding of our situation.  They went above and beyond our expectations and made our stay pleasant and as comfortable as possible.  I can hardly wait to return and enjoy the lovely restaurant and bar experience; however, we used their 24 hour room service for ordering food and it did not disappoint. What an amazing experience to be here yet again~
Manager Response: Dear lisaann6760,  Thank you so much for an awesome review and for your recent stay with us! I am extremely pleased to hear my staff provided excellent service and that your son had a good recovery. Please let us know if you need anything and we cant wait for your return trip!  Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: This hotel recently became a Starwood hotel and is located just behind the Segerstrom Theater.  It's a wonderful place to stay as you can walk to the concert hall and over to South Coast Plaza without having to pay the price of the large Westin Hotel nearby.  It's decor is trendy; staff is wonderful and rooms are lovely and modern.  Breakfast on the restaurant patio was great.  My only suggestion is they need to improve the mixology in the bar.  It's a great bar and patio, but we couldn't get any coffee drinks as they had no whipped cream.
Manager Response: Dear Suefowl,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay of our property! I am very pleased to hear the staff were so accommodating and you enjoyed our stylish newly renovated rooms. We look forward to having you stay with us again soon. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: The hotel is fine.  Did not get much benefit as a Platinum member.  I stay at the other Sheraton close by and I got free breakfast.  No free parking and that's the norm in this area.  The room is clean. Service was OK.  Internet is working fine.
Manager Response: Dear Tom Y,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback of your recent stay with us. I am disappointed to hear that you found our benefits for being a Platinum member did not match those of other SPG properties. We always try our best make sure our elite members know we appreciate their loyalty. We hope we get the chance to welcome you again soon.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: Had a sales awards event here. Food was very good, service was great. Catering, meeting planning etc., All were tremendous. The rooms are very nice and the hotel ambiance was fantastic. Ample self parking along with valet. Located near the performing arts area. Highly recommended!
Manager Response: Dear ngcda911,  Thank you for taking the time to leave such a great review! I am so pleased you enjoyed our meeting spaces and catering staff! They work very hard to provide a great experience. We look forward to welcoming you again soon. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary Heading: A few hiccups but a beautiful property
Summary: Spent one night here recently because the nearby Westin was booked up.  The rooms are beautifully decorated and the property is very well maintained.  But... Beneath all that beauty there are hiccups.  The rooms are not super well insulated.  I heard noise from a party until 2:30 am.  Bright an early, I heard water running through pipes.  If they improved the sound proofing this would be an amazing boutique hotel.
Manager Response: Dear JWJ1981,  Thank you for your review and for your recent stay here at Avenue of the Arts Hotel. I am very pleased you enjoyed the decor and upkeep of our property. I do sincerely apologize that you were disturbed during your stay. We appreciate the feedback and use to it better our daily operations. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: The room had 2 queen size beds and clean bathroom.  It had a small balcony that overlooked the parking structure.  The room has a adjoining door to the next unit if 2 hotel rooms were booked.  There is a pool, wedding area, restaurant, and sitting area on the main floor.  The staff is very attentive to your needs and are friendly.  The hotel will become a part of the Marriott Chain shortly.  Nice place to stay and close to high end shopping.  There is a modest $24 per day charge for parking.  Would consider staying here again.
Manager Response: Dear Alaw888,  Thank you for such a great review! I am so pleased you enjoyed our rooms and everything our surrounding area has to offer. We look forward to the chance of welcoming you again soon. Please let me know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary Heading: Beautiful Boutique Hotel with awesome staff
Summary: We stayed here on our way to Disneyland which is less than half an hour from this place. It has some great restaurants around. The restaurant in this hotel where we had brunch was wonderful as well - good food and good service. The room was beautiful, the patio was as big as a decent sized backyard! The room was spacious and the beds were comfortable. The hotel has a parking garage, you could either use valet or self park. Self park is a lot cheaper and not so bad.
Manager Response: Dear Travel_Maverick182,  Thank you for your recent stay and for your fantastic 5 star review! We are pleased that you enjoyed the room as well as brunch! We look forward to your future stay. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: Overall, the hotel is solid, and the staff are pleasant.  We stayed here recently, and booked it last minute, and despite that, were still offered an upgrade to the top floor. Not much of a view to speak of, but the room was clean. The only downside was noise from the water pipes. I got woken up a few times when people in other rooms turned on their showers or sinks.
Manager Response: Dear adambarbersf,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay at our property! I'm glad the staff were pleasant but I do sincerely apologize that you were disturbed in the evening. We always appreciate feedback as it gives us a chance to continue improving. Please let us know if you need anything and we hope to see you again soon!  Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: We stayed here while going to Disneyland for a couple of days. We arrived late on Friday night. We called ahead to tell them we'd be there late. When we got there, they put us in a ground floor room right next to the loudest family on the planet. Not kidding. We didn't get in the room until 11:30 and this family with all their kids was screaming at the top of their lungs. At one point, I told my kids to open the door and look into the hallway to see what the commotion was. Then I realized it was coming from the adjoining room door. They quieted down a while later but were up at the crack of dawn screaming again the next morning. We were spending the whole day at Disneyland, but I knew that it was going to be a problem if we came back at 8, exhausted and wanting to crash, and
Manager Response: Dear E K,   Thank you for your recent stay and your review of our property. I'm glad my staff was able to turn a situation around and provide great service. That's exactly what we strive for! We hope you enjoyed your Disneyland trip and we look forward to welcoming you again soon. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: As a Starwood platinum 100 with ambassador services afforded to me, I am without question very spoiled when it comes to hotel choices and service. That said, I must say my first experience at this Tribute hotel was nothing short of a wonderful experience! I was greeted by Evan at the front desk who made it his mission to ensure that my expectations were not only met but certainly exceeded! My check and less it all but two minutes as he recognized immediately that I was tired and looking forward to unwinding… Give me the highlights of the hotel, recommendations re nearby restaurants and ensured that I understood that my every need would be looked after. His professionalism, obvious appreciation of all his guests, sincere desire to please and engaging personality reflected what I
Manager Response: Dear Paul B,  Wow! What a great review! Thank you so much for your recent stay at Avenue of the Arts Hotel. I am extremely pleased that everything during your stay was on par with and exceeded SPG standards. We look forward to your return trip! Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: The hotel is located across the street from Segerstrom Center for the Arts. The staff was very helpful and friendly. The grounds are well kept and great for an evening stroll. The restaurant has a fine bar and stocked with top shelf favorites. My wife and I enjoyed our stay and will return again.
Manager Response: Dear schapman6,  Thank you for taking a moment to review your recent stay at Avenue of the Arts Hotel! I am so glad you enjoyed yourself! We cant wait for your return trip. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: Very nice room, unfortunately noisy guests around, good location - close to the arts' center - and 24h room service. Friendly service, small reception, good design. I had a beautiful junior suite with a very small bathroom - strange.....
Manager Response: Dear FLuisi,  Thank you for your review and for your recent stay here at Avenue of the Arts Hotel. I wanted to apologize for any disturbances during your stay. However, I am very pleased you enjoyed your room and our close proximity to the surrounding arts district. We look forward to welcoming you again soon!  Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary Heading: Disappointed, nothing for SPG Platinum here
Summary: Pros: - Very comfortable beds - Fast, efficient shuttle - Close to airport - Lots of food/shopping options nearby  Cons: - Dirty - No perks for SPG Platinum - Terrible gym  Shuttle pickup from the airport was fast, it arrived within 10 minutes after calling.  Arrived at the hotel shortly thereafter.  Other than "thanks for being an SPG Platinum member" from the front desk clerk, status means nothing here.  No upgrade, there is no lounge, no free breakfast, basically everyone is platinum.  Great for guests without status, but not so much for loyal guests.  Upon getting to my room I saw a big stain on the carpet outside as well as dirt around the bottom of the door.  The wood floor in the room is very scratched up and overall the room was not clean.  Found long black hair in the
Manager Response: Dear Mustanhcop,  Thank you for your review of your recent stay at Avenue of the Arts Hotel. I am quite disappointed to hear your stay was not up to the usual SPG standards and I want to sincerely apologize for that. We value all of our members and try to provide the best experience for their loyalty. I have also reached out to you via email to further discuss your stay. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary Heading: A perfect compliment to a night at the Segerstrom Center for the Arts
Summary: Beautiful, well-appointed, chic design and the staff was professional and helpful. You cannot ask for much more to top off a night at the Segerstrom Center for the Arts. I see that there is some major construction on site but it didn't interfere with our stay at all. We had a great time and we'll be back.
Manager Response: Dear Jeffery H,  Thank you for such an incredible review of our property! I'm so pleased you enjoyed our newly renovated rooms and our staff was accommodating. As a side note, there is no construction occurring on our property but the property next door is undergoing their own construction.   We look forward to your return trip! Please let us know if you need anything at all!  Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: I liked it when it was a Wyndham and it's even nicer now. Excellent attitude from all staff and check in was pleasant and accommodating. The room was VERY clean, which as a frequent traveler, I truly value, comfortable and quiet. Great place to stay for a Segerstrom Arts Center getaway weekend.
Manager Response: Dear sbs74,  Thank you for your review of our hotel and your recent stay with us. I am very pleased you enjoyed all of the accommodations and that the staff were so friendly. We hope to get the chance to welcome you back soon!  Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: One of the best in the area...  This hotel was so great, the personal was so helpfull, new instalations, great rooms, nice food at the local restaurant, a little expensive but great.  Will recomend this hotel to anyone!
Manager Response: Dear Jmsv79,  Thank you for the compliment and for your recent stay with us! I'm so glad you enjoyed your experience and everything the area has to offer. We look forward to having you again soon! Please let us know if you need anything.  Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Okay, but not worth the money
Summary: I recently stayed here and I will start with the positives...Lorena in reservations was very helpful and personable.  The young man  at the front desk who helped me Saturday morning was polite and courteous.  Room was clean and comfortable. The negatives: priced too high,  poor internet connection, very noisy hallways, 4 and 5 a.m. deliveries where the beeping when backing up woke me up 2x even with windows closed, and charging for use of computer internet.  For the cost of this place I would think these things above would be better.  The Westin is much better and is in a better location, for a bit less and has a lovely pool too.
Manager Response: Dear Roberta B,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback about your recent stay. I sincerely apologize for any issues that occurred while you were staying with us. While disappointing to hear, we always appreciate feedback in an effort to continually improve. We hope to have the chance to welcome you again.    Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: Really happy to find this SPG gem! The rooms are really nice and you don't feel like you are in a chain at all. You can tell all the furnishings are thoughtful and the food options are pretty good. The staff are warm and welcoming. Will revisit soon!
Manager Response: Dear Charles L,  Thank you for your recent stay with us and for such a great review! I am very pleased you enjoyed our newly renovated rooms and restaurant, Silver Trumpet. We hope to see you again soon! Please let us know if you need anything.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: This Starwood property is worth the price. Self park is simple and convenient. Room with balcony is pleasant. The headboard LED reading lights are especially good and handy. Remember to request the mini bar key if you want to use the fridge. No microwave ovens available.
Manager Response: Dear Alohandra,  Thank you so much for such a great review! I am so glad you enjoyed our newly renovated rooms! We look forward to welcoming you again soon. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: This slick-looking hotel has discovered what so many European hotels have always known: hardwood floors are better-looking and seem way cleaner than icky hotel carpets! From the elegant floor to the ultra-comfortable bed, we were impressed with the thought that went into decorating this hotel and making it accommodating. I can't remember the last time I slept this well in a hotel. The hotel is just across the street from the two Segerstrom Halls and the South Coast Rep and within walking distance to shopping and restaurants. (The hotel's own restaurant, Silver Trumpet, is fine but suffers from a bit of an identity crisis--excellent food, but amateurish if friendly service. Our waitress pronounced every single dish "killer.") There's a decent workout room, a nice outdoor pool,
Manager Response: Dear Lit-traveler,  Thank you for your recent stay and for such a great review of our property. I'm glad you enjoyed our newly renovated rooms equipped with hardwood floors! We hope to have the chance to host you again soon. Let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Service Manager

Summary: I stayed here for 3 nights while attending a conference in the area. The staff are friendly and the rooms are bright and airy. While I was looking at a building site out the back, it was quiet over the weekend as no work was being done. Room is spacious and well equipped.
Manager Response: Dear BNM79,  Thank you for such a fantastic review! I am so glad you enjoyed your stay and that the staff were so friendly. We look forward to welcoming you again soon. Please let us know if you need anything.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Service Manager

Summary: This hotel exceeded my expectations! I decided to make a last minute visit to see some family in OC and needed a place to stay. Tyler, the guest services manager was kind enough to offer information about what rooms were available and what would suit my families needs best. He also made great suggestions for family activities near by. Overall, the service was excellent and the room was beautiful. I will now be staying at Ave of the Arts every time I visit OC and definitely recommending it to friends. Thanks ave of the arts!
Manager Response: Dear MarinC123,  Thank you so much for your fantastic 5 star review and for your recent stay with us. I am extremely pleased to hear how much you enjoyed the hotel and that the staff were so helpful to you and your family. We hope to have the pleasure to welcome you again soon!  Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: The hotel is in a good location, that is true. The appearance and tidiness of the hotel is variable and the staff could not care less for your experience.  Multiple issues, but one experience stands out: My wife left her new sunglasses (a Christmas Gift) in the room. I called the hotel about 30-45 minutes after checkout and informed them of our error. I was told I would receive a call back when the sunglasses were recovered, which I did not. I was then told, after calling back an hour later, that no sunglasses had been found, which seemed very hard to believe since I neither my wife or I had them in our possession. I ask for the room to be rechecked and if possibly the housekeeping staff may have not reported finding them. I am told over the phone that an investigation will be
Manager Response: Dear Zerologist,  I was very disappointed to hear about you recent stay and I want to sincerely apologize for the negative experience that occurred at our property. Our goal is always to provide exceptional guest service. Thank you for your candid feedback and for your stay.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: This is tucked away near the theaters. Our room is nice, just like the pictures from the hotel's website. They have a small swimming pool. It was not crowded in October. Excellent staff. Our room's patio door opens to a view of neighboring apartment's fountain.
Manager Response: Good afternoon,  Thank you so much for your review and for your recent stay with us here at Avenue of the Arts Hotel. I'm so glad you enjoyed your trip and that the staff were so accommodating. We cant wait for your return! Please let us know if you need anything.  Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: Staff was very nice when I checked in. I usually stay at the Westin nearby but decided to give this hotel a try. So glad I did!  Room was modern. Bathroom had a tub/shower combo. Not my favorite but it worked. Grounds were really nice. Fitness center only has a limited number of machines.  I will stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Tantewitz,  Thank you for taking the time to review our property. I am so glad you gave us a try and you enjoyed your stay! We look forward to having you stay again soon. Please let us know if you need anything at all!  Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: As a frequent traveler, I find it hard to find the time to fill out a survey.  In the case of this hotel, I feel the need to write something really positive!  I'm not all that good with words, but, I'll simply say this.  Avenue of the Arts Costa Mesa ranks with the absolute BEST in every way.  The most impressive thing to me, besides the beauty of the facility, is the beauty of the people who work there.  It's a fantastic crew!  THANK YOU!
Manager Response: Dear Robert B,  Thank you for taking the time to post such a great review. I am extremely pleased that you enjoyed your accommodations and that the here staff were so amazing. That's exactly what we strive for. We cant wait for your return trip! Please let us know if there is anything we can do.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: Such a lovely place to stay, the rooms are amazing, we had a double room so we each had a massive double bed with lots of pillows, a good tv with lots of channels and a fridge, bathroom is lovely and it's in a good location.
Manager Response: Dear Bellacharlotte24,  Thank you so much for your 5 star review! We're so glad your enjoyed all of our in room amenities. We look forward to having you again soon! Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: From the moment one walks through the doors one is impacted by the art and pictures hanging on the walls, the carpet and the decor, all comes together exquisitely. The attention to detail from the staff, and the service at the restaurant is second to none. The food is outstanding. Loved this hotel!
Manager Response: Dear 849linetp,  Thank you so much for staying with us and for your five star review! I am so glad to hear you enjoyed your stay! I am also pleased to hear that you encountered such friendly and accommodating members of our team. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back soon!  Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: This is a really beautiful hotel. Even better, I think they might have the friendliest, most helpful hotel staff I've ever encountered. Our room was beautiful, the bed was wonderful, our in-room dining was delicious. We had a wonderful stay here.   Some other notes: Free and fast wifi Parking was around $25 - pretty standard for a nice hotel in this area A nice sauna and workout room (with free bottled water) This is not a walking area - you'll definitely need a car or cab to get around (I'm not sure what the public transportation is like in Costa Mesa) Close to the coast (we drove to Inspiration Point for the sunset) The lock on the patio door was broken when we got there, but they fixed it immediately.  Very nice bathroom products  I would stay here again in a heartbeat.
Manager Response: Dear BB_Mike,  Thank you for such a great review! We are incredibly pleased to hear how much you enjoyed your stay with us. The sauna and work out room are always a favorite among our guests. We look forward to your next stay. Please let us know if you need anything.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: This place is awesome! The rooms are well designed and spacious with a unique feel. The bar has a really cool vibe which would be great for meeting friends or a date night. Everyone at the hotel is also extremely friendly! The service is what truly makes it. Tyler checked us in and was so helpful and kind. We had a ton of luggage because my parents were visiting from out of town and he helped us take it up to the room because the bellman were busy. Later we found out he's the manager! When have you ever heard of a manager doing something like that?! This place is something special. We'll be back!
Manager Response: Dear TravelMaverick27,  Thank you for your fantastic 5 star review! I am so glad to hear all of the staff was so accommodating and you had a great stay. We looking forward to having you stay with us again. Please let us know if you need anything.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: Good:   Wood floors Balcony Bathrobe Keurig coffee Honor bar reasonable and without sensors Walk to South Coast Plaza  Bad: 32" TV Reserved King...got 2 Queens on 2nd fl (I'm Starwood Platinum) View of trees, parking lot, Terrace rooms below (wish I had one of  them at least) I've got a Exec Suite tomorrow but they want me to check out by 1 (should have 4pm) and wait for the Suite to be available.  If you're not snobby about rooms/service like me you should be happy.
Manager Response: Dear dpsaz,  Thank you for the review of your recent stay here at Avenue of the Arts Hotel. I am disappointed to hear your stay was anything less than exceptional. However, I'm glad you enjoyed our close proximity to South Coast Plaza and our new wood flooring. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to the chance to welcome you again!  Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: If you want restless nights due to poor insulation, hear your neighbors every word, have the AC and heater make loud noises than you've come to the right place. This is a live review. It's 3:31 AM....   Parking: $24 for self or $27 for valet. We decided to valet. I wasn't sure who valet was since there wasn't a "valet stand". Felt like anyone at the front door was considered valet.   Check in process- the front desk staff in the morning was nice. Their credit card reader had a problem and we had to try all three different computers that was at the front desk.. they should get this fixed.   Remainder of the staff here looks like they hate their job. The front desk girls at night don't greet you and they just stare at you when you walk by. Rude... management doesn't see this I
Manager Response: Dear Aveline138,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback of your recent stay. I am very disappointed to hear the guest room and service were not up to our typical standards. I understand your frustrations and I want to sincerely apologize. We take exceptional pride in the quality and service that we have become so well known for, so we are extremely disappointed to hear that we fell short during your stay. We truly hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back again in the future. I have also reached out to you in a private message to further discuss your stay.  Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary Heading: Modern property, great bar and friendly staff!
Summary: This property is well-maintained and has a nice modern feel. My bed was incredibly comfortable and the room was very clean. The restaurant and bar have a great vibe. I will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear CinCali,  Thank you for a great 5 star review! I am very happy to hear you found our newly renovated rooms comfortable and you enjoyed the restaurant. We look forward to your return trip!  Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: Stayed 3 nights at hotel while visiting friends in area. Hotel is conveniently located for shopping and dining. Staff is excellent! Valets, bellmen, front desk, room service, and restaurant all get high marks for professionalism, friendliness, and efficiency. Highly recommend this hotel, and will certainly stay here, again, when in Costa Mesa.
Manager Response: Dear John W,  Thank you so much for your fantastic 5 star review! I am extremely pleased to hear all of the staff were so friendly and accommodating during your stay. Also, that you enjoyed our close proximity to all the area has to offer. We hope to see you again!  Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: Stayed at this hotel because it was close to John Wayne Airport.  The hotel was really nice and the rooms were updated and big.  The service was very good and I will stay here if in the area again.  Good location close to the airport and a ton of nice restaurants and shopping in the area.
Manager Response: Dear mdr9,  Thank you for your review and for your recent stay at Avenue of the Arts hotel! I'm very pleased you found our newly renovated room spacious and that our staff was very accommodating. We look forward to your return trip!  Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: This hotel is great. I have stayed here a couple of times before, with no complaints. You can't beat the location, customer service and cleanliness. Close to everything the OC has to offer. The front desk staff and management are super friendly and accommodating. I would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Dear _bicakav,  I am so glad to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and that we delivered such a great experience. We cant wait for your return trip! Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary Heading: Convenient location, upscale facilities, very quiet rooms
Summary: I got a good room rate on HotWire. The kicker was a $24/night parking fee. So now you know. The hotel is clean, modern, and upscale-looking. The lobby is undergoing renovation; the gift shop was closed for construction. Checkin was fast. The Silver Trumpet restaurant has decent food. I can recommend the poke wontons, excellent breakfast Omelets, very rich ice cream. There is no breakfast buffet. Prices are equal to slightly lower than what you'd encounter in hotel restaurants of similar quality,  The hotel is located amid the City Arts Center's monumentalist buildings.  It is about two blocks off I-5 and two blocks from the large and upscale South Coast Plaza shopping center. It is on a side street off a side street, so a map or nav app is recommended to find it easily.  The
Manager Response: Dear Paul S,  Thank you so much for your great review and for your recent stay at Avenue of the Arts hotel! I am thrilled to hear you enjoyed the accommodations and our restaurant Silver Trumpet. As a side note, the gift shop is open during the renovation of our meeting spaces. We hope to see you again soon!  Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: The hotel is alright... definitely lacking in several areas. It's a 3.5 star. Not a 4. It's not as boutique-y as they would like to think they are. It's alright. There were two things that were pretty disappointing:   #1 if you book through a website (hotels.com, hotwire, etc...) you basically get treated as a second class citizen. I can't stand that. Am I staying at your hotel or am I not? Do you have to give me the worst room in the place because I paid $10 less? No.    #2 They don't care if you have status with Marriott/SPG. I told them I was a Marriott Platinum Elite and they basically gave me one of these: ¯\_(ツ)_/¯   . I am obviously aware you don't get the rewards when you check in because I booked through a website, but come on now...   Lastly, there is a little shop
Manager Response: Dear J_Travels321,  Thank you for your candid review of your recent stay at Avenue of the Arts hotel. I am really disappointed to hear your stay was anything less than exceptional. I sincerely apologize if my staff didn't make you feel welcomed or that your status was recognized and appreciated. Regardless of how a room is booked, we value every reservation that comes in. Thank you again for the feedback and we hope to see you again!  Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary Heading: Looks nice, lacks in many areas
Summary: I had a one night stay at the arts hotel over New Years. Upon arrival it looks the part, nice trendy and friendly staff. But once you get deeper into the hotel you start to see it's flaws.   Our room was appointed fairly nice, but for what appeared to be a trendy hotel it seemed like it was designed in the 90's. Secondly the actual complaint was the heater and AC did not work properly. The room was freezing cold upon arrival, after heating it up for a couple hours it got to a tolerable temperature. When we got back later that evening after dinner, the temperature was extremely hot (hotter than we set the thermostat) and turned it down, by the time we woke up, it was still extremely hot in there and the temperature hadn't changed much at all even though the thermostat read
Manager Response: Dear hustedms,  Thank you for your review and for your recent stay here at Avenue of the Arts hotel! I am glad to hear our staff hospitable. However, I am disappointed to hear about the flaws you experienced in your room and with your room service order. We greatly appreciate your feedback and this information has been passed on to the proper department to ensure improvement are made in those areas. We hope to see you again soon!  Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: My son was along for a business trip so between us we experienced most of the offerings. As SPG-PLAT this property has potential to be a top pick along the beaches corridor. There were a couple hiccups with the room which management eagerly engaged with a follow up call. Otherwise this is a great location, well adorned and good parking (excellent valets). There's no SPG lounge and the breakfast offered was continental "no protein." I'm convinced enough to give it another try.
Manager Response: Dear Kauai-Biz-Traveler,  Thank you for taking the time to review our property and for your stay at Avenue of the Arts hotel. I do apologize for any hiccups you experienced in the room but I'm glad to hear our management team was on top of it! We hope to see you again soon!  Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: It was a great place to stay for 1 day. I don't know about staying there for longer though. The heater was not quite working, so when you are sleeping, it gets really cold. The rest of the rooms are very neat and comfortable. My only other complaint was that there was no hair dryer. That was a big disappointment to me. Moreover, this place is a pretty decent place to stay for a few days.
Manager Response: Dear CHESSA P,  Thank you for your review of our hotel. I sincerely apologize that some aspects of your trip were not perfect. We truly appreciate the feedback and always strive to improve the guest experience. As a side note, every guest room does have a blow dryer which is located inside the closet. We hope to see you again soon.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: The room was spacious and decorated very nicely with modern colorful and comfortable furniture. The bed was very good. Staff members were unfailingly nice. Perfect location for cultural activities, shopping and nice restaurants.
Manager Response: Dear walkman10,  Thank you so much for staying with us and for your five star review! I am so glad to hear you enjoyed your stay! I am also pleased to hear that you encountered such friendly and accommodating members of our team. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back soon!  Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: We had a Junior Suite that was lovely and the doormen were exceptional, but this hotel just had too many glitches with the base requirements of a luxury property. Specifically, our water in the morning took literally 5-10 minutest to heat up. The shower pull didn't function properly, the pull out bed in our suite was not made up and it took two calls and 40 minutes to get the bedding delivered to our room, there were no extra blankets or pillows in the room, there is no coffee on the property until after 7am, etc.  Again--all small stuff, but when you add them up the place just felt "off" to me.
Manager Response: Dear KKelsay,  Thank you so much for your review. However, I am disappointed to hear your stay was anything less than exceptional. I sincerely apologize for any lapse in service and for the complications in your room. I do appreciate the feedback and we hope you stay with us again soon. Please let us know if you need anything.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary Heading: A luxury hotel near John Wayne Airport
Summary: Free shuttle to/from hotel. Just call front desk and will be arrive airport in 10 mins. Front desk staff friendly and helpful to answer my enquires. Did order a room service and the food taste good. However, a bit far to LAX (about 40mins).
Manager Response: Dear airron1125,  Thank you for your great review. I am pleased to hear my staff was helped and provided great service. We hope you'll come and stay with us again soon!  Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: We spent Thanksgiving night at the hotel after visiting family in Coto de Caza.  The rooms were clean and nicely decorated in that contemporary, boutique style hotel. Great location for shopping and attending theater!  My only complaint is that our room was next to a family with a very loud crying baby and you could hear it like it was in your room!  Given that the hotel appeared to be quite vacant, am a bit surprised that they put us in the room next to a family with multiple kids.
