Manager Response: Dear dcdreyer,  Thank you so much for your review and your stay with us. I am pleased you enjoyed your room and I do apologize for any disruptions you experienced. We appreciate your feedback and we look forward to your return! Please let us know if you need anything.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: We mixed business with pleasure, and brought our four year-old with us.  Our room was spacious, and splurged for a terrace room with a small fenced-in yard.  Well worth it!  There is also a man-made pond behind the hotel where we took occasional walks.  Hotel staff was very friendly.  We will stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Jon T,  Thank you so much for your 5 star review of Avenue of the Arts Hotel. I'm glad you enjoyed our newly renovated accommodations and my staff provided great service. We look forward to your return!  Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: When we booked this hotel we had high hopes based on the photos. However, we had 3 out of 3 nights of barely any sleep due to paper thin walls and various loud people/families in the rooms near ours. In addition they have tried to update the rooms but many things including the bathroom were left untouched and very dated. I am an SPG member but will be staying elsewhere on any future visits to Orange County. Disappointed!
Manager Response: Dear Sacha B,  I am disappointed to hear your stay with us was anything less than perfect. I sincelrely apologize for any troubles you experienced. If you are in the area again, please reach out to me directly and I will make sure you're taken care of. Thank you for your feedback.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: We stayed here and I have to say it was a beautiful hotel and the service was amazing! I will be booking this hotel again! The location is great. I regret we did not get to try the restaurant because it looked amazing! We saved that for next time though!
Manager Response: Dear Trish R,  Thank you very much for your excellent review and great pictures. I am so glad that you enjoyed your time with us. We can't wait to see you again soon! Please let me know if you need anything.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: As an SPG devotee, I'm used to the cookie cutter layouts of Westins, Sheratons and the like.  For a very similar price point, this hotel offers much more and was a welcome detour from the mundane routine for work trips.  Room was quiet despite being on the second floor (yes, you can hear the faint noise of planes from SNA) and got good light, and the furnishings made the room feel like a home for two nights instead of just another hotel room.  Staff was very friendly, but as a Design Collection Hotel, just keep in mind this is not the St. Regis or a Luxury Collection Brand so don't expect over the top service (and you're not paying for it either).  Good proximity to South Coast Plaza for shoppers and very good food options nearby off of Bristol.  Easy to get basically anywhere
Manager Response: Dear Chris W,  Thank you so much for your fantastic review. I am very pleased to hear how much you enjoyed your stay in our newly renovated rooms. We look forward to your next stay! Please reach out to me personally if you need anything.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary Heading: Most beautiful hotel room I've ever seen
Summary: A girlfriend of mine and I stayed a night at this hotel in a room with two queen beds on the fifth floor.  Loved the design of the lobby area and room, which were both so welcoming, elegant, and modern.  I've never seen hardwood floors in a hotel room before, and they made such a difference.  Not only did they look gorgeous, but they gave off a cleaner vibe than carpet.  We had a little "balcony" off our room - one of those that has a sliding glass door but you can't actually step out onto it.  Really nice for ventilation.  The beds were also super comfortable, and there were different thicknesses of pillows provided by default, which I appreciate as a fussy sleeper.  We didn't explore the hotel bar or restaurant, but my friends ordered room service dessert the night we stayed.
Manager Response: Dear Sharon L,  Thank you so much for your five star review. I am very pleased you enjoyed your stay with us. I do however apologize if there was any trouble getting in contact with the front desk staff. We do our best to provide the best possible service. Hopefully you come and stay with us again soon!  Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: This is such a beautiful property.  So modern and fashionable in both the lobby area and the rooms.  The staff was very welcoming and friendly when I was checking in.  The checking in process was quick and accurate.  I love that they include the wifi information with the room keys and also included information for the on-site restaurant.  The room was well lit and had the AC already on.  I thought the room was beautiful!  I love the wood floors.  The granite bathroom was amazing.  Same with the shower.  I had everything I needed in the room.  It was very comfortable.  Especially the bed.  I had a wonderful night's sleep.  You can't really beat that at a hotel.  I also ordered room service for breakfast in the morning.  It was so delicious.  Everything was prepared perfectly and
Manager Response: Dear Terri S,  Thank you for your fantastic five star review of our hotel. I'm glad you enjoyed your accommodations and found our newly renovated rooms comfortable. I am also glad to hear my staff provided great service. Hope to see you again soon!  Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: We often have stayed at the Westin, but stayed here the night we saw a show at The Segerstrom because it was new, different, a little less expensive and offered free parking as part of the rate.  The hotel is beautiful.  We were told it used to be the Wyndham (where we never stayed).  It is as close to The Segerstrom as the Westin, just on the other side (which makes it farther from South Coast Plaza, but still within walking distance).  Our room was modern and beautifully appointed.  We definitely would stay again should circumstances warrant.
Manager Response: Dear TravelMan90277,  Thank you for choosing Avenue of the Arts Hotel while you were in the area for the show. I am pleased to hear that your visit was enjoyable and you liked the hotel accommodations! We look forward to seeing you again.  Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary Heading: Who's managing this hotel? Hello, Starwood?
Summary: I really want to like this hotel. The hotel and rooms are nicely furnished and comfortable. The bar attached to the restaurant has a nice vibe: stylish but not too big. However, the mini-store for coffee and sundries is only open from 7-11am and did not open on time. There's only one person working there so when they need to take a break, it's closed. Then there's the bell guys who packed my car. They smashed the trunk down on a box, punching a hole in it. Most annoying is that the hotel asked for my review, and they STILL have not acknowledged my dissatisfaction. Here's my advice: if you want to stay in this area, there's a Westin a block over. Stay there, instead.
Manager Response: Dear MBTinDC,  Thank you for taking the time to review your stay at Avenue of the Arts hotel. I am very sorry to hear that you had a disappointing stay with us. I would love to have the opportunity to speak with you in further detail regarding your experience. I have reached out to you via private message. I look forward to your response.  Kind regards, Tyler Branham

Summary: Love the hotel! It's modern and has great views in their lake view rooms. It's also very close to the south coast plaza, so it's at a great location. I did not get a chance to try the restaurant, Silver Trumpet, but it looked lively and very cool.
Manager Response: Dear Rehan Y,  I am glad to hear you had a great stay with us! Thank you for providing a great review and pictures of your time here. Hopefully next time you get a chance to dine with us. Hope to see you again soon. Please let me know if you need anything.   Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: The front desk staff were friendly, prompt and helpful.  The room was nice with hard wood floors, modern but comfortable furnishings.  I liked that the living area and bedroom had separate thermostats so that I could turn off the bedroom air conditioner (and not have the air blow on me) but still be cool.  The only flaw, which in So. Cal wouldn't matter most days, is that from the main door to the parking structure there is a 50 ft. walk that is not covered.  But, in reality, that is hardly ever going to be an issue.  I would stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear aaflyerincali,  Thank you for your fantastic five star review of our hotel. I'm glad you enjoyed your accommodations and found our newly renovated rooms comfortable. I am also glad to hear my staff provided great service. Hope to see you again soon!  Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: This is a nice little charming hotel that you will enjoy your stay! I loved it ;)  The location is "almost" walking distance to the famous South Coast Plaza where you can spend your fortune! Ha!  The room is nicely decorated and very comfortable. It depends on your room, there could be a nice pond view.   The hotel restaurant was ok..
Manager Response: Dear Da Y,  I am so glad you enjoyed your recent stay with us and were able to make your way over to South Coast Plaza. Their close proximity to our hotel makes for an ideal shopping area. We hope to see you again!  Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: Stayed here with my husband while I worked a couple events over the weekend. Somehow the price ended up comparable to places like best western and days inn so I decided to try it out. They pay attention to the details and it made our stay. Very modern decor - not my style but I still enjoyed it.   Pros:  Staff were top notch Room was clean, well decorated, water bottles provided, had wood flooring & a sofa Bed was super comfy and I loved the big duvet.  Bathrooms were very upscale, albeit not very big Our view was absolutely lovely for being in the middle of town Pool area featured padded chairs, rolled up towels on each chair, pool toys free in-room wifi Greeters/doormen & lots of little sitting areas both in and out doors  Cons: Not many to list and most are of little
Manager Response: Dear alimariew,  Thank you very much for the wonderful 5 star review of our hotel. I am very pleased to hear you enjoyed the accommodations and the friendliness of my staff. We are already looking forward to your next visit, I hope to see you soon!   Kind regards,  Tyler Branham  Guest Services Manager

Summary Heading: Chic, Clean, Cool and Killer Food!
Summary: I had to stay one night at this hotel due to a business event that was being held in their conference center and after my experience, I would easily go back for a personal trip as well.   When you arrive you can either valet or self park in their structure. The lobby is super chic and modern and really gave me a wow factor. This hotel is part of Starwood so I was able to use my SPG number here.   The room was also very modern and bright with wood floors and white linens and white and black decor on the walls. The bed was super comfy and my room had two queen beds.   The conference center was very nice with the main ballroom upstairs. What really stood out to me was the catering from the hotel and the banquet staff. Too both here from the bartender to the captain. The food... it
Manager Response: Dear BobbieJean2010,  Thank you so much for the fantastic review. I am very pleased at how much you enjoyed your stay with us. We look forward to your next visit!  Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: This hotel is very easy to find and it is close to South Coast Plaza for shopping. Also John Wayne airport is really close too.  We only stayed one night but wished it was longer. The room is very nice as are is the entire hotel and grounds. The valet team is superb as are the folks at check in.
Manager Response: Dear pkelly92592,  Thank you very much for the wonderful 5 star review of our hotel. I am delighted to hear you enjoyed the accommodations and the friendliness of my staff. We are already looking forward to your next visit, I hope to see you soon!  Kind regards, Tyler Branham Guest Services Manager

Summary: The property is in good condition and the amenities are decent..but it's the customer service that sets this place apart from the rest. I had a shower issue, but the staff was all over it to help out. The service at this hotel is really great, and this is entirely due to the fantastic service staff, specifically: Karla - Karla is phenomenal! She's a true testament to her profession and an absolute delight to speak with. I am really glad to hear we made you feel so welcome and could accommodate the perfect room for you! I will diffidently pass on the thank you to Grace, and hopefully we will see you soon for your next weekend away!

Summary Heading: Newly renovated "boutique" hotel in the middle of the Arts Complex within walking distance of South Coast Mall
Summary: This hotel was recently renovated so the lobby, restaurant, lounge and rooms have been refreshed in an interesting contemporary style.  Rooms are large, some with views of the artificial "lake".  However, there is construction on this side of the hotel so be aware of the related noise during weekdays.  We were here to work, so we appreciated the adequate desk, lamp and work chair, plus the complimentary coffee machine in the room.  We enjoyed breakfast in the restaurant ,though the muzak can be extremely loud, and after-work drinks in the lounge that seems to be popular with locals even on weeknights.  Staff here was extremely friendly and accommodating.  It's a 10 minute walk to South Coast Plaza which was convenient.  After stays at the Westin, the Avenue of the Arts was a
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your travel experience with us at Avenue of the Arts.  I am very glad to hear that you enjoyed so many aspects of the hotel such as the large rooms with great working area and the experiences you had at the restaurant.   I am even more delighted to hear how friendly and accommodating our staff was.     We hope to see you again during your next trip to Costa Mesa!

Summary: Disclaimer:  I'm used to staying in a competing hotel in this area and was disappointed that the Ave of the Arts didn't meet my expectations. The room was fine although the bed wasn't the most comfortable. The pool was quite small, and the layout of the hotel was awkward. The staff were very courteous and even helped me hop the hotel shuttle to the airport at a very early hour of the morning. The attached restaurant was a disappointment. You'll be happier walking to South Coast Plaza to enjoy some very good restaurants there.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to provide us feedback in regards to your recent stay with us at Avenue of the Arts.   It is only through feedback like yours that we maintain, and indeed where necessary  , improve upon the service we provide to our valued guests.    I was very disappointed to read that we did not meet you expectations.  We have just finished a full remodel of the rooms, where we have replaced all the furniture and have all new beds as well.   I would like to hear a little more about the restaurant from your experience and will be sending you a message shortly to discuss further.     Please accept my apology, and I hope your pervious stay hasn't put you off from joining us again in the future, so we can surpass your expectaions next time!

Summary: Beautifully designed with beautiful landscaping. Glass walls in lobby showing waterways and plants and out the back a huge pond with walkway all around and ducks to watch. The rooms were modern and nicely appointed. TV a little small but good enough. Beds very comfortable. My only complaint was only coffee in room and my husband and I are tea drinkers.Usually hotels we stay in have both. Coffee also out on our floor by the elevator with assorted pastries which was a nice touch, although no tea there either. We were on an SPG Starwood guest floor--not sure if that is on every floor or not.  Also I hate paying separately for parking, though most hotels do these days. I feel if we are a guest of the hotel they should supply parking for you. I would rather pay more for the room and
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide your feedback during your stay with us at Avenue of the Arts.  I am glad to hear it was a very nice trip for you and that you enjoyed so many aspects of the hotel such as the room, pond, and beautiful design overall.    I am disappointed though to hear about your complaint in regards to there being no tea in the room.   This is great feedback and will definitely be brought to the attention of our executive committee.  Next time, please do note hesitate to give us a call as we do have a wide variety of teas we can have sent up for you.   Also, in regards to parking we do have packages that include parking, so please feel free to inquire about these upon booking.     Thank you again for providing us such valuable feedback.  We look forward to seeing you again during your next trip to Costa Mesa!

Summary: I stayed at this hotel while going to a training for work and I was fortunate enough to be able to bring along my husband and infant son with me. The hotel is updated and very clean. They have a great little pond behind the hotel that my son and husband were able to walk around during the day for entertainment. The hotel is also very conveniently located to a mall with lots of shopping and food options. The best part of this hotel though is the people. Every single person that works at this hotel is kind and courteous. They definitely make you feel like you are staying at a 5 star resort. Overall we were very pleased with our stay.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to let us know about your stay with us at Avenue of the Arts.  I am glad to hear about the great time you were able to have with your family while away on business.  I am also extremely delighted to hear that the best part of the hotel was the kind and courteous staff.    We hope to see you again during your next trip to Costa Mesa!

Summary: The room was modern, clean, and spacious. And the price was just right. Sooo close to live theater, concerts, shopping, restaurants. Lots to do without ever getting in your car.      We tried the restaurant for dinner and breakfast.There were almost no choices for a vegetarian meal and the chef did not seem to be flexible enough to accommodate changes. My only complaint.   Breakfast on the patio was very enjoyable.       Everyone on staff was friendly and helpful. I will definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to let us know how your stay was with us at Avenue of the Arts.  I am glad to hear we are located in the perfect location for you!  I am disappointed to hear about your complaint in the restaurant.  This feedback will definitely be brought the attention of the appropriate restaurant staff, as it is through feedback like this that we are able to maintain, and indeed improve upon our service we provide to our valued guests.   Thank you again and we look forward to seeing you on your next trip to Costa Mesa!

Summary: Interesting enough, we stayed here right while they shifted to being a Starwood hotel. We literally had two bills on both companies, and I was surprised at how easily and graciously they made the shift.  The location is great for a good central Orange County hotel. Close to all of the freeways, and just across the street from the South Coast Plaza.  They had fresh drinks and cookies in the lobby each day, and the staff always greeted us with a smile.  The rooms were clean and comfortable, and we would absolutely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your stay with us at Avenue of the Arts!!  I am so glad to hear our location was perfect for you!  Thank you for being part of our transition and our first starwood guests!!   I am glad it was a great experience!!   We look forward to seeing you again in the future!
